Adventure & quest alongside your friends in this bizarre cross-platform MMORPG from the creators of the original, and comically-redundantly named... AdventureQuest! Did we mention the darn-near-weekly free DLC?

Name: Star Trek: Bridge Crew
Summary: Star Trek™: Bridge Crew er udviklet til VR, så du kan fordybe dig i Star Trek-universet. I samarbejdsspillet skal I danne en besætning med 4 spillere, der indtager rollerne som kaptajn, styrmand, taktisk officer og ingeniør.

Name: Red Dead Redemption 2
Summary: Red Dead Redemption 2, den kritikerroste åbne spilverden fra Rockstar Games og det bedst vurderede spil til konsolgenerationen, er nu forbedret til pc med nyt indhold til historien, grafiske opgraderinger og meget mere.

Name: Killing Room
Summary: Rogue-like FPS with strong RPG elements set in a 22nd century reality-show parody. Win a fortune or die, but never disappoint your audience. And audience is virtual or real with revolutionary but optional features for streamers and their fans.

Name: KeeperRL
Summary: Ambitious dungeon simulator with roguelike and RPG elements. Take the role of an evil wizard and study the methods of black magic. Equip your minions and explore the world, murder innocent villagers and burn their homes. Build your dungeon, lay traps and prepare for an assault of angry heroes.

Name: Don't Knock Twice
Summary: Don't Knock Twice, er en første-persons horrorspil baseret på en psykologisk skræmmende vandrehistorie. For at redde hendes fremmedgjorte datter, skal en mor, plaget af dårlig samvittighed, afdække den skræmmende sandhed bag den urbane fortælling om en hævngerrig, dæmonisk heks.

Name: Visage
Summary: Visage is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore a mysterious ever-changing house in a slow-paced, atmospheric world that combines both uncannily comforting and horrifyingly realistic environments, and enjoy a genuinely terrifying experience.

Name: The Dark Occult
Summary: The Dark Occult is a psychological driven horror game that puts players in a constant state of anxiety that crescendos into raw panic and terror. You will encounter grotesque creatures, who will take your life at any moment.Your only goal -- survive.

Name: Them's Fightin' Herds
Summary: Them’s Fightin’ Herds is an indie fighting game featuring a cast of adorable animals designed by acclaimed cartoon producer Lauren Faust. Beneath the cute and cuddly surface, a serious fighter awaits!

Name: Little Nightmares
Summary: Dyk ned i Little Nightmares, en mørk lunefuld fortælling, hvor du konfronteres med din barndoms værste frygt! Hjælp Six med at undslippe The Maw – et enormt, mystisk fartøj fuld af fordærvede sjæle, der er på udkig efter det næste måltid ...

Name: Subsistence
Summary: Subsistence er et åben verdens, første person, solo eller co-op PvE overlevelses spil. Kæmp dig gennem sæsonnerne ved at bygge en base, udvikle teknologi og udrust dig i det fjendtlige miljø. Beskyt dig selv imod naturens kræfter, vildtet og fjendtlige jagere (som også bygger baser i verdenen).

Name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered
Summary: Den nye action-thriller fra det prisvindende team hos Infinity Ward, skaberne af Call of Duty®-serien, leverer den mest intense og filmiske actionoplevelse nogensinde. Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare udstyrer spillere med et arsenal af avancerede og kraftfulde moderne ildvåben og transporterer dem til de mest forræderiske brændpunkter...

Name: NieR: Automata
Summary: NieR: Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 and their battle to reclaim the machine-driven dystopia overrun by powerful machines.

Name: Domina
Summary: Acquire, train, upgrade, and whip your brutish gladiators towards bloody victory in the ruthless arenas of ancient Rome.

Name: Eternal Journey: New Atlantis
Summary: Solve the greatest archeological puzzle known to man: the origin of Atlantis!

Name: Minion Masters
Summary: An addictive fast-paced hybrid of Deckbuilding & Tower-Defense. Play 1v1 - or bring a friend for 2v2 - and engage in epic battles full of innovative strategies and smart plays! Collect 200+ cards with unique mechanics.

Name: TaleSpire
Summary: TaleSpire is a beautiful way to play pen and paper RPGs online. Bring your stories to life and embark upon campaigns together with your friends, regardless of where you are in the world.

Name: ARAYA
Summary: ARAYA is a first person horror game. Players will get a new thrilling experience inside a Thai hospital. The story will be told from the perspectives of 3 different characters. Players will explore different areas of the hospital in order to piece together the mysterious murder case of Araya.

Name: Quern - Undying Thoughts
Summary: Discover the truth about Quern’s past, unfold the mysteries of its present, and be the explorer who shapes its future. Quern introduces reusable puzzle mechanics to the classic genre, making the player think about the game as a whole, and not just as a series of individual challenges.

Name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links
Summary: Take on Duelists around the world with "Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links"! Step into a world that crosses dimensions and connects all Duelists. In Duel World, any location transforms into a Duel Field where heated Duels unfold!

Name: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite
Summary: Det episke sammenstød mellem to historiske universer er tilbage med Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite. Ultron Sigma har påbegyndt udryddelsen af alt biologisk liv. Mod alle odds står helte sammen over for den ultimative trussel, og deres eneste håb hviler på de kraftfulde Infinity Stones.

Name: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom
Summary: Tag med den unge kong Evan, når han drager ud på en episk mission for at grundlægge et nyt kongerige, og red dets indbyggere fra en forfærdelig ond skæbne ved at samle hans rige med hjælp fra nye venner.

Name: Arizona Sunshine
Summary: Built exclusively for VR, Arizona Sunshine® puts you and up to 3 fellow survivors in the midst of a zombie apocalypse. Survive solo or in co-op, handle weapons with real-life movements, and explore a post-apocalyptic world in VR. Putting the undead back to rest is more thrilling than ever before.

Name: Hand of Fate 2
Summary: En ny helt tager kampen op mod Kortgiveren i Hand of Fate 2 Lær at mestre et levende brætspil fyldt med missioner, som kan spilles igen og igen – få adgang til nye kort, sammensæt dit eventyr og slå dine modstandere ud i brutale kampe i realtid.

Name: theHunter: Call of the Wild
Summary: Der er mulighed for at opleve et atmosfærisk jagtspil ulig noget andet i denne realistiske og visuelt betagende åbne verden. Dyk ned i den atmosfæriske enkeltspillerkampagne, eller tag på den ultimative jagtoplevelse med vennerne.

Name: Wasteland 3
Summary: Following the critically acclaimed 2014 Game of the Year winner Wasteland 2, the RPG series that pioneered the post-apocalyptic genre in video games returns with Wasteland 3.

Name: Witch It
Summary: Witch It er et gemmelegsspil for flere spillere, iscenesat i en sjov, magisk verden. Tapre jægere har til opgave, at finde heksene, der kaster forbandelser over deres landsbyer!

Name: Deep Rock Galactic
Summary: Deep Rock Galactic is a 1-4 player co-op FPS featuring badass space Dwarves, 100% destructible environments, procedurally-generated caves, and endless hordes of alien monsters.

Name: RollerCoaster Tycoon Classic
Summary: Create incredible parks in the original rollercoaster sim from Chris Sawyer.

Name: Use Your Words
Summary: Use Your Words is the new party game for funny people and their unfunny friends! Laugh your way through four hilarious mini-games! Use your smartphone to fill in the blank, or try your luck using one of our answers to get laughs! No matter your strategy, Use Your Words brings comedy home!

Name: Snake Pass
Summary: Sno, bugt og kravl dig vej til toppen af Haven Tor i dette enestående, fysikbaserede platformseventyr fra det prisvindende, uafhængige udviklerstudie Sumo Digital!

Name: For The King
Summary: For The King is a strategic RPG that blends tabletop and roguelike elements in a challenging adventure that spans the realms. Set off on a single player experience or play cooperatively both online and locally.

Name: Raft
Summary: Raft throws you and your friends into an epic oceanic adventure! Alone or together, players battle to survive a perilous voyage across a vast sea! Gather debris, scavenge reefs and build your own floating home, but be wary of the man-eating sharks!

Name: Injustice 2
Summary: Skab den ultimative udgave af dine foretrukne DC-legender i INJUSTICE 2. Dette er din legende. Din rejse. Din Injustice.

Name: Octopath Traveler
Summary: Eight travelers. Eight adventures. Eight roles to play. Embark on an epic journey across the vast and wondrous world of Orsterra and discover the captivating stories of each of the eight travelers.

Name: Detention
Summary: Detention is an atmospheric horror game set in 1960s Taiwan under martial law. Incorporated religious elements based in Taiwanese/Chinese culture and mythology, the game provided players with unique graphics and gaming experience.

Name: State of Decay 2
Summary: The dead have risen and civilization has fallen. Now it's up to you to gather survivors, scavenge for resources and build a community in a post-apocalyptic world – a world where you define what it means to survive in this ultimate zombie survival simulation.

Name: Lost Ember
Summary: En underskøn verden bærer på fortidens hemmeligheden, som du og din ledsager skal opdage. Spil som hvert et dyr, du møder, for at se verdenen fra nye perspektiver, og jagt din skæbne i udforskningseventyret Lost Ember.

Name: Immortal Redneck
Summary: Immortal Redneck is a FPS set in Egypt with rogue-lite elements. Frantic gameplay, twitch controls and an arcade-style feel meet randomly generated dungeons, a complete skill tree, permanent death and 9 classes with different traits.

Name: Project CARS 2
Summary: DEN ULTIMATIVE KØRETUR Project CARS 2 er intens løbsaction i smukke biler og flotte omgivelser. Autentisk og intuitiv styring, ægte dynamisk vejr og et væld af spiltyper sørger for racersjov til alle.

Name: GreedFall
Summary: Engage in a core roleplaying experience, and forge the destiny of a new world seeping with magic, and filled with riches, lost secrets, and fantastic creatures. With diplomacy, deception and force, become part of a living, evolving world - influence its course and shape your story.

Name: Late Shift
Summary: Late Shift er et højspændt FMV krimi/thriller spil. Tvunget med i et brutalt London røveri, skal du selv vælge dit eget eventyr, i dette filmisk interaktive oplevelsesspil, med fleksible handlinger, der leder til en, ud af syv, forskellige afslutninger. Dine beslutninger er dig.

Name: Pictopix
Summary: Pictopix is a puzzle game where you use logic to color squares on grids in order to reveal pictures.

Name: We Were Here
Summary: Lost in a frozen wasteland and split up from your partner inside an abandoned castle, the only possession you have left is a walkie-talkie with a familiar voice on the other end. Can the two of you find your way out in time?

Name: SCUM
Summary: SCUM aims to evolve the multiplayer open world survival game with unprecedented levels of character customization, control and progression, where knowledge and skills are the ultimate weapons for long-term survival.

Name: Stories Untold
Summary: Stories Untold is a compilation tape of four experimental adventures, including a remaster of the original hit episode “The House Abandon”.

Name: X-Plane 11
Summary: The future of flight simulation is now! X-Plane 11 is the detailed, realistic, and modern simulator you’ve been waiting for. Intuitive user interface, 3-D cockpits, new effects, 3-D sound, living airports and world-wide scenery.

Name: Northgard
Summary: Northgard is a strategy game based on Norse mythology in which you control a clan of Vikings vying for the control of a mysterious newfound continent.

Name: Dead Cells
Summary: Dead Cells is a rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired, action-platformer. You'll explore a sprawling, ever-changing castle... assuming you’re able to fight your way past its keepers in 2D souls-lite combat. No checkpoints. Kill, die, learn, repeat.

Name: Middle-earth: Shadow of War
Summary: Oplev en åben verden, der bliver gjort levende af det prisvindende Nemesis-system. Smed en ny ring, indtag fæstninger i storslåede kampe, og hersk over Mordor med din egen hær af orker i Middle-earth™: Shadow of War™.

Name: The Escapists 2
Summary: Byg, stjæl, slås og bryd ud! Bryd ud af de barskeste fængsler i alle verdenerne, når du igen træder ind i rollen som indsat i The Escapists 2. Nu med multiplayer! Har du det, der skal til for at bryde ud?

Name: Wargroove
Summary: Take to the battlefield with Wargroove, a strategy game for up to 4 players! Choose your Commander and wage turn-based war on battling factions. Design and share maps, cut-scenes and campaigns with easy-to-use editors and in-depth customization tools!

Name: Dandara
Summary: I et bizart univers, hvor et undertrykt folk eksisterer på randen af udslettelse, er Dandara vågnet for at genrejse verden.

Name: Fire Pro Wrestling World
Summary: The greatest grappling game returns to take on the world! Customize every aspect of the match, from your wrestler to the ring itself, in your fight for the championship belt.

Name: Pavlov VR
Summary: Pavlov vr is a multiplayer shooter in VR with heavy focus on community features. Realistic reloading features and fast paced combat as part of the core experience. Play the #1 most popular VR shooter on PC today.

Name: Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid
Summary: Generations of Power Rangers collide across the multiverse’s 25 year history. Experience authentic, but reimagined Power Rangers gameplay. This easy to learn, but hard to master fighting game is designed to welcome players of all skill levels.

Name: Sonic Forces
Summary: The fate of Sonic the Hedgehog’s world is in your hands – Join the Uprising.

Name: Quake Champions
Summary: Quake® Champions is a fast-paced Arena shooter, a genre established by the original Quake 20 years ago. Mixing the dark mythos of Quake with the innovative multiplayer of Quake III Arena, the game adds a modern twist – Champions, each with unique attributes and abilities for players to master.

Name: PixArk
Summary: Velkommen til PixARK, en kæmpe, vild verden fyldt med onde dinosaurer, magiske skabelser og endeløs eventyr!

Name: Tales of Escape
Summary: "Tales of Escape" is a series of 6 person multiplayer escape room adventures for virtual reality or desktop pc! Gather your friends and choose a story to play!

Name: Bendy and the Ink Machine
Summary: "Bendy and the Ink Machine™" is the first person puzzle action horror game that will forever ruin your childhood love of cartoons.

Name: Majotori
Summary: How many lives will your ignorance ruin?

Name: Guilty Gear Xrd Rev 2
Summary: Astonishing 3D cell animations and overwhelming content volume, the next-generation fighting game "GUILTY GEAR Xrd -REVELATOR-" is now out on Steam! Total cast of 23 unique characters, and tons of game modes, get ready to ROCK!

Name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker
Summary: I skal kæmpe i hold af fire personer mod andre hold online! SHINOBI STRIKER er grafikmæssigt opbygget helt fra bunden med en helt nyt grafikstil. Du skal føre dit hold til sejr online, så I kan se, hvem der er de bedste ninjaer!

Name: Vinyl
Summary: Vinyl is a dynamic indie music game created by graduate students at the University of Utah EAE program, that experiments with the aesthetic distance between gameplay and music.

Name: Code Vein
Summary: Skab din egen Genganger, dan hold og begiv dig af sted på en rejse til helvedes ende for at oplåse din fortid og undslippe dit levende mareridt i CODE VEIN.

Name: Call of Duty: WWII
Summary: Call of Duty vender tilbage til rødderne i Call of Duty: WWII - en storslået oplevelse, der vil redefinere oplevelsen af anden verdenskrig for en ny generation af spillere.

Name: Barotrauma
Summary: Barotrauma er en co-op-ubådssimulator i 2D i rummet og har elementer af overlevelse og gys. Styr din ubåd, giv ordrer, bekæmp monstre, stop lækager, betjen maskineri, bemand våbnene, fremstil genstande og vær på vagt: Barotraumas farer afslører ikke sig selv!

Name: Forts
Summary: Forts is a physics-based RTS where foes design and build custom bases, arm them to the teeth and blast their opponent's creations to rubble.

Name: Stationeers
Summary: Stationeers puts you in control of the construction and management of a space station to run by yourself or online with your friends. Complex atmospheric, electrical, manufacturing, agriculture, and gravitational systems require your thought and management at all times!

Name: Slay the Spire
Summary: We fused card games and roguelikes together to make the best single player deckbuilder we could. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power, and Slay the Spire!

Name: Assassin's Creed: Origins
Summary: ASSASSIN’S CREED® ORIGINS ER EN NY BEGYNDELSE *The Discovery Tour by Assassin’s Creed®: Ancient Egypt er nu tilgængelig som en gratis opdatering!* Det gamle Egyptens majestætiske tidsalder er ved at forsvinde i en nådesløs magtkamp.

Name: Destiny 2
Summary: Destiny 2 er et action-MMO i en verden i evig udvikling, hvor du og dine venner kan spille helt gratis uanset tidspunkt og sted.

Name: Far Cry 5
Summary: Velkommen til Hope County , Montana — de frie og tapres land, men også hjemsted for en fanatisk dommedagskult kendt som Eden's Gate. Kæmp mod kultlederen Joseph Seed og hans søskende, The Heralds, for at starte en modstandsbevægelse.

Name: Life is Strange 2
Summary: After a tragic incident, brothers Sean and Daniel Diaz run away from home. Fearing the police, and dealing with Daniel's new telekinetic power, the boys head to Mexico. Each stop on their journey brings new friends and new challenges.

Name: The Crew 2
Summary: Kast dig ud i amerikansk motorsport for at dominere til lands, til vands og i luften – over hele USA. Der er mange forskellige biler, motorcykler, både og fly, som du kan bruge i mange forskellige udfordringer og discipliner.

Name: Old Man's Journey
Summary: Old Man’s Journey, a soul-searching puzzle adventure, tells a story of life, loss, and hope. Interacting with the world around you, you'll shape the landscape to create the old man's path forward. Experience heartache and hope as you embark on a heartfelt journey through a sunkissed world.

Name: Last Day of June
Summary: Et dybt, interaktivt eventyr om kærlighed og tab, der er smukt fortalt og leverer en intens filmisk oplevelse. Hvor langt ville du gå for at redde din elskede?

Name: Russian Fishing 4
Summary: Russian Fishing 4 is a fishing simulator with RPG elements. There is no story line and the whole process is based on the concept of an open, free to roam and free to play game.

Name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2018
Summary: 'Where Legends Are Made' er indbegrebet af PES, der er tilbage med et uovertruffet gameplay.

Name: Passpartout: The Starving Artist
Summary: Even you can become a great artist! Wrestle subjectivity as you attempt to sell your art to rude customers in order to progress in this confusing art scene. The only thing threatening you is your expensive wine and baguette addiction! Will your art end up in the Louvre or on your parents' fridge?

Name: Dragon Ball FighterZ
Summary: DRAGON BALL FighterZ er født af det, der gør DRAGON BALL-serien elsket og berømt: Spektakulære kampe med mægtige krigere. Arc System Works sørger for anime-grafik i topklasse til et spil, der er nemt at lære, men svært at mestre.

Name: Metro Exodus
Summary: Flygt fra de smuldrende ruiner i Moskvas Metro, og tag på en episk rejse på tværs af den postapokalyptiske russiske ødemark. Udforsk vidtstrakte, ikke-lineære niveauer, fortab dig i en medrivende overlevelsesøvelse, og følg en nervepirrende historie, der strækker sig over et helt år i det største Metro-eventyr til dato.

Name: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
Summary: Tag på et helt nyt eventyr for at finde frem til Oris skæbne i en omfattende og eksotisk verden med uhyrlige fjender og udfordrende gåder.

Name: Total War: Warhammer II
Summary: Strategy gaming perfected. A breath-taking campaign of exploration, expansion and conquest across a fantasy world. Turn-based civilisation management and real-time epic strategy battles with thousands of troops and monsters at your command.

Name: The Evil Within 2
Summary: Detective Sebastian Castellanos has lost everything, including his daughter, Lily. To save her, he must descend into the nightmarish world of STEM. Horrifying threats emerge from every corner, and he must rely on his wits to survive. For his one chance at redemption, the only way out is in.

Name: Hell Let Loose
Summary: Hell Let Loose er et realistisk førstepersonskydespil som foregår i anden verdenskrig med åbne slag af over 100 spillere med infanteri, kampvogne, artilleri og en frontlinje som hele tiden flytter sig. Centralt i spillet er et råstof-baseret, strategisk metaspil som er let at lære, men svært at mestre.

Name: Post Scriptum
Summary: Post Scriptum is a WW2 themed first-person tactical shooter that provides an authentic WWII combat experience. Focusing on historical accuracy, large scale battles and a challenging battlefield that demands an intense need for cohesion, communication and teamwork.

Name: Life is Strange: Before the Storm
Summary: Life is Strange: Before the Storm is a new three part standalone story adventure set three years before the events of the first game. This time play as Chloe Price, a rebel who forms an unlikely friendship with Rachel Amber in a dramatic new story in the BAFTA award winning franchise.

Name: Monster Hunter: World
Summary: Velkommen til en ny verden! I Monster Hunter: World, det seneste spil i serien, får du den ultimative jagtoplevelse, når du skal bruge alle dine redskaber til at jage monstre i en ny verden, der er fuld af overraskelser og spænding.

Name: A Plague Tale: Innocence
Summary: Follow the grim tale of young Amicia and her little brother Hugo, in a heartrending journey through the darkest hours of history.

Name: Unto The End
Summary: Unto The End er et håndskabt, filmisk platformsspil om en desperat hjemrejse. Lær at kæmpe ved hjælp af improvisation og observation i intense sværdkampe. Opdag muligheder for at bruge artefakter og handelsforsyninger. Et eventyr, der fortælles gennem dine handlinger – hvordan vil du nå hjem?

Name: Super Mega Baseball 2
Summary: The critically acclaimed Super Mega Baseball series is back with new visuals, deep team and league customization, and online multiplayer modes.

Name: Doki Doki Literature Club!
Summary: The Literature Club is full of cute girls! Will you write the way into their heart? This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

Name: Gold Rush: The Game
Summary: Become a gold miner. Work hard, dig deep, explore the world, and you’ll become the wealthiest person in Alaska. Use a variety of specialist machines to find as much gold as you can.

Name: Dream Daddy: A Dad Dating Simulator
Summary: Dream Daddy: A Dad Dating Simulator is a game where you play as a Dad and your goal is to meet and romance other hot Dads. Are you ready? Hi ready, I'm Dad.

Name: Graveyard Keeper
Summary: Build and manage a medieval graveyard while facing ethical dilemmas and making questionable decisions. Welcome to Graveyard Keeper, the most inaccurate medieval cemetery sim of the year.

Name: Derail Valley
Summary: Drive massive trains and build your career in a vast open railway network. For both PC and VR.

Name: LEGO Ninjago Movie Video Game
Summary: Opdag din indre ninja med det helt nye LEGO NINJAGO Movie Video Game! Spil som dine yndlingsninjaer for at forsvare Ninjago imod den onde Lord Garmadon. Lær Ninja-spændstigheds-kunsten med vægløbning og højdespringning, og nedkæmp fjender for at stige i graderne og forbedre ninjaens kampfærdigheder.

Name: Moonlighter
Summary: Moonlighter is an Action RPG with rogue-lite elements that demonstrates two sides of the coin – revealing everyday routines of Will, an adventurous shopkeeper that secretly dreams of becoming a hero.

Name: Yomawari: Midnight Shadows
Summary: The dark is no place to be alone. After a beautiful show of summer fireworks, two young girls begin to make their way home. However, a mysterious attacker separates them, and both must brave the haunting night filled with unspeakable terrors and survive the darkness.

Name: Business Tour
Summary: "Business Tour" is a free to play multiplayer tabletop game. Play with up to 3 friends in online mode. Or single player in offline mode. Complete daily tasks, compete against the other players and receive trade items rewards!

Name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle
Summary: THE COLLISION IS INEVITABLE! THE IMPACT WILL BE UNAVOIDABLE! Cross over between 4 different universes! Play as characters from the BlazBlue, Persona, Under Night In-Birth, and (for the first time ever in a fighting game), RWBY series!

Name: Fighting EX Layer
Summary: After a long wait, Arika's EX characters gather once again for another exciting battle! Kairi, Skullomania, Blaire, Pullum and the others are all back with the latest graphics. And this time they're bringing a brand new system - the "Gougi System". Grasp victory with Gougi!

Name: My Time at Portia
Summary: Begynd et nyt liv i den fortryllende by Portia! Før din fars gamle værksted tilbage til dets storhedstid ved at udføre bestillingsarbejde, dyrke afgrøder, avle dyr og blive venner med de spøjse indbyggere i det charmerende postapokalyptiske land.

Name: The Walking Dead: The Final Season
Summary: A secluded school might finally be Clementine’s chance for a home, but protecting it will mean sacrifice.

Name: The Letter
Summary: When seven people fall prey to a vicious curse, they will discover that horror rests not from the shadows lurking about, but within themselves. To what ends will one go in order to survive?

Name: House Flipper
Summary: House Flipper is a unique chance to become a one-man renovation crew. Buy, repair and remodel devastated houses. Give them a second life and sell them at a profit!

Name: Hobo: Tough Life
Summary: Hobo: Tough Life is an urban survival role-playing game where you play as a homeless person. Play alone or team up in online co-op. Explore the streets of Praslav, scavenge for food and supplies, beg, steal, and do whatever else it takes to survive the forthcoming winter.

Name: The Darkside Detective
Summary: Grab your trench coat, tune your sixth sense and join the Darkside Division as they investigate the outright bizarre, the downright dangerous and the confusing cases of Twin Lakes. Flesh-hungry tentacles, mafian zombies, and the occasional missing sock are no match for The Darkside Detective.

Name: Dragon Quest Builders 2
Summary: DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS™ 2 is a block-building RPG set in a fantasy land threatened by an evil cult. Explore, battle, build and harvest in the charming single-player campaign or build big projects in the online sandbox mode for up to 4-players.

Name: SINNER: Sacrifice for Redemption
Summary: Sinner: Sacrifice for Redemption is a boss battler action-RPG. Face eight abhorrent bosses, the first seven each based on one of the deadly sins. Before each epic clash, you must sacrifice a stat and level down to enter combat. Each fight will be tougher than the last as you wage war against sin itself.

Name: CarX Drift Racing Online
Summary: CarX Drift Racing Online is your chance to immerse yourself in the real world of drifting. Get together with friends, tune your car and burn some tires!

Name: Evil Genius 2: World Domination
Summary: A satirical spy-fi lair builder where YOU are the criminal mastermind! Construct your base, train your minions, defend your operations from the Forces of Justice, and achieve global domination!

Name: The First Tree
Summary: A beautiful, 3rd-person exploration game centered around two parallel stories: a fox trying to find her missing family, and a son reconnecting with his estranged father in Alaska. Uncover artifacts from the son's life as he becomes intertwined in the fox’s journey towards The First Tree.

Name: Rusty Lake Paradise
Summary: Rusty Lake Paradise foregår på en lille, fjerntliggende ø, som er forbandet med Egyptens ti plager. Løs alle mysterierne i dette makabre gådeeventyr. Paradise har atmosfæren og spændingen fra resten af Rusty Lake-serien.

Name: Staxel
Summary: Grow your farm, meet the villagers, and join your friends online in building your world.

Name: Ken Follett's: The Pillars of the Earth
Summary: 12. århundrede, England: I en tid med fattigdom og krig, begynder en lille by opførelsen af en katedral, for at skabe rigdom og sikkerhed for dens indbyggere. I deres kamp for overlevelse, sammenslynges liv og skæbner. Et spil baseret på Ken Folletts bestseller, »Jordens søjler«.

Name: Iron Harvest
Summary: A classic real-time strategy game with an epic single player campaign, multiplayer & coop, set in the alternate reality of 1920+

Name: 99Vidas
Summary: "99Vidas" is a "beat 'em up" set in a contemporary world that pays tribute to both the new and the classic in gaming industry. Brought to you in all pixelated, 16 bit-esque glory, chockfull of references to not only gaming, but all 80's and 90's pop culture.

Name: Attack on Titan 2
Summary: Glem din frygt. A.O.T. 2 er den fængslende fortsættelse af actionspillet baseret på den internationale anime-hitserie "Attack on Titan".

Name: Jurassic World Evolution
Summary: Place yourself at the heart of the Jurassic franchise and build your own Jurassic World. Bioengineer dinosaurs that think, feel and react intelligently to the world around them and face threats posed by espionage, breakouts and devastating tropical storms in an uncertain world where life always finds a way.

Name: Raji: An Ancient Epic
Summary: Raji: An Ancient Epic er et actioneventyrspil som finder sted i oldtidens Indien. En ung pige ved navn Raji er udvalgt af guderne til at bekæmpe den dæmoniske invasion af menneskeriget. Hendes skæbne? At redde sin lillebror og stå op imod dæmonherren, Mahabalasura.

Name: Industries of Titan
Summary: Create a sprawling industrial city. Compete with the other rival corporations of Titan for resources, territory, and power. Do battle with ships, technology, influence, or the sheer productive power of your factories. Stake your claim to the Industries of Titan in this innovative sim/strategy game!

Name: Conqueror's Blade
Summary: Master the art of medieval warcraft in this free-to-play tactical action MMO. Create a unique warlord from 11 different classes, and wage war in epic 15 v 15 siege battles. Employ special abilities, devastating weapons, and cunning strategies to reshape this vast open world into your new empire.

Name: Anno 1800
Summary: Du kan lede den industrielle revolution i Anno 1800™! Oplev en af historiens mest spændende og foranderlige tidsperioder. Opdag nye teknologier, kontinenter og samfund. Byg en ny verden i dit billede!

Name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
Summary: Fortsættelsen til det anmelderroste Vermintide er et visuelt storslået og banebrydende nærkampspil, som flytter grænserne for førstepersons-samarbejdsspil. Tag del i kampen nu!

Name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill
Summary: Just you and your bike - take it on a thrilling ride down an unspoiled mountain landscape. Make your way through thick forests, narrow trails and wild rivers. Race, jump, slide and try not to crash - all the way from the peak to the valley!

Name: SCP: Secret Laboratory
Summary: Deep within the SCP Foundation during a containment breach, many of the anomalies have bypassed security and escaped from their chambers - without peaceful intentions. Become site personnel, a re-containment agent, or an anomalous entity and fight to take control of or escape the facility!

Name: Don't Escape: 4 Days to Survive
Summary: Survive through four days at the end of the world in this post-apocalyptic point-and-click thriller where your choices could keep you alive... or not.

Name: Rise of Insanity
Summary: In Rise of Insanity, as a doctor of psychology you will explore the darkest recesses of the human mind. Overcome your fear to find the truth behind the tragedy that has befallen your family.

Name: X4: Foundations
Summary: X4: FOUNDATIONS brings our most sophisticated universe SIMULATION ever. Fly every ship, EXPLORE space or manage an empire; TRADE, FIGHT, BUILD and THINK carefully, while you embark on an epic journey. Experience new features and improvements with the massive 4.0 Update!

Name: MORDHAU
Summary: MORDHAU is a multiplayer medieval slasher. Create your mercenary and fight in brutal battles where you will experience fast paced combat, castle sieges, cavalry charges, and more.

Name: Dungeons 3
Summary: At last, the Dungeon Lord has successfully united the forces of evil and established his dark empire. Time for the next step in his most diabolical quest: expansion!

Name: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms
Summary: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms is a Dungeons & Dragons strategy video game that brings together D&D characters from novels, adventures, and multiple live streams into a single grand adventure.

Name: Beast Battle Simulator
Summary: Beast Battle Simulator is a physics based battle-simulation sandbox game featuring dinosaurs, animals, and humans. Kamikaze Zebras VS. T-Rex with laser guns, Lions VS. medieval knights; anything is possible! Watch as the beasts dismember and rip each other apart in gory detail!

Name: VRChat
Summary: Join our growing community as you explore, play, and help craft the future of social VR. Create worlds and custom avatars. Welcome to VRChat.

Name: They Are Billions
Summary: They Are Billions is a Steampunk strategy game set on a post-apocalyptic planet. Build and defend colonies to survive against the billions of the infected that seek to annihilate the few remaining living humans. Can humanity survive after the zombie apocalypse?

Name: We. The Revolution
Summary: As a judge of the Revolutionary Tribunal, preside over complicated cases of ordinary citizens, dangerous criminals, and enemies of the revolution in revolutionary Paris. Make judgments, plot political intrigue, and try to not lose your own head!

Name: Splitgate: Arena Warfare
Summary: Splitgate: Arena Warfare is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter that uses player-controlled portals to create a new dimension of arena combat. IGN describes Splitgate as “Halo meets Portal.

Name: Schlag den Star
Summary: Nach SCHLAG DEN RAAB kommt SCHLAG DEN STAR! Du und bis zu 3 Deiner Freunde treten in 25 Minigames gegeneinander an. Zeige allen, dass Du nicht nur über das größte Allgemeinwissen verfügst, sondern auch Geschicklichkeit und ein gutes Gedächtnis hast. Schlägst du alle Stars?

Name: Stick Fight: The Game
Summary: Stick Fight is a physics-based couch/online fighting game where you battle it out as the iconic stick figures from the golden age of the internet.

Name: Getting Over It
Summary: A game I made for a certain kind of person. To hurt them.

Name: Welcome to the Game II
Summary: Welcome to the Game II is an atmospheric horror / strategy / puzzle game that takes you into the world of the deep web in search of the shadow web. Play as an investigative reporter trying to solve a case of a mysterious woman broadcasting for help as masked men are on the hunt to kill her.

Name: Untitled Goose Game
Summary: Det er en dejlig dag i landsbyen, og du er en uartig gås.

Name: Bomber Crew
Summary: Chocks away! Bomber Crew is a strategic simulation game, where picking the right crew and keeping your bomber in tip top shape is the difference between completing your mission or losing it all! USAAF DLC NOW AVAILABLE! FLY THE ICONIC AMERICAN BOMBER!

Name: Will To Live Online
Summary: Will To Live is a MMORPG-shooter whose action takes place in a severe post-apocalyptic world. Explore the world, engage in fights with mutants and other survivors, join the clans in the struggle for existence and prove your right to Live.

Name: Escape The Pacific
Summary: You're on your own in the most advanced and complex survival game to date. Discover the cluster based endless world and face the most challenging weather system taken from the real Pacific! Master the realistic sailing and navigate using triangulation and a Sextant. Protect your fire. Fight for your life.

Name: FAITH
Summary: What you are about to do has not been approved by the Vatican. As a young priest, struggle against demons, insane cultists, and your own weakening faith in this pixel horror game inspired by the era of classic 8-bit gaming and the "Satanic Scare" of the 1980s.

Name: Ostriv
Summary: Ostriv is a city-building game that puts you in a role of a governor of an 18th century Ukrainian town to challenge your creative skills and management abilities.

Name: It's Quiz Time
Summary: Test dig selv i det STØRSTE spil om paratviden på PC ... nogensinde! Med vores skøre AI-spilvært, Salli, kan du prøve dig på It's Quiz Time's katalog med mere end 25.000 spørgsmål. Spil mod op til 8 spillere på din smartphone, spil solo, eller stream og spil med et publikum i Live Show-tilstand.

Name: The House of da Vinci
Summary: Enter The House of Da Vinci, a new must-try 3D puzzle adventure game. Solve mechanical puzzles, discover hidden objects, escape from rooms and dive into the authentic atmosphere of the Renaissance. Use all your wits to find out what's behind your master's disappearance.

Name: KARDS: The WWII Card Game
Summary: KARDS, The World War II Card Game, combines traditional CCG gameplay with innovative mechanics inspired by classic strategy games and real battlefield tactics. Take command and challenge other players in grand-scale warfare on the ground, air, or seas.

Name: Forager
Summary: The highly popular and quirky "idle game that you want to actively keep playing". Explore, craft, gather & manage resources, find secrets and build your base out of nothing! Buy land to explore and expand!

Name: SIMULACRA
Summary: An interactive horror experience of exploring a missing woman’s phone.

Name: Tilt Brush
Summary: Tilt Brush lets you paint in 3D space with virtual reality. Unleash your creativity with three-dimensional brush strokes, stars, light, and even fire. Your room is your canvas. Your palette is your imagination. The possibilities are endless.

Name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV
Summary: The long awaited finale to the epic engulfing a continent comes to a head in the final chapter of the Trails of Cold Steel saga!

Name: Hunt: Showdown
Summary: Hunt: Showdown er et nervepirrende, high-stakes PvPvE-skydespil i førsteperson. Jagt mareridtsagtige monstre, mens du kæmper om dusører, der vil give dig hæder, udstyr og guld, i denne ubarmhjertige – og uforglemmelige – online multiplayeroplevelse.

Name: Hand Simulator
Summary: There are many different levels where you can play with spinners, plunge into the subtleties of handling weapons, milk a cow, take part in a Mexican duel with your friends, have a good time fishing, play chess or simply chat in an anonymous club.

Name: Slasher's Keep
Summary: Hack, slash, shoot and loot your way through procedurally generated dungeons! Smack your enemies into spikes with your inventory sack!

Name: MX Bikes
Summary: MX Bikes is a realistic motocross simulator, based on a scratch built physics engine that accurately simulates motorcycle dynamics and setup options.

Name: SoulCalibur VI
Summary: Tag mere end bare dine næver med til kampen! SOULCALIBUR VI har en helt ny kampmekanik og nye figurer, hvilket markerer en ny æra i seriens historie. Velkommen til scenen, hvor historien bliver til!

Name: GTFO
Summary: GTFO is a hardcore 4 player cooperative first-person shooter, with a focus on team play and atmosphere. It features edge-of-your-seat suspense, team-based puzzle-solving and high-intensity combat.

Name: Sleeping Dawn
Summary: Join into this confusing procedural maze. Lose yourself... is the only way to get out. Sleeping Dawn is a survival horror cooperative game up to 4 players. Join your friends, cooperate with them, make quick choices and... RUN. What really matters is not falling asleep: it's your last chance.

Name: Anna's Quest
Summary: Hun klarer sig lige fra Glasbjergenes tinder til de dybeste kældre med telekinese, uortodoks brug af torturinstrumenter, flair for at improvisere og hjælp fra en lumsk ræv.

Name: Mount Your Friends 3D: A Hard Man is Good to Climb
Summary: Join in the great simulated sportslike experience of friend mounting! Assemble a team and climb your way to the top! Mount Your Friends 3D brings mounting to the third dimension, with the same classic innuendo that made you slightly uncomfortable back in the day.

Name: Bud Spencer & Terence Hill: Slaps And Beans
Summary: Bud Spencer og Terence Hill i deres første virtuelle eventyr. Slaps And Beans er et co-op eller singleplayer side-scrolling beat 'em up-spil med tilføjelser i form af platformelementer og minispil, hvor du tager rollen som Bud Spencer og Terence Hill.

Name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War
Summary: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius – Relics of War brings you to a world of terror and violence. Four factions will engage in a brutal war for dominance over the planet’s resources. In the first turn-based 4X strategy game set in Warhammer 40,000 you will lead one of four unique factions.

Name: The Council
Summary: Experience a Narrative Adventure where your choices and character growth truly matter. As a member of a 1793 secret society, live a tale of intrigue and manipulation on the hunt for your missing mother.

Name: Surviving Mars
Summary: There will be challenges to overcome. Execute your strategy and improve your colony’s chances of survival while unlocking the mysteries of this alien world. Are you ready? Mars is waiting for you.

Name: UnderMine
Summary: An action-adventure roguelike with a bit of RPG tossed in. Adventure deep into the UnderMine and discover powerful relics, deadly enemies, hidden secrets, and a few friends to help along the way.

Name: Total War: Three Kingdoms
Summary: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS is the first in the award-winning series to recreate epic conflict across ancient China. Combining a gripping turn-based campaign of empire-building & conquest with stunning real-time battles, THREE KINGDOMS redefines the series in an age of heroes & legends.

Name: Entertainment Hero
Summary: Eight Stages of Run and Gun Action Leading to the Final Boss! Choose Different Paths on Different Play Throughs! Search for the Secrets Hidden in the Different Lands!

Name: Blasphemous
Summary: Blasphemous er et brutalt action-platformspil med krævende hug og hak-kamp i mareridtsverdenen Cvstodia. Udforsk, opgradér dine evner, og brug voldsomme henrettelser på horder af fjender, der står mellem dig og dit mål om at bryde fri af evig fordømmelse.

Name: Two Point Hospital
Summary: Design stunning hospitals, cure peculiar illnesses and manage troublesome staff as you spread your budding healthcare organisation across Two Point County.

Name: Beat Saber
Summary: Beat Saber is a VR rhythm game where you slash the beats of adrenaline-pumping music as they fly towards you, surrounded by a futuristic world.

Name: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
Summary: Et galaktisk eventyr venter i STAR WARS Jedi: Fallen Order, et action-eventyr i tredjeperson fra Respawn Entertainment. En efterladt padawan må gennemføre sin træning, udvikle nye, mægtige kraft-evner og mestre lyssværdets kunst, altsammen med Imperiet lige i hælene.

Name: Aim Lab
Summary: Den ultimative løsning til FPS/TPS-træning: Aim Lab blander topmoderne sporing af præstationer og analysedata med maskinlæring, så du kan blive bedre endnu hurtigere.

Name: Last Epoch
Summary: Last Epoch combines time travel, exciting dungeon crawling, engrossing character customization and endless replayability to create an Action RPG for veterans and newcomers alike.

Name: Florence
Summary: Florence Yeoh er 25 og sidder lidt fast. Hendes liv er en endeløs rutine med arbejde, søvn og alt for meget tid på sociale medier. En dag møder hun cellisten Krish, som ændrer hele hendes verdensbillede.

Name: Farm Together
Summary: Dyrk din egen gård helt alene eller samarbejde med dine venner i denne unikke, afslappende landbrugsoplevelse!

Name: ACT IT OUT XL! A Game of Charades
Summary: ACT IT OUT XL is an interactive streaming game designed to be played with your viewers on Twitch, choose from almost 3,000 secret phrases to act out from multiple categories including film, music and video games. More than just acting, you can even sing, draw or describe the hidden phrases!

Name: Yuppie Psycho
Summary: Join Brian Pasternack on his first working day at Sintracorp. Uncertain, unprepared, and massively unqualified, will Pasternack have what it takes to shine in Sintracorp’s hierarchy? It all depends on how he performs on his first assignment… and whether he survives it.

Name: The Beast Inside
Summary: The Beast Inside is a unique, gripping twist on thriller and survival horror. Immerse in the story of long-buried secrets, personal tragedies, and madness. Play as two protagonists bounded by dark heritage. Combat the enemies, solve riddles and experience real terror in the 3D-scanned environment.

Name: Rhythm Doctor
Summary: Save patients with your rhythm mastery! Rhythm Doctor is a rhythm game where you heal patients by defibrillating in time to their heartbeats. Learn each patient's unique heartbeat and defeat boss viruses trying to sabotage your rhythm, all set to heart-pumping, soul-soothing music.

Name: Disco Elysium
Summary: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is a groundbreaking role playing game. You’re a detective with a unique skill system at your disposal and a whole city to carve your path across. Interrogate unforgettable characters, crack murders or take bribes. Become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being.

Name: AMID EVIL
Summary: A retro FPS for the ages! Once branded a HERETIC. Now YOU have been chosen as our champion! Reclaim our sacred weapons. Take back our ancient lands. If you can stand... AMID EVIL.

Name: Farming Simulator 19
Summary: The best-selling franchise takes a giant leap forward with a complete overhaul of the graphics engine, offering the most striking and immersive visuals and effects, along with the deepest and most complete farming experience ever.

Name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider
Summary: As Lara Croft races to save the world from a Maya apocalypse, she must become the Tomb Raider she is destined to be.

Name: Ring Of Elysium
Summary: Escape an astonishing disaster in Ring of Elysium, a battle royale shooter developed by Aurora Studio.

Name: Baba is You
Summary: Baba Is You is a puzzle game where the rules you have to follow are present as blocks you can interact with. By manipulating them, you can change how the game works, repurpose things you find in the levels and cause surprising interactions!

Name: Blazing Chrome
Summary: I Blazing Chrome er maskiner herskere over verden, og de få mennesker der er tilbage, er på randen af total udryddelse, mangler styrke overfor deres metalherskere.

Name: Arcanium
Summary: Arcanium is an ambitious Open-world, Single-player Strategy Card Adventure that merges “Roguelike” & “Deckbuilding” genres in many new & exciting ways. Control a party of three Heroes on their treacherous journey to save the world of Arzu from destruction.

Name: AFFECTED: The Manor
Summary: Only the brave may enter! Experience horror unlike anything you’ve known before as you try to escape The Manor. Terror lurks around every corner as you venture deeper into the abandoned house and find that the only thing keeping you alive is your sanity. Or lack thereof...

Name: Granny
Summary: You have to escape Granny`s house...You have five days...

Name: OMORI
Summary: Explore a strange world full of colorful friends and foes. When the time comes, the path you’ve chosen will determine your fate... and perhaps the fate of others as well.

Name: Realm Royale
Summary: Be the last Champion standing in Realm Royale! Loot deadly weapons and powerful abilities to create your own Champion. Explore a fantasy world from horseback while outrunning the deadly fog. Can you survive the first 100-person fantasy Battle Royale?

Name: RAGE 2
Summary: RAGE 2 brings together two studio powerhouses – Avalanche Studios, masters of open world insanity, and id Software, creators of the first-person shooter – to deliver a carnival of carnage where you can go anywhere, shoot anything, and explode everything.

Name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2019
Summary: Feel The Power Of Football med PES 2019 og få nye licenser, fotorealisme og ny myClub!

Name: Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon
Summary: Battle with swords and whips in this retro-style action game brought to you by game creator Koji Igarashi and Inti Creates! Play as Zangetsu, a demon slayer bearing a deep grudge, who must travel through perilous lands to defeat a powerful demon lurking in a dark castle.

Name: SoulWorker
Summary: SoulWorker, gratis-at-spille anime action MMO, kombinerer hurtige kombinationer med en ægte anime følelse. Du får brug for fremragende reaktionsevner og præcis timing for at slå de nådesløse skabninger i denne post-apokalyptiske verden.

Name: Green Hell
Summary: Green Hell is a sweltering struggle for survival in the Amazonian rainforest. Clinging to life, the player is set on a journey of durability as the effects of solitude wear heavy not only on the body but also the mind. How long can you survive against the dangers of the unknown?

Name: Rolling Line
Summary: Build your own model railway tracks and scenery or explore pre-made layouts, including 1000s of player-made layouts on the Steam Workshop! Play in virtual reality and on PC!

Name: Creed: Rise to Glory
Summary: You are Adonis Creed, fighting toe-to-toe with the world’s top opponents to establish your boxing legacy. This intense cinematic experience features new Phantom Melee Technology for impactful VR melee combat so you can train, fight, and win like Creed.

Name: Fallout 76
Summary: Steel Dawn er det første kapitel i den nye Brotherhood of Steel-historie – gratis for Fallout 76-spillere. Paladineren Leila Rahmani og hendes tropper er ankommet fra Californien for at etablere en ny afdeling i Appalacherne. Du kan arbejde med eller mod andre fraktioner for at nå dine mål.

Name: LEGO DC Super-Villains
Summary: Det er godt at være slem … Begiv dig ud på et helt nyt DC/LEGO®-eventyr ved at blive den bedste skurk, universet har set. Spillere kan skabe og spille som en helt ny superskurk igennem hele spillet, udføre skurkagtige handlinger og sprede kaos i en action-fyldt historie.

Name: The Blackout Club
Summary: The Blackout Club is a first-person co-op horror game centered around a group of teenage friends investigating a monstrous secret beneath the skin of their small town. 1-4 players explore procedurally-generated missions against a fearsome enemy you can only see with your eyes closed.

Name: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey
Summary: Tag magten over din skæbne i Assassin's Creed® Odyssey. Udvikl dig fra udskud til levende legende på en rejse for at afsløre din fortids hemmeligheder og ændre det antikke Grækenlands skæbne.

Name: Totally Accurate Battlegrounds
Summary: Grab your balloon crossbow and trusty inflatable hammer, because things are about to get wobbly! Be the last weirdo standing in the world-leading physics-based Battle Royale game.

Name: Dead or Alive 6
Summary: DEAD OR ALIVE 6 is fast-paced 3D fighting game, produced by Koei Tecmo Games, featuring stunning graphics and multi-tiered stages that create a truly entertaining competitive experience.

Name: Gears 5
Summary: Vis Gears-heltene din respekt i Operation 6 – ude nu. Gå i kamp med fem nye figurer, to ny multiplayer-baner, opdateret Tour of Duty og meget mere.

Name: Jump Force
Summary: Skab din egen avatar til at kæmpe side om side med mægtige Manga-helte i original Story-mode, eller skynd dig til onlinelobbyen for at udfordre andre spillere og se flere aktiviteter.

Name: Devil May Cry 5
Summary: Den ultimative Devil Hunter er igen moderne i det spil, som actionfans har ventet på.

Name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
Summary: Årets spil - The Game Awards 2019 Bedste actionspil i 2019 - IGN Find din egen sindrige vej til hævn i det prisvindende eventyr fra FromSoftware, skaberne af Bloodborne og Dark Souls. Tag hævn. Genopret din ære. Dræb på snedig vis.

Name: Trials Rising
Summary: Udforsk vild action og motorcykelræs, der trodser fysikkens love, i Trials-seriens seneste opus. Med nye baner eksotiske steder verden over og flere måder at konkurrere på tilbyder Trials® Rising den bedste raceroplevelse til multiplayer.

Name: DOOM Eternal
Summary: Helvedes hærskarer har invaderet Jorden. Du er Slayeren i en episk enkeltspillerkampagne, hvor du skal nedlægge dæmoner på tværs af dimensionerne og forhindre menneskehedens undergang. Det eneste, de frygter ... er dig.

Name: Maneater
Summary: Experience the ultimate power fantasy as the apex predator of the seas - a giant Shark! Terrorize the coastal waterways. Tear swimmers and divers limb from limb, give the humans a reason to fear you!

Name: Satisfactory
Summary: Satisfactory is a first-person open-world factory building game with a dash of exploration and combat. Play alone or with friends, explore an alien planet, create multi-story factories, and enter conveyor belt heaven!

Name: Overcooked! 2
Summary: Overcooked vender tilbage med en ny portion kaotisk kogekunst! Vend tilbage til Løgland og sammensæt dit hold af kokke til et klassisk samarbejdsspil på sofaen eller onlinespil for op til fire spillere, Hold på hat og forklæder ... det er tid til at redde verden (igen!

Name: Bomb Chicken
Summary: After a freak accident, a seemingly ordinary chicken becomes a bomb laying free range hero. Explore the versatile mechanic of laying bombs in this explosive exploration platformer.

Name: Control
Summary: Winner of over 80 awards, Control is a visually stunning third-person action-adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Name: The Free Ones
Summary: Follow Theo's dizzying adventure in first-person platformer "The Free Ones". Soar through the air with your grapple, blaze a trail through the canyons and take part in an extraordinary story.

Name: Puppet Fever
Summary: Act like a freak, play with your friends and discover the magic of the virtual puppet theater! This is hot seat multiplayer in VR like you’ve never experienced before. Social party game for up to 4 players locally, or many more on live stream!

Name: CRSED: F.O.A.D.
Summary: CRSED: F.O.A.D. – is a brutal MMO last-man-standing shooter with realistic weaponry, elements of lethal mystic forces and incredible superpowers!

Name: Luckslinger
Summary: In Luckslinger, luck is measurable, collectable and usable whenever you please. Contains: gunslingers, dark humor, spaghetti western, vinyl digging, graffiti spraying and jazzy hip hop beats.

Name: WWE 2K19
Summary: WWE 2K19 vender tilbage som det mest prominente WWE-spil med forside-Superstar AJ Styles! Oplev masser af tilpasningsmuligheder, kamptyper og meget mere!

Name: Bloons TD 6
Summary: Fedt tårn-forsvars spil

Name: Imperator: Rome
Summary: Imperator: Rome is the newest grand strategy title from Paradox Development Studio. Set in the tumultuous centuries from Alexander’s Successor Empires in the East to the foundation of the Roman Empire.

Name: Tourist Bus Simulator
Summary: Create your own bus empire on Fuerteventura now! Thanks to the economy system in the new Tourist Bus Simulator, you will be able to found your own bus company on the popular holiday island Fuerteventura.

Name: Clue/Cluedo: The Classic Mystery Game
Summary: CLUE/CLUEDO is the classic mystery game - a grand mansion … a dastardly murder … a gathering of suspicious characters.WHO, with WHAT weapon and WHERE? Play against friends in multiplayer! Get the official version of the beloved Hasbro family board game, and crack the case!

Name: Live
Summary: No one ever said that life is easy. Fight your way through it in a short story-driven mix of game genres that accompany your journey from childhood to senility. What challenges will you stand up against? Will you earn what should be yours? Will you find out what it means to Live?

Name: Valheim
Summary: A brutal exploration and survival game for 1-10 players, set in a procedurally-generated purgatory inspired by viking culture. Battle, build, and conquer your way to a saga worthy of Odin’s patronage!

Name: PHOGS!
Summary: I PHOGS! spiller du som en duo af hunde i et fængslende, gådefyldt eventyr. Mens dine to halvdele er bundet sammen af en elastisk mave, skal du gø, bide og hoppe dig forbi forhindringer i de temabaserede verdener – Mad, Søvn og Leg – i enten co-op eller singleplayer.

Name: The Spiral Scouts
Summary: Join Remae, the newest member of the Spiral Scouts, on her slap-tastic puzzle solving adventure through a world of crazy characters and redonkulous realms. Experience a fartwarming tale of personal growth, self discovery, poop, wieners and butts.

Name: Muse Dash
Summary: Play as characteristic Heroines, Dash through fairy tale like stages, Dancing to the rhythm and beats, Kick those silly cute enemies into outer space!

Name: Little Misfortune
Summary: Led by her new friend, Mr. Voice, Misfortune ventures into the woods, where mysteries are unraveled and a little bad luck unfolds.

Name: Dicey Dungeons
Summary: Fighting against fortune would be a lot easier if you weren't a walking dice.

Name: EXAPUNKS
Summary: The year is 1997. You used to be a hacker, but now you have the phage. You made a deal: one hack, one dose. There’s nothing left to lose… except your life.

Name: Garden Paws
Summary: You have inherited your grandparents farm as they set off to travel the world. Work with Frank at the local construction shop to finish off the final touches on your new home. Aid Frank and Mayor Wilson in building up the town so it may reach it's full potential.

Name: Eximius: Seize the Frontline
Summary: EXIMIUS is a FPS/RTS hybrid that focuses on squad-based combat. The game features an intense 5v5 multiplayer experience with each team comprising of 4 Squad Officers and one Commander.

Name: Synth Riders
Summary: Synth Riders is a freestyle dancing VR rhythm alternative with official custom song support. Lose yourself in the incredible music, meet friends in the multiplayer, and get a good workout in the process!

Name: Skybolt Zack
Summary: Skybolt Zack is a brand new fast-paced arcade gaming experience! With his Rocket Punches Zack leaps from enemy to enemy, destroying anything standing in his way! Match the colour of the enemies with the buttons on the gamepad to rid the world of Dr Kaz’s robot army!

Name: Gloomhaven
Summary: Whether you are drawn to Gloomhaven by the call of adventure or by an avid desire for gold glimmering in the dark, your fate will surely be the same. Gloomhaven, the digital adaptation of the acclaimed board game, mixes Tactical-RPG and dungeon-crawling.

Name: Secret Neighbor
Summary: Hello Neighbor Multiplayer. Secret Neighbor is a Multiplayer Social Horror Game where a group of intruders try to rescue their friend from the Neighbor's creepy basement. Only problem is one of the intruders is the Neighbor in disguise.

Name: Remnant: From the Ashes
Summary: The world has been thrown into chaos by an ancient evil from another dimension. As one of the last remnants of humanity, you must set out alone or alongside up to two other survivors to face down hordes of deadly enemies to try to carve a foothold, rebuild, and retake what was lost.

Name: Cube Escape: Paradox
Summary: Paradox er en blanding af et Cube Escape-spil og en Rusty Lake-kortfilm! I denne unikke crossover er du en kommissær der må flygte fra et dystert rum i et...

Name: Eastshade
Summary: You are a traveling painter, exploring the island of Eastshade. Capture the world on canvas using your artist’s easel. Talk to the inhabitants to learn about their lives. Make friends and help those in need. Visit cities, scale summits, unearth mysteries, and discover forgotten places!

Name: Risk of Rain 2
Summary: Kæmp mod horder af blodtørstige monstre, mens du forsøger at flygte fra en livsfarlig planet – med dine venner eller på egen hånd. Du kan kombinere ting, du finder, på overraskende måder, mens du øver dig i at mestre hver af spillets figurer, så du kan blive ligeså dødbringende, som de monstre du frygtede i begyndelsen.

Name: Dead Frontier 2
Summary: Online survival horror at its darkest. As one of the few survivors of the outbreak, you must scratch a living out of the decaying ruins of society. Scavenge for supplies, improve your skills, and trade with other players. All the while, keeping your eyes peeled for the infected lurking around every corner.

Name: Spirit of the North
Summary: Spirit of the North is a single-player 3rd-person adventure game inspired by the breathtaking and mysterious landscapes of Iceland. Play as an ordinary red fox whose story becomes entwined with the guardian of the Northern Lights, a female spirit fox.

Name: Battlerite Royale
Summary: Explore the fantastical Talon Island in a thrilling fusion between a MOBA and Battle Royale game. Choose your Champion and master their unique abilities, loot for treasures alone or with a friend, and rise above the competition in a top-down action-fest. Only the best survive to the end!

Name: Super Bunny Man
Summary: A physics-based co-op platformer about a guy in a rabbit costume! Get together with a friend for some co-op bunny man madness (online or local)! Beat levels, find hidden carrots, race against time attacks! Also includes Multiplayer game modes for up to 4 players (deathmatch, basketball, and carrot-grab).

Name: Bean Battles
Summary: A unique take on the popular genre of battle royales. Multiple fast pace rounds that rewards kills just as much as being the last alive. Team up, take revenge, and be the last bean standing.

Name: Mist Survival
Summary: MIST SURVIVAL is a Single-player, survival stealth sandbox game Players will experience the Apocalypse stimulation in the form of virus pandemic, the players have to deal with it to survive through the difficulties such as finding shelter and food, threats from the environment and climate: wild animals, bandits, infected, and dense mist t

Name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts
Summary: Bliv den ultimative snigmorder i verdens mest realistiske krigsspil. Deltag i opslugende kampagner for singleplayer på tværs af store, åbne kort. Du skal tænke taktisk, snige dig omkring og være præcis, når du skyder fra lang afstand.

Name: GRIS
Summary: Gris is a hopeful young girl lost in her own world, dealing with a painful experience in her life. Her journey through sorrow is manifested in her dress, which grants new abilities to better navigate her faded reality.

Name: Märchen Forest: Mylne and the Forest Gift
Summary: Freely roam a fully 3D-rendered mystical forest together with Mylne, a young girl employed at a magical apothecary shop!

Name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Man of Medan
Summary: The Dark Picture Anthology er en serie selvstændige, omfangsrige filmiske horrorspil, som også kan spilles online med en ven. I Man of Medan begiver fem venner sig ud for at dykke i deres ferie, der snart bliver meget mere dyster.

Name: Breathedge
Summary: Survive in outer space! Together with your immortal chicken, discover the truth behind your sudden spaceship crash. Craft tools, pilot vehicles, and even control space stations to survive and explore the wreckage.

Name: Leisure Suit Larry: Wet Dreams Don't Dry
Summary: Hey ladies, I’m back in business! My new adventure, Leisure Suit Larry - Wet Dreams Don’t Dry, takes me – whatever the route or twist of fate – from the end of the ’80s directly into the 21st century and wow, how the world has changed!

Name: Streets of Rage 4
Summary: Amongst the best beat’em up series ever created, jammin’ ‘90s beats and over the top street fighting, the iconic series Streets of Rage comes back with a masterful tribute to and revitalization of the classic action fans adore.

Name: Lucius III
Summary: Lucius is back. In a whole new narrative experience, he now returns to his old neighborhood of Winter Hill. The path will be a difficult one, with trials and tribulations waiting ahead. Has he made the right choices? Is it finally time to end it all?

Name: Assetto Corsa Competizione
Summary: Assetto Corsa Competizione is the new official GT World Challenge videogame. Thanks to the extraordinary quality of simulation, the game will allow you to experience the real atmosphere of the FIA ​​GT3 homologated championship, competing against official drivers, teams, cars and circuits.

Name: Kaze and the Wild Masks
Summary: Tag på en rejse som Kaze i dette klassiske platformspil inspireret af 90'erne. En forbandelse er blevet nedkaldt over Crystal Islands, og Kaze er nødt til at redde sin ven Hogo, mens hun er oppe imod iltre levende grøntsager.

Name: Marbles On Stream
Summary: Marbles on Stream is a Marble Racing game for EVERYONE! You can simulate races yourself or stream it on Twitch.tv with your viewers! Many features in game to help interact with your viewers and engage with them in unique ways. 3 ways to play! Download and stream! Download the MoS app on your mobile device! Get on Twitch.

Name: Super Animal Royale
Summary: Kamp til sidste pels! Super Animal Royale er en vanvittig, top-down 2D-battle royale med op til 64 spillere, hvor morderiske dyr kæmper med tand, klo og maskingevær over en forladt safaripark.

Name: Pummel Party
Summary: Pummel Party is a 4-8 player online and local-multiplayer party game. Pummel friends or AI using a wide array of absurd items in the board mode and compete to destroy friendships in the unique collection of minigames.

Name: Calico
Summary: Calico is a day-in-the-life community sim game where you are given an important and adorable task: rebuild the town’s cat café and fill it with cute and cuddly creatures! Build up your café by filling it with cute furniture, fun decorations, yummy pastries, and get it bustling with animals again!

Name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza
Summary: Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

Name: One Step From Eden
Summary: Build a powerful deck, cast spells on the fly, battle evolving enemies, find game-changing artifacts, make friends or make enemies, just make it to Eden.

Name: Oops!!! I Slept With Your Mom
Summary: Baby lost Mommy when Baby was too young to remember Mommy 's face. But Baby remembers how warm and cuddly sleeping in Mommy 's hug felt. Now, Baby has to sleep with all the mommies in order to find Mommy. It could be any mommy. It could be your mommy...

Name: DiRT Rally 2.0
Summary: DiRT Rally 2.0 udfordrer dig til at bane dig vej igennem velkendte områder i hele verden i de kraftigste terrængående køretøjer verden nogensinde har set, hvor det mindste fejltrin kan afslutte etapen for dig.

Name: Them and Us
Summary: Them and Us is a classic, survival horror game with a focus on atmosphere and player immersion. Discover the truth of Alicia’s past as she descends further into her strange, unending nightmare.

Name: Today is my Birthday
Summary: Today Is My Birthday offers a classic horror experience for fans of the genre, thrusting players into insurmountable odds with only a few tools at their disposal to escape death. Your own survival instincts, problem solving skills, and willingness to explore will shape your fate.

Name: We Were Here Together
Summary: Mens vi udforsker issletterne, rammer ulykken igen. Gennem den voldsomme snestorm kan man se himlen lyse op, efterfulgt af et råb om hjælp over radioen - ødelagt, døende ... Ingen andre kan redde dem. Kan vi finde tilbage igen - sammen?

Name: Project Winter
Summary: The perfect game to back-stab your friends. Project Winter is an 8 person multiplayer game focusing on social deception and survival. Communication and teamwork is essential to the survivors’ ultimate goal of escape. Gather resources, repair structures, and brave the wilderness together.

Name: The Shapeshifting Detective
Summary: The Shapeshifting Detective er et overnaturligt-noir mordmysterie-FMV-spil. Spil som detektiv, og undersøg mordet ved at skifte form til en hvilken som helst kartakter. Selv det næste offer.

Name: Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince
Summary: The best-selling Trine series returns to the magic of 2.5D! Join three iconic heroes as they set off on a quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes to save the world from the Nightmare Prince’s shadows.

Name: Layers of Fear 2
Summary: Layers of Fear 2 is a first-person psychological horror game with an emphasis on exploration and story. Players control a Hollywood actor who heeds the call of an enigmatic director to take on the lead role in a film shot aboard an ocean liner. Beware, for all may not truly be what it seems.

Name: Maid of Sker
Summary: Maid of Sker is a first-person survival horror, set in a remote hotel with a gory and macabre history from British folklore. Brave the nightmares of the Quiet Ones. Do not panic…don’t even breathe!

Name: Outlast II
Summary: Outlast 2 introducerer dig for Sullivan Knoth og hans følgere, som har forladt vores onde verden for at skabe Temple Gate, en by dybt i vildnisset og gemt for civilisationen. Knoth og hans flok forbereder sig til den turbulente ende på verden, og du er lige i midten af det hele.

Name: Mr. Prepper
Summary: Mr. Prepper is about being prepared. You know something is wrong. The risk of a nuclear war is in the air and you need to get ready for what's coming.

Name: Don't Be Afraid
Summary: Don't Be Afraid” is an adventure horror game, that allows you to personate a boy, kidnapped by a psychopath. You have to survive, escape and find out how you were kidnapped. Exploring the gigantic, mysterious house of your torturer, you will soon reveal many secrets, hidden inside it’s...

Name: Cooking Simulator
Summary: Play one of the best cooking games! Take control of a highly polished, realistic kitchen equipped with all kinds of utensils and stands. Unlock and master over 80 recipes or use dozens of lifelike ingredients to cook everything you like. A simulator spiced up with a dash of real-life physics!

Name: Thief Simulator
Summary: Become the best thief. Gather intel, steal things and sell them to buy hi-tech equipment. Do everything that a real thief does.

Name: Among Us
Summary: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-10 players...in space!

Name: Despotism 3k
Summary: Humanity is enslaved by an AI… which is awesome, because we’re on the right side of the conflict. Exploit puny humans to extract power and build your own empire!

Name: Temtem
Summary: Temtem is a massively multiplayer creature-collection adventure. Seek adventure in the lovely Airborne Archipelago alongside your Temtem squad. Catch every Temtem, battle other tamers, customize your house, join a friend's adventure or explore the dynamic online world.

Name: Kingdom Two Crowns
Summary: Opbyg dit kongerige, og beskyt det mod truslen fra Greed i det næste kapitel af det prisvindende mikrostrategispil! Oplev ny teknologi, enheder, fjender, ridedyr og hemmeligheder i den helt nye kampagnedel, der kan spilles alene eller i samarbejde.

Name: Beer Pong League
Summary: Get drunk and have a blast in a whole new way! Play against your friends and climb the rankings to reach the top of the League! Come join the party in Beer Pong League!

Name: KurtzPel
Summary: "KurtzPel is an anime-styled, action battle game from a third-person perspective. Players can battle it out in both PvP and PvE mission-based battle modes with massive boss monsters. Players utilize Karmas (the method used to indicate weapon and class types) when charging into battle. Each character gets to use two types of Karmas.

Name: Shakes and Fidget
Summary: Shakes og Fidget er en sjov fantasy RPG satire og samtidig selv en prisvindende RPG! Lyder vanvittigt? Mere end 50 millioner spillere gør SFGAME blevet en favorit online spil i verden!

Name: Skater XL
Summary: Experience unparalleled board control and responsiveness while you skate iconic real-world skate spots. This is the evolution of skateboarding gameplay. With Independent Foot Control and unique physics-based gameplay, skate gamers finally have the expressive controls they have always dreamed of.

Name: Mortal Kombat 11
Summary: Mortal Kombat er tilbage og bedre end nogensinde på denne ikoniske spilseries næste udviklingstrin.

Name: The Outer Worlds
Summary: The Outer Worlds is an award-winning single-player RPG from Obsidian Entertainment and Private Division. As you explore a space colony, the character you decide to become will determine how this player-driven story unfolds. In the colony's corporate equation, you are the unplanned variable.

Name: The Last Campfire
Summary: The Last Campfire is an adventure, a story of a lost ember trapped in a puzzling place, searching for meaning and a way home.

Name: Far Cry New Dawn
Summary: Dyk ned i et forvandlet og pulserende postapokalyptisk Hope County, Montana, 17 år efter en global atomkatastrofe Før an i kampen mod the Highwaymen, som søger at overtage de sidste tilgængelige ressourcer

Name: Hades
Summary: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion, Transistor, and Pyre.

Name: Maiden & Spell
Summary: Maiden & Spell is a magical girl battle game, set in a cutesy fantasy world. Select from one of eight young ladies to battle 1 on 1 with a friend, or fight your way through a series of bosses and learn the secrets of The Kingdom of Stars.

Name: Pizza Connection 2
Summary: It's your empire... Take control! The game has it all! the depth of gameplay will have you on the edge of your seat for hours on-end. Build, manage, strategize and conquer the competition with the richest gameplay tycoon product ever offered!

Name: Distraint 2
Summary: You are Price, a man who sold his humanity to get a partnership from a leading company: McDade, Bruton & Moore. DISTRAINT 2 follows on from the events of the first game. It's a sinister tale about restoring hope and finding your purpose.

Name: Observation
Summary: Observation is a sci-fi thriller uncovering what happened to Dr. Emma Fisher, and the crew of her mission, through the lens of the station’s artificial intelligence S.A.M.

Name: Granblue Fantasy: Versus
Summary: A new game in the Granblue Fantasy universe, available on Steam! This fantasy game blends fighting game action and RPG-style adventure. Throw yourself into matches or enjoy powering up your characters!

Name: Atlas
Summary: Set sail for the ultimate pirate experience! Embark on a grand adventure alongside thousands of other players in one of the largest game worlds ever built (and even claim a piece of it to call your own). Build your ship, assemble your crew, sail the high seas, and become a pirate legend!

Name: Blood Card
Summary: This card game combines elements of roguelike and deckbuilding. During the game, you shall strive ahead, gathering cards to build a unique deck and use it to defeat the enemies getting in your way. You will have to choose between escaping or try to defeat Death, who is relentlessly pursuing you.

Name: Deadliest Catch: The Game
Summary: Enter the dangerous world of king crab fishing in the deadly Bering Sea! Take command of your own fishing vessel, use realistic equipment, combat hazardous Alaskan waters and become the world's best crab catcher!

Name: Help Me Doctor
Summary: Become a doctor! Help to diagnose patients. Be careful with the documentation, signatures etc. Decide what your ethics will be. What will you do, when a patient comes and say: Help me, doctor!

Name: Vigil: The Longest Night
Summary: Battle through the longest night as Leila a member of the Vigilant Order and uncover the truth behind the eternal darkness, Leila's mysterious sister, and the eldritch horrors that stalk her in a world that has forgotten daylight.

Name: Pacify
Summary: There is reportedly an evil inside that house. Something about an old funeral parlor offering a last chance to talk to their dead loved ones. Plus something about lights, laughter, a girl, missing people, etc... You know the same stuff everyone claims. Take a team, and check the place out.

Name: A Dance of Fire and Ice
Summary: A Dance of Fire and Ice is a strict rhythm game. Keep your focus as you guide two orbiting planets along a winding path without breaking their perfect equilibrium.

Name: DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT
Summary: Genoplev historien om Goku og andre Z-fightere i DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT! Foruden episke kampe byder DRAGON BALL Z også på et spændende univers, som du skal kæmpe, fiske, spise og træne dig igennem med Goku, Gohan, Vegeta og andre figurer fra serien.

Name: Subnautica: Below Zero
Summary: Descend into the depths of an alien underwater world filled with wonder and peril. Craft equipment, pilot submarines and out-smart wildlife to explore lush coral reefs, volcanoes, cave systems, and more - all while trying to survive.

Name: Apex Legends
Summary: Apex Legends er det prisvindende Battle Royale-holdskydespil fra Respawn Entertainment, som er gratis at spille. Lær at mestre en stadigt voksende række af legendariske figurer med kraftfulde evner, og oplev strategisk holdspil og nyskabende gameplay i denne skelsættende variant af Battle Royale.

Name: Pogostuck: Rage With Your Friends
Summary: Climb a surreal mountain on a pogo stick and make friends along the way.

Name: Drug Dealer Simulator
Summary: Have you ever thought about expanding your own crime empire, without the legal and moral consequences? SIMULATE IT! Now you will finally be able to crawl into the dark alleys of the drug dealing business! Become a street business mastermind, or a ruthless gangster - it's up to you!

Name: Barn Finders
Summary: Search for valuable items stashed in abandoned barns. Take part in storage auctions, bid high and buy yourself a chance to find exclusive items hidden in the past.

Name: AUDICA
Summary: AUDICA™ is a VR “rhythm shooter” that combines Harmonix’s award-winning music gameplay with precision shooting mechanics and a 33-song soundtrack, all set in a mesmerizing cosmic arena.

Name: Haven
Summary: To elskende opgav alt og flygtede til en fjern planet for at være sammen. Svæv gennem et mystisk landskab, udforsk en fragmenteret verden, og kæmp mod alt, der truer kærligheden i dette RPG-adventurespil om kærlighed, oprør og frihed.

Name: Darts and Friends
Summary: Darts and Friends is a classic darts playing game!

Name: No Time to Relax
Summary: No Time to Relax is a life simulation game where up to 4 players online or locally compete against each other in the ultimate game of life.

Name: Kageroh: Shadow Corridor
Summary: Now on Steam, revamped with brand new content! Immerse yourself in the latest chapter of the popular, Japanese indie horror title, Kageroh: Shadow Corridor. Survive against the onslaught of horrors that lie in wait in eerie, traditional Japanese locales that change with every playthrough.

Name: Quantum League
