Summary: ibb & obb ist ein kooperatives Zwei-Spieler Game, in einer Puzzlewelt, in der die Schwerkraft zwei Richtungen hat. Erfolgreich spielen ist nur möglich, wenn Ihr zusammenarbeitet. Finde einen Freund für eine lokale Session gemeinsam auf dem Sofa, oder spiele online zusammen mit anderen.

Name: Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book DX
Summary: Nr. 17 der Atelier-Serie. Die angehende Alchimistin Sophie aus Kirchen Bell stößt auf Plachta, das mysteriöse Buch, und begibt sich auf ein wunderbares Abenteuer, um Träume wahr werden zu lassen.

Name: Puzzle Pirates
Summary: Jede Aktivität in Puzzle Pirates ist ein einzigartiger Puzzlespaß: sei es Segeln, Kanonieren oder das Ausgraben von Schatztruhen, Ihre eigenen Puzzlefähigkeiten bestimmen Ihren Erfolg!

Name: RaceRoom Racing Experience
Summary: RaceRoom ist die führende Free-to-Play-PC Rennsimulation und ist die Heimat offizieller Rennserien wie der DTM, WTCR, WTCC und ADAC GT Masters. Betreten Sie mit RaceRoom die Welt eines professionellen Rennfahrers.

Name: Quake
Summary: Blinde Wut wird Ihnen durch die 32 Einzelspielerlevel und 6 Deathmatch Level reinen Terrors helfen. Währen Sound- und Lichteffekte Sie ausser Atem halten, bewaffnen Sie sich gegen die kannibalischen Menschenfresser, teuflischen Dämoninen und schier unzerstörbare Monster und nutzen tödliche Nägel, gleissende Blitze und entsetzliche...

Name: Outlast
Summary: Hell is an experiment you can't survive in Outlast, a first-person survival horror game developed by veterans of some of the biggest game franchises in history. As investigative journalist Miles Upshur, explore Mount Massive Asylum and try to survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.

Name: Edna & Harvey: Harvey's New Eyes
Summary: Von den Machern der preisgekrönten Adventure-Hits "Edna Bricht Aus", "The Whispered World" und "Deponia" kommt ein außergewöhnliches, neues Spiel: Edna & Harvey: Harvey's New Eyes.

Name: Tomb Raider: Anniversary
Summary: Adventurer Lara Croft has been hired to recover the pieces of an ancient artifact known as the Scion. With her fearless acrobatic style she runs, jumps, swims and climbs her way towards the truth of its origin and powers - leaving only a trail of empty tombs and gun-cartridges in her wake.

Name: Defense Zone 3 Ultra HD
Summary: Die langerwartete Fortsetzung mit neuen Waffen, Karten und Möglichkeiten.

Name: Euro Truck Simulator 2
Summary: Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! With dozens of cities to explore, your endurance, skill and speed will all be pushed to their limits.

Name: Kingdom Rush HD
Summary: Bereite dich auf eine epische Reise vor und verteidige dein Königreich gegen Horden von Orks, Trollen, bösen Zauberern und anderen Monstern mit einem Arsenal an Türmen und Zaubern!Kämpfe in Wäldern, Brachländern und auf Bergen und passe deine Verteidigungsstrategie mit Turmverbesserungen und Spezialisierungen an!

Name: School Grounds
Summary: Strange mannequins silently stalk visitors to the school grounds as they piece together the mystery of what is happening at the school.

Name: Tomb Raider: Legend
Summary: Folge Lara Croft auf ihrer Entdeckungsreise, wenn sie rund um den Globus abgelegene, exotische Orte auf ihrer Suche nach einem der größten Artefakten der Geschichte besucht und dabei unwillkommene Figuren aus Laras Vergangenheit auf den Plan ruft.

Name: ETERNAL BLOOD
Summary: ETERNAL BLOOD is a high-adrenaline arcade-action FPS. Face legions of demons, harvest their souls and become a God of Destruction.

Name: Formula XD
Summary: Take on the role of racing team manager - hiring drivers, negotiating contracts with sponsors and engine suppliers, making the big decisions necessary to keep your team above water. You'll issue orders to your drivers out onto the track, and be responsible for guiding them to victory or defeat.

Name: BattleQuiz
Summary: Battle Quiz is a classical multiplechoice trivia quiz game. Many characters to choose from, large question base, and a lots of great fun!

Name: FlatOut 2
Summary: WAGHALSIGER FAHRSTIL IST KEIN ZUFALL! Und auch manche Ihrer Unfälle nicht. In diesen Hochgeschwindigkeitsrennen sollten Sie so viel Schaden wie möglich anrichten. Die besten Wagen mit Turbomotor und die verrücktesten Konkurrenten stellen Ihre zerstörerischen Fähigkeiten auf die Probe. Verantwortungsvolle Fahrer sind nicht erwünscht.

Name: Dead Rising
Summary: Du bist Frank West, ein kompromissloser Fotojournalist, der ganz darauf versessen ist, das Rätsel im Willamette-Einkaufszentrum zu untersuchen. Es ist von Zombies überlaufen. Du hast 72 Stunden. Hacke bis zum Umfallen!

Name: Musical Range
Summary: Musical Range is a VR rhythm game where you use firearms to play along to your favorite music! Shoot to the rhythm!

Name: The Longest Journey
Summary: The Longest Journey is an amazing graphical adventure, where the player controls the protagonist, April Ryan, on her journey between parallel universes.

Name: Elite: Dangerous
Summary: Übernimm die Kontrolle über dein eigenes Raumschiff in einer erbarmungslosen Galaxie. Elite Dangerous ist das definitive Massively-Multiplayer-Weltraum-Epos.

Name: Final Fantasy IX
Summary: Begleite Zidane und Vivi auf ihrem unvergesslichen Abenteuer! Der RPG-Klassiker FINAL FANTASY IX, von dem seit der Erstveröffentlichung im Jahr 2000 weltweit 5,5 Millionen Exemplare verkauft wurden, ist jetzt endlich für PC erhältlich!

Name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II - The Sith Lords
Summary: 5 years after the events of the award winning original, the Sith are on the verge of crushing the Old Republic. As a lone Jedi, will you follow the light side or succumb to the dark?

Name: Jagged Alliance 2
Summary: Der Kleinstaat Arulco ist einem gnadenlosen Diktator in die Hände gefallen. Nur Sie können das Land befreien! 'Jagged Alliance 2 Gold Pack' entführt Sie in ein facettenreiches Rollenspiel-Universum. Interagieren Sie mit 150 Figuren, rekrutieren Sie Ihren eigenen Soldatentrupp, und schaffen Sie eigene Söldner, um Arulco damit...

Name: Mad Max
Summary: Spiele als Mad Max, unwilliger Held und Überlebender, der nichts mehr will, als den Wahnsinn hinter sich zu lassen und Frieden zu finden.

Name: World of Warships: Legends
Summary: Erlebt in World of Warships epische Free-to-Play-Seeschlachten am Steuer eines von mehr als 350 historischen Schiffen in einer spannenden Kombination aus Strategie- und Echtzeitkampf. Stattet eure Flotte mit Flaggen, Tarnungen, Modifizierungen, talentierten Kapitänen und mehr aus!

Name: Comedy Night
Summary: Hast du das Talent Dich mit anderen Comedians in einer Live Comedy-Show zu messen? Finde heraus wie Deine Routine sich vor einem vergebungslosen Publikum bewährt, das Dich von der Bühne stimmen kann, oder wie Du dich gegen andere Künstler hälst, die Dich in Grund und Boden dissen.

Name: Chrono Trigger
Summary: Der zeitlose RPG-Klassiker kehrt zurück, und zwar voller Upgrades! Reise in längst vergessenen Epochen, in die weit entfernte Zukunft und sogar bis zum Ende der Zeit.

Name: INSIDE
Summary: Gejagt und alleine wird ein Junge immer tiefer in ein dunkles Projekt hineingezogen.

Name: ZooKeeper Simulator
Summary: In ZooKeeper Simulator, there are two teams: Zookeeper vs Animals. Zookeeper must maintain the park by carrying out missions while animals must prevent them utilizing violence and pure brutality.

Name: Flight Of Nova
Summary: Flight Of Nova is a flight simulation in which you take control of spacecrafts on the full-scale planet NVA-31. You will fly on different types of machines during transport and research missions in an environment with realistic aerodynamics and orbital physics.

Name: Half-Life 2: Episode Two
Summary: 1998. HALF-LIFE schlägt wie eine Bombe ein. Die Spielwelt ist begeistert von dieser Kombination aus atemberaubender Action und spannender Handlung. Das Erstlingswerk von Valve erhält über 50 Preise als „Spiel des Jahres“ und wird von „PC Gamer“ zum „Besten Spiel aller Zeiten“ gewählt.

Name: Finders Reapers
Summary: Finders Reapers ist ein erfinderischer Third-Person-Shooter. Erleben Sie Gegenstände, die vom Himmel fallen, sammeln Sie sie, verkaufen Sie sie und entdecken Sie ein ganz neues Konzept, bei dem Bargeld Munition ist. Nehmen Sie Missionen an, kämpfen Sie online oder kämpfen Sie im benutzerdefinierten Gefechtmodus gegen Bots.

Name: Lights, Camera, Reaction!
Summary: LCR is the ultimate party game to break out during family gatherings and friendly get-togethers! Play in both VR and non-VR game modes, including a single player reaction mode, a local multiplayer mode, and an online smartphone-based multiplayer mode. Enjoy countless hours of hilarious fun!

Name: No More Room in Hell
Summary: The chances of you surviving this all out war of society and the undead are slim to none. Already, there are millions of the walking dead shambling about, searching for food to eat. There's no known cure. One bite can possibly end it all for you. However, you aren't alone in this nightmare.

Name: Home Sweet Home
Summary: Home Sweet Home is a first-person horror adventure game based on Thai myths and beliefs. The core gameplay focuses on storytelling and stealth to avoid perilous spirits hunting you. Moreover, few puzzles are added into the game, making gameplay more various.

Name: Convenience Store
Summary: "Convenience Store" is a classic convenience store operating simulation game. The original version was released in 2005 and re-launched on Steam in 2019.

Name: Chicken Invaders 3
Summary: Chickens. For centuries we have oppressed them, grilling, roasting, stewing, and stuffing them in buns. The time has come for us to pay. Intergalactic chickens are invading Earth, seeking revenge for the oppression of their earthly brethren!

Name: Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair
Summary: Jabberwock Island – Deine Klassenkameraden und du freuten sich bereits auf den Sommerspaß als Monokuma zurückkehrte, um sein mörderisches Spiel erneut zu treiben! Gefangen in einer Töte-oder-werde-getötet-Situation ruht deine ganze Hoffnung auf dem Lösen der Geheimnisse dieser Insel.

Name: Gas Station Simulator
Summary: Buy an abandoned gas station and restore it to its full glory. Renovate, upgrade and expand upon the offered services to keep up with your clients demands.

Name: The Exorcist: Legion VR (Deluxe Edition)
Summary: The Exorcist: Legion VR Deluxe Edition is a complete collection of all FIVE chapters of the acclaimed VR experience based on The Exorcist franchise. Investigate and exorcise sinister demonic entities as you make your way to a final confrontation with your darkest, most hidden fears. HTC Vive, Oculus Rift/S and Valve Index.

Name: Deus Ex: Invisible War
Summary: Ungefähr 20 Jahre nach den Ereignissen in Deus Ex ist die Welt im Begriff, sich von der katastrophalen weltweiten Depression zu erholen. In dieser chaotischen Umbruchsphase sehen mehrere religiöse und politische Interessengruppen die Gelegenheit eine weltweite Regierung nach Ihrer eigenen Agenda zu gestalten, da jegliche Entscheidungen,...

Name: The Tenants
Summary: Werde Immobilieneigentümer und baue dir dein eigenes Wohnungsimperium auf. Vermietest du deine Wohnung an ein Studentenpärchen oder an eine ältere Dame mit vier Katzen? Wie wirst du mit Mietern fertg, die von den Nachbarn nicht mehr ausgehalten werden, wie reagierst du auf Polizeieinsätze?

Name: Distance
Summary: Distance is an atmospheric racing platformer. Fusing futuristic arcade racing with parkour, survive a deadly, mysterious, neon-drenched city by jumping, rotating, and flying.

Name: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
Summary: MGSV: The Phantom Pain läutet mit topaktueller Fox Engine-Technologie eine neue Ära für das Franchise ein und bietet den Spielern ein erstklassiges Gaming-Erlebnis mit taktischer Freiheit beim Absolvieren von Open-World-Missionen.

Name: 新仙剑奇侠传 单机版 (Sword and Fairy)
Summary: *** This game is only available in Chinese language ***

Name: Dark Souls II
Summary: Das von FROM SOFTWARE entwickelte DARK SOULS™ II ist der mit Hochspannung erwartete Nachfolger des Überraschungshits Dark Souls™ aus dem Jahr 2011. Das einzigartige Retro-Action-RPG mit unglaublichen Herausforderungen und mitreißenden Erfolgserlebnissen fesselte damals unzählige Spieler weltweit.

Name: The Bus
Summary: The Bus ist die nächste Generation der Stadtbus-Simulation in der deutschen Hauptstadt Berlin im realistischen Maßstab 1:1. Transportiere Passagiere auf verschiedenen Linien in unterschiedlichen Bussen durch die Stadt. Verwalte deine Flotte und arbeite online mit anderen Fahrern zusammen.

Name: Transformice
Summary: Transformice ist ein MMO Platformer, der von dutzenden rennenden Mäusen handelt, die den Käse zurückbringen müssen! Wird der allmächtige Schamane dir helfen oder alles verderben? Millionen Level, hektische Kräfte, Fähigkeitsbäume und am wichtigsten … Hüte!

Name: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
Summary: Jetzt 20% böser mit dem kostenlosen Halloween-Update!

Name: Nothing & Nowhere
Summary: While taking a walk on a foggy beach, reclusive writer Cora encounters a young runaway. Curious, Cora offers her a place to stay... and a quiet, pensive story about overcoming the past unfolds.

Name: A Blind Legend
Summary: A Blind Legend is the first-ever action-adventure game without video – where ears replace eyes! Discover the original, innovative sensory experience of binaural 3D sound.

Name: Shelter 3
Summary: Shelter 3 lädt dich dazu ein, das Leben im Dschungel zu entdecken, einer Welt voller großer Tiere und exotischer Pflanzen. Du schlüpfst in die Rolle eines Elefanten, der mit seiner Familie durch die Wildnis streift, in den Wasserläufen des Dschungels nach Nahrung sucht und sich um die Jungelefanten kümmert.

Name: Forex Trading Master: Simulator
Summary: This is a simulation of foreign currencies trading game, the data is synchronized in real-time from Bank’s Website and API provider and The game currently supports more than 30 kinds of foreign currency exchanges.

Name: Mundaun
Summary: Mundaun ist eine liebevoll handgezeichnete Horrorgeschichte, die in einem düsteren, abgeschiedenen Tal in den Alpen spielt. Erkunde unterschiedliche Gebiete voller Geheimnisse, überlebe gefährliche Begegnungen, steuere Fahrzeuge, fülle dein Inventar und löse etliche handgefertigte Rätsel.

Name: EverQuest
Summary: Welcome to EverQuest ® - the online game that started it all! No other MMO matches EverQuest's sheer content, now with 25 expansions and countless updates. EverQuest is free-to-play.

Name: Rust
Summary: The only aim in Rust is to survive - Overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals. Protect yourself from other players.

Name: Path of Exile
Summary: You are an Exile, struggling to survive on the dark continent of Wraeclast, as you fight to earn power that will allow you to exact your revenge against those who wronged you. Created by hardcore gamers, Path of Exile is an online Action RPG set in a dark fantasy world.

Name: Dota 2
Summary: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover. With regular updates that ensure a constant evolution of gameplay, features, and heroes, Dota 2 has taken on a life of its own.

Name: Rocket League
Summary: Rocket League is a high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven competition. Rocket League includes casual and competitive Online Matches, a fully-featured offline Season Mode, special “Mutators” that let you change the rules entirely, hockey and...

Name: Grand Theft Auto V
Summary: Το Grand Theft Auto V για PC παρέχει στους παίκτες τη δυνατότητα να εξερευνήσουν τον βραβευμένο κόσμο του Los Santos και του Blaine County σε αναλύσεις έως 4k (και μεγαλύτερες), καθώς και την ευκαιρία να βιώσουν την εμπειρία παιχνιδιού στα 60 καρέ το δευτερόλεπτο.

Name: Serious Sam II
Summary: Serious Sam 2 is a shot of adrenaline to the hearts of first-person shooter fans across the world. This is serious!

Name: ARK: Survival Evolved
Summary: Stranded on the shores of a mysterious island, you must learn to survive. Use your cunning to kill or tame the primeval creatures roaming the land, and encounter other players to survive, dominate... and escape!

Name: Dark Souls III
Summary: Dark Souls continues to push the boundaries with the latest, ambitious chapter in the critically-acclaimed and genre-defining series. Prepare yourself and Embrace The Darkness!

Name: The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth
Summary: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a randomly generated action RPG shooter with heavy Rogue-like elements. Following Isaac on his journey players will find bizarre treasures that change Isaac’s form giving him super human abilities and enabling him to fight off droves of mysterious creatures, discover secrets and fight his way to safety.

Name: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
Summary: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.

Name: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
Summary: Be the leader of wobblers from ancient lands, spooky places, and fantasy worlds. Watch them fight in simulations made with the wobbliest physics system ever created, make your own wobblers in the unit creator and send your army off to fight your friends in multiplayer.

Name: Hunt: Showdown
Summary: Hunt: Showdown is a thrilling, high-stakes PvPvE first-person shooter. Take down nightmarish monsters, as you compete for the bounties that will bring you glory, gear, and gold in this unforgiving – and unforgettable - online multiplayer experience.

Name: Disco Elysium
Summary: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is a groundbreaking role playing game. You’re a detective with a unique skill system at your disposal and a whole city to carve your path across. Interrogate unforgettable characters, crack murders or take bribes. Become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being.

Name: Marbles On Stream
Summary: Marbles on Stream is a Marble Racing game for EVERYONE! You can simulate races yourself or stream it on Twitch.tv with your viewers! Many features in game to help interact with your viewers and engage with them in unique ways. 3 ways to play! Download and stream! Download the MoS app on your mobile device! Get on Twitch.

Name: Among Us
Summary: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-10 players...in space!

Name: Apex Legends
Summary: Apex Legends is the award-winning, free-to-play Battle Royale team shooter from Respawn Entertainment. Master an ever-growing roster of legendary characters with powerful abilities and experience strategic squad play and innovative gameplay in the next evolution of Battle Royale.

Name: Phasmophobia
Summary: Phasmophobia is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you and your team to use all the ghost hunting equipment at your disposal in order to gather as much evidence as you can.

Name: Euro Truck Simulator 2
Summary: Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! With dozens of cities to explore, your endurance, skill and speed will all be pushed to their limits.

Name: Rust
Summary: The only aim in Rust is to survive - Overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals. Protect yourself from other players.

Name: Path of Exile
Summary: You are an Exile, struggling to survive on the dark continent of Wraeclast, as you fight to earn power that will allow you to exact your revenge against those who wronged you. Created by hardcore gamers, Path of Exile is an online Action RPG set in a dark fantasy world.

Name: Dota 2
Summary: Minden nap játékosok milliói lépnek csatába szerte a világban a több mint száz Dota hős egyikeként. Nem számít, hogy a 10. vagy 1000. játékórájuk, mindig van mit felfedezni. A rendszeres frissítésekkel, amelyek biztosítják a játékmenet, funkciók és hősök állandó evolúcióját, a Dota 2 valóban saját életre kelt.

Name: Rocket League
Summary: Rocket League is a high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven competition. Rocket League includes casual and competitive Online Matches, a fully-featured offline Season Mode, special “Mutators” that let you change the rules entirely, hockey and...

Name: Grand Theft Auto V
Summary: A Grand Theft Auto V PC változatában a játékosok 4k-s vagy magasabb felbontás mellett fedezhetik fel Los Santos és Blaine County díjnyertes világát, akár 60 FPS képkockasebességgel futtatva játékot.

Name: ARK: Survival Evolved
Summary: Mint férfi vagy nő, fázva, éhezve egy ARK nevű rejtelmes sziget partján rekedve meztelenül, vadásznod, alapanyagokat gyűjtened, tárgyakat gyártanod, növényeket termesztened és menedéket építened kell a túléléshez.

Name: Dark Souls III
Summary: Dark Souls continues to push the boundaries with the latest, ambitious chapter in the critically-acclaimed and genre-defining series. Prepare yourself and Embrace The Darkness!

Name: The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth
Summary: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a randomly generated action RPG shooter with heavy Rogue-like elements. Following Isaac on his journey players will find bizarre treasures that change Isaac’s form giving him super human abilities and enabling him to fight off droves of mysterious creatures, discover secrets and fight his way to safety.

Name: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
Summary: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.

Name: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
Summary: Be the leader of wobblers from ancient lands, spooky places, and fantasy worlds. Watch them fight in simulations made with the wobbliest physics system ever created, make your own wobblers in the unit creator and send your army off to fight your friends in multiplayer.

Name: Hunt: Showdown
Summary: Hunt: Showdown is a thrilling, high-stakes PvPvE first-person shooter. Take down nightmarish monsters, as you compete for the bounties that will bring you glory, gear, and gold in this unforgiving – and unforgettable - online multiplayer experience.

Name: Disco Elysium
Summary: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is a groundbreaking role playing game. You’re a detective with a unique skill system at your disposal and a whole city to carve your path across. Interrogate unforgettable characters, crack murders or take bribes. Become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being.

Summary: Marbles on Stream is a Marble Racing game for EVERYONE! You can simulate races yourself or stream it on Twitch.tv with your viewers! Many features in game to help interact with your viewers and engage with them in unique ways. 3 ways to play! Download and stream! Download the MoS app on your mobile device! Get on Twitch.

Name: Among Us
Summary: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-10 players...in space!

Name: Apex Legends
Summary: Apex Legends is the award-winning, free-to-play Battle Royale team shooter from Respawn Entertainment. Master an ever-growing roster of legendary characters with powerful abilities and experience strategic squad play and innovative gameplay in the next evolution of Battle Royale.

Name: Phasmophobia
Summary: Phasmophobia is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you and your team to use all the ghost hunting equipment at your disposal in order to gather as much evidence as you can.

Name: Euro Truck Simulator 2
Summary: Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! With dozens of cities to explore, your endurance, skill and speed will all be pushed to their limits.

Name: LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga
Summary: Kick Some Brick in I through VI! Play through all six Star Wars movies in one videogame! Adding new characters, new levels, new features and for the first time ever, the chance to build and battle your way through a fun Star Wars galaxy on your PC!

Name: Stay Out of the House
Summary: Edge of your seat STEALTH HORROR as you try to escape the house of a cannibal SERIAL KILLER.... Stay Out of the House is inspired by VHS era slasher movies and PS1 survival horror...

Name: House Builder
Summary: Dicono che un uomo debba fare tre cose nella sua vita: piantare un albero, generare un figlio e costruire una casa. Non possiamo aiutarti con l'albero né con il figlio, ma puoi costruire tutte le case che vuoi mentre giochi a House Builder.

Name: Counter-Strike: Source
Summary: Counter-Strike: Source blends Counter-Strike's award-winning teamplay action with the advanced technology of Source™ technology.

Name: Master of Orion
Summary: Forge an empire in a universe where population growth is stripping away planetary resources. Colonize unknown planets and trade with other races for their knowledge.

Name: Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime
Summary: LOVERS IN A DANGEROUS SPACETIME è un frenetico sparatutto spaziale cooperativo per 1 a 4 giocatori ambientato in una enorme nave da guerra. Solo col lavoro di squadra potrai trionfare contro le malvage forze dell'Anti-Amore, salvare coniglietti spaziali rapiti ed evitare una prematura dipartita.

Name: Writers
Summary: Writers is a game where you play as a writer and try to be the first in typing random excerpts from the book. Fight against your friends or players around the world, make your way to the top and show them speed you are capable of. Become a member of Writer's club and master all language leagues!

Name: Mountain Rescue Simulator
Summary: Quando il pericolo chiama, sarai tu a intervenire in Mountain Rescue Simulator! C'è bisogno di te e della tua squadra! Usa veicoli speciali come elicotteri, quad e gatti delle nevi per salvare vite. Recupera gli escursionisti in difficoltà e... attenzione alle ossa rotte!

Name: Counter-Strike
Summary: Prova il gioco online di azione numero 1 al mondo. In questo celebre gioco a squadre puoi partecipare a una guerra al terrorismo dal realismo incredibile. Alleati con i tuoi compagni per completare missioni strategiche. Distruggi i siti nemici. Salva gli ostaggi. Il tuo ruolo influisce sul successo della tua squadra.

Name: Fallout
Summary: You've just unearthed the classic post-apocalyptic role-playing game that revitalized the entire CRPG genre. The Fallout® SPECIAL system allows drastically different types of characters, meaningful decisions and development that puts you in complete control. Explore the devastated ruins of a golden age civilization.

Name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl
Summary: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl tells a story about survival in the Zone – a very dangerous place, where you fear not only the radiation, anomalies and deadly creatures, but other S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s, who have their own goals and wishes.

Name: Bad Guys at School
Summary: In Bad Guys at School you can play as students and revolt against school system by completing missions, or decide to become a teacher that must maintain order despite the violence and brutality in the school.

Name: State of Decay 2: Juggernaut Edition
Summary: I morti risorgono e la civiltà muore. Ora il tuo gruppetto di superstiti deve perlustrare un mondo aperto pieno di risorse e costruire una base che possa resistere a ondate di zombie, in questo gioco ibrido d'azione, di strategia e di simulazione. Supporta fino a quattro giocatori collegati in rete.

Name: Silent Hunter III
Summary: Il re delle simulazioni di sottomarini ritorna con un motore grafico in 3D completamente nuovo, nuovi comandi per la coordinazione dell'equipaggio ed un'azione della Seconda Guerra Mondiale più realistica di sempre.

Name: AI: The Somnium Files
Summary: Mettiti nei panni del detective Kaname Date sulle tracce di uno sfuggente serial killer in questo emozionante giallo fantascientifico

Name: Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop
Summary: Gioco sparatutto cooperativo, con visuale isometrica e disponibile gratuitamente. Il gioco scaraventa il giocatore in una epica caccia all'insetto, caratterizzata da una peculiare miscela di gioco cooperativo e tattiche di squadra.

Name: Weed Shop 3
Summary: Get ready to light up and hit the beach coz the long-awaited Weed Shop sequel is almost here!

Name: Final Fantasy VIII
Summary: Sono tempi di guerra. Galbadia, una superpotenza mondiale, dichiara guerra a Dollet. Nell’accademia militare di Dollet si addestrano due guerrieri straordinari: l’ambizioso Seifer e il “lupo solitario” Squall Leonhart, in conflitto tra loro esattamente come il loro paese lo è con Galbadia.

Name: Marble Age
Summary: Turn-based historical simulation strategy. Develop the Greek civilization from the small village to the great city-state when it will dominate the world!

Name: Blocksplode
Summary: Fai saltare in aria! Distruggi le strutture, affonda i blocchi blu scontrosi e salva le gemme per salire in cima alla torre. Goditi ore di stimolanti rompicapi basati sulla fisica o crea e condividi online i tuoi livelli e puzzle. Giocatore singolo o multiplayer online per un massimo di 4 amici.

Name: Cry of Fear
Summary: Cry of Fear is a psychological single-player and co-op horror game set in a deserted town filled with horrific creatures and nightmarish delusions. You play as a young man desperately searching for answers in the cold Scandinavian night, finding his way through the city as he slowly descends into madness.

Name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
Summary: Enquanto a guerra assola todos os Reinos do Norte, você enfrenta o maior conflito de sua vida: ir em busca da criança da profecia, uma arma senciente capaz de alterar o mundo.

Name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
Summary: Corre l’anno 1715. I Caraibi sono sotto il controllo dei Pirati che hanno fondato una vera e propria repubblica, priva però di qualsiasi legge, perciò corruzione, avidità e crudeltà sono all’ordine del giorno.Tra questi fuorilegge vive un giovane ed esuberante capitano di nome Edward Kenway.

Name: Call of Duty: Ghosts
Summary: Sopraffatti in numero e potenza di fuoco, mai sconfitti.Call of Duty®: Ghosts è uno straordinario passo avanti per una delle serie più grandi di tutti i tempi. Questo nuovo capitolo della serie di Call of Duty® è caratterizzato da una nuova ambientazione, in cui i giocatori saranno dalla parte di una nazione allo sbando che non combatte...

Name: War for the Overworld
Summary: Stanco di invadere dungeon? Costruiscine uno tutto tuo! War for the Overworld racchiude il meglio dei videogiochi strategici in tempo reale e dei god game. Crea il tuo dungeon e conquista il Mondo di Sopra!

Name: Castle Crashers Remastered
Summary: Spacca, picchia e schiaccia fino a ottenere la vittoria in questa premiata avventura arcade 2D di The Behemoth!

Name: DYSMANTLE
Summary: Esci dal rifugio. Distruggi tutto. Fuggi dall'isola maledetta. ⚔️🔨🎣🌱🌵🍰 Esplora. Combatti. Aumenta di livello. Sopravvivi. Raccogli. Crea. Mieti. Caccia. Costruisci. Coltiva. Risolvi enigmi. Pesca. Cucina. Vivi. Goditi una vita post-apocalittica agrodolce.

Name: Final Fantasy VII
Summary: A Midgar, una città controllata dalla multinazionale Shinra Inc., un gruppo di ribelli noto come AVALANCHE ha fatto saltare in aria il reattore n. 1 di energia mako.L’AVALANCHE è stata fondata in segreto per fomentare una rivolta contro la Shinra Inc.

Name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger
Summary: Ciao! Esplora le terre selvagge dell'Australia con TY la tigre della Tasmania, l'affascinante platform australiano.

Name: ToeJam & Earl
Summary: ToeJam & Earl™ are both highly funky aliens from the planet Funkotron. Recently they ran into a slight problem... They were cruising in their highly funky, ultra cool, righteous rapmaster rocketship when Earl said he’d like a shot at driving.

Name: Super Seducer 2
Summary: Sei pronto a diventare irresistibile? Super Seducer 2 porta la seduzione a livelli tutti nuovi di realismo. Con un budget 10 volte superiore a quello del primo gioco, Super Seducer 2 è decisamente più grande, migliore e più allettante.

Name: DYO
Summary: DYO is a mind-bending cooperative platformer for one or two players where you can hop between two halves of a split screen.

Name: Spy Fox 2: "Some Assembly Required"
Summary: Once again, the world relies on Fox - Spy Fox, the suave secret agent who smoothly finesses his way through Spy Corps' toughest assignments. This time, Spy Corps' corrupt counterpart, the Society for Meaningless Evil, Larceny, Lying and Yelling (S.M.E.L.L.Y.) has devised a dogbot which will be unleashed upon the unsuspecting world!

Name: Anarchy Online
Summary: Anarchy Online – the first ever science fiction MMO – is now on Steam! Compete and cooperate with thousands of player simultaneously on a vast, alien world. Join humanity nearly 30,000 years in the future in a world of perpetual conflict and scientific marvel.

Name: Star Wars: Episode I - Racer
Summary: Two Engines. One Champion. No Limits.

Name: Grand Theft Auto
Summary: Drive dozens of varied vehicles around three of America's toughest cities. Only the best will be able to tame the fastest cars. Only the smartest will know all the short-cuts and the whereabouts of the hottest wheels. Only the toughest will be able to take on the world and finish the job like a professional...

Name: Quake 4
Summary: L'ultimo capitolo della saga di Quake ora su Steam!

Name: Dusty Raging Fist
Summary: Set in a timeline before Dusty Revenge, 'Dusty Raging Fist' features a younger vigilante Dusty aided by his team of skillful fighters. News of an ancient evil in a faraway land threatens the peace and harmony of Double Bill Town. Children have disappeared mysteriously, and rogue villains now rule over many lands.

Name: Mad Father
Summary: Witness the tale of a most foolish family. A remake of the classic horror exploration game makes its way to Steam.

Name: Jackpot Poker by PokerStars
Summary: Enjoy non-stop casino poker action, from the biggest name in poker, PokerStars. Thanks to Jackpot Poker's fast-paced 3-player Spin & Go poker games, your next turn is not far away. With hundreds of tables and thousands of poker players, you get more excitement, more thrills, more poker!

Name: Quest Rooms
Summary: You wake up in an obscure room, a voice on the TV says that it is just a quest where you have to find the way out. Brute force is not enough to survive to get out of the room you will have to be patient, use your brain and have grit.

Name: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare
Summary: From the moment Edward Carnby and Aline Cedrac set foot on Shadow Island, they are confronted by mysterious, evil creatures intent on thwarting their progress to recover 3 ancient tablets believed to hold the secret key to some incredible menacing phenomena. Danger threatens from every corner.

Name: Light Crusader
Summary: I am David Lander, swordsman in the service of the great King Frederick of Whitewood. A few days ago, I was sent by my lord to an audience with King Weeden of this land of Green Row. Trembling, King Weeden informed me that his townspeople have been disappearing daily.

Name: S.W.A.N.: Chernobyl Unexplored
Summary: S.W.A.N.: Chernobyl Unexplored is a science fiction FPS puzzle horror game, which takes place a few months after the Chernobyl Nuclear Plant disaster. Experience a tale about an unexplored area within the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone - The S.W.A.N. Institute.

Name: Spore
Summary: Be the architect of your own universe with Spore, an exciting single-player adventure. From Single Cell to Galactic God, evolve your creature in a universe of your own creations.

Name: Princess Castle Quest
Summary: 2D Puzzle Game with Full Level Editor and Local Coop

Name: Factorio
Summary: Factorio è un gioco di costruzione e creazione di fabbriche automatizzate per la produzione di elementi di complessità crescente all'interno di un mondo infinito 2D - Usa la tua immaginazione per progettare la tua fabbrica, parti da oggetti semplici e infine proteggila da creature malvagie.

Name: Shroud of the Avatar: Forsaken Virtues
Summary: SHROUD OF THE AVATAR: FORSAKEN VIRTUES is a multiplayer fantasy RPG that sets the player on a path filled with peril and tough choices as they explore a persistent realm that can be shared with other Avatars. It is the spiritual successor to Richard Garriott’s Ultima games.

Name: Soda Drinker Pro
Summary: The world's most advanced soda drinking simulator.

Name: Escape until friday
Summary: You are kidnapped by a maniac who keeps you locked up in his basement. You have to get out of the kidnapper's house at any cost until Friday.

Name: Sonic the Hedgehog CD
Summary: È ora di proiettare il passato nel futuro, in questa ricreazione migliorata di Sonic CD! Sonic viaggia verso le lontane coste di Never Lake per l'apparizione che avviene una volta l'anno di Little Planet, un mondo misterioso in cui passato, presente e futuro si scontrano attraverso il potere delle Pietre del Tempo che si nascondono al...

Name: EVE Online
Summary: EVE Online is a community-driven spaceship MMO where players can play free, choosing their own path from countless options. Experience space exploration, immense PvP and PvE battles, mining, industry and a thriving player economy in an ever-expanding sandbox.

Name: Star Wars: Jedi Knight II - Jedi Outcast
Summary: The Legacy of Star Wars Dark Forces™ and Star Wars® Jedi Knight lives on in the intense first-person action of Jedi Outcast.

Name: DOOM 3
Summary: A massive demonic invasion has overwhelmed the Union Aerospace Corporation's (UAC) Mars Research Facility, leaving only chaos and horror in its wake. As one of only a few survivors, you must fight your way to hell and back against a horde of evil monsters.

Name: Papers, Please
Summary: Congratulazioni.La lotteria del lavoro di ottobre è terminata. È stato estratto il tuo nome.Fai rapporto al Ministero dell'Accoglienza presso il presidio di frontiera Grestin per il collocamento immediato.Alla tua famiglia verrà assegnato un appartamento di classe 8 a Grestin Est.Gloria ad Arstotzka.

Name: Ranch Simulator
Summary: Costruttore. Agricoltore. Cacciatore. Commerciante. Occuparsi di un ranch non è certo il tuo lavoro abituale. Pensi di essere in grado di trasformare la fattoria in rovina della tua famiglia nel migliore ranch della valle?

Name: Say No! More
Summary: SAY NO! MORE è il primo GdRN al mondo (Gioco dove Rispondi NO!). Vesti i panni di uno stagista che freme dal desiderio di dire “NO!” a tutto e tutti. Personalizza il tuo personaggio, di’ “NO!” in varie lingue e maniere, applaudi in faccia ai tuoi colleghi e cambia il mondo!

Name: Dark Messiah of Might and Magic
Summary: È nata una nuova stirpe di giochi di ruolo d'azione, basati su una versione avanzata del motore Source™ di Valve. Entra nell'universo di Might & Magic® e affronta combattimenti feroci in un ambiente fantasy oscuro e coinvolgente. Spade, stregoneria, furtività. Scegli come preferisci uccidere.

Name: Shovel Knight
Summary: Shovel Knight è un gioco di avventura/azione con una straordinaria giocabilità, indimenticabili personaggi e uno stile retro a 8-bit. Se ami i giochi platform, con una splendida grafica, una musica contagiosa, bizzarri boss, umorismo, frivolezza e passione, Shovel Knight è la scelta giusta!

Name: World of Tanks: Blitz
Summary: È fuori dal mondo! Ricompense cosmiche in cambio di Exp, veicoli con propulsori in Forza di Gravità e il carro Explorer nell'Operazione Pianeta rosso.

Name: Half-Life 2
Summary: 1998. HALF-LIFE sconvolge il mondo dei giochi con la sua combinazione di azione martellante e trama completa e coinvolgente. Il titolo di debutto di Valve vince più di 50 premi come miglior gioco dell'anno, viene nominato "Miglior gioco per PC di sempre" da PC Gamer e lancia una serie che conta più di otto milioni di copie vendute in...

Name: Hexen II
Summary: The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse lurk in the shadows before you. They are Death, Pestilence, Famine, and War. They are the root of all that is evil. They are the least of your worries. The last know Serpent Rider, Eidolon, lives.

Name: Overlord
Summary: Preparati ad essere tentato, ipnotizzato ed eccitato, diventa l'Overlord, quanto corrotto diventi dipende da come gestisci ogni determinata situazione. Le tue azioni hanno un impatto sul mondo di gioco. Con un potere incredibile a tua disposizione e una squadra di maligni tirapiedi pronti a eseguire i tuoi malvagi ordini, come potrai...

Name: DreadOut
Summary: DreadOut is a third person supernatural horror game where you play as Linda, a high school student trapped in an old abandoned town. Equipped with her trusty smart-phone, she will battle against terrifying encounters and solve mysterious puzzles which will ultimately determine her fate.

Name: Beyond Good & Evil
Summary: Gioca nei panni di Jade, una giovane reporter investigativa, e svela una terribile cospirazione del governo. Tu e il tuo fedele amico maiale Pey'j dovrete salvare il pianeta e i suoi abitanti.

Name: Mafia
Summary: Corre l'anno 1930. Dopo uno sfortunato incontro con la mafia, Tommy Angelo, tassista, si ritrova coinvolto suo malgrado nel mondo della criminalità organizzata. Entrare in combutta con la famiglia Salieri può sembrare un rischio troppo grande, ma il crimine paga, e tanto. La sua scalata ai ranghi lo porterà a guadagni sempre maggiori...

Name: Salammbo: Battle for Carthage
Summary: Inspired by the novel of Gustave Flaubert and the works of Phillippe Druillet, Salammbo: Battle for Carthage puts you in the middle of two of antiquities greatest powers. Can you deliver Salammbo's message before it's too late?

Name: Stronghold HD
Summary: Tassate, torturate o curate i vostri contadini! Riabilitare i criminali o condannarli? Decidete mentre giostrate ad un sontuoso banchetto, il tutto sotto l’assedio da parte del guerrafondaio Lord Barclay.

Name: Retaliation
Summary: Can you find the answers lost deep within your memory.

Name: Devil's Toy
Summary: Devil's Toy is a first person horror game, is set in the middle of a cornfield, with you as the protagonist of a terrifying experience where you face the role of a child who is alone at home with a doll of unknown origin and does not give a good vibes.

Name: Call of Duty
Summary: Nessun altro gioco come Call of Duty® può farti vivere così intensamente i momenti più epici della Seconda Guerra Mondiale visti dalla prospettiva di tre soldati di nazioni diverse riunite nella lotta per cambiare il corso della storia moderna.

Name: B-17 Flying Fortress: The Mighty 8th
Summary: Feel the power of really flying a B-17! See what it was like to be part of the 10-man crew on dangerous bombing missions over occupied Europe.

Name: Prey
Summary: In Prey, ti risveglierai a bordo della Talos I, una stazione spaziale che orbita la luna nel 2032. Indossi i panni dell’oggetto di un esperimento destinato a cambiare per sempre l’umanità, ma le cose hanno preso una terribile piega. La stazione spaziale è stata invasa da alieni ostili che hanno iniziato a darti la caccia.

Name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines
Summary: Vampire®: Masquerade-Bloodlines™ propone un nuovo tipo di RPG, che fonde tutti gli elementi principali di un RPG tradizionale arricchiti con la vividezza grafica, l'immediatezza e i brutali combattimenti tipici di un gioco d'azione in prima persona.

Name: Sid Meier's Civilization IV
Summary: Con più di 6 milioni di copie vendute e critiche entusiastiche da parte di appassionati e della stampa di tutto il mondo, Sid Meier's Civilization è riconosciuto come una delle migliori serie di giochi per PC di tutti i tempi.

Name: Dungeons & Dragons Online
Summary: Enter a world of danger and adventure with Dungeons & Dragons Online® based on the beloved RPG that started it all.

Name: eFootball PES 2021 Season Update
Summary: Prova un realismo e un'autenticità senza eguali nel gioco di calcio definitivo di quest'anno: PES 2020.

Name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
Summary: Il Dr. Eggman (anche conosciuto come Dr. Robotnik) è tornato, trasformando degli indifesi animaletti in temibili robot e costringendoli a costruire la sua arma definitiva, il Death Egg! Ma questa volta Sonic ha un amico in grado di dargli una mano: Tails! Trova i 7 Smeraldi del Chaos e ferma le diaboliche macchinazioni del Dr. Robotnik!

Name: Fast Food Rampage
Summary: A hilarious arcade shooter about blasting people with junk food until they explode. It’s delicious!

Name: Terror
Summary: What happened with human, who stay in subway... on the all night?

Name: Star Wars: Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy
Summary: Forge your weapon and follow the path of the Jedi Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy is the latest installment of the highly acclaimed Jedi Knight series. Take on the role of a new student eager to learn the ways of the Force from Jedi Master Luke Skywalker.

Name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
Summary: Welcome to Vice City. Welcome to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair, excess and pastel suits comes a story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile.

Name: Movie World
Summary: In Movie World you can build your own movie studio. Produce entertaining and glamorous movies. Research new technologies to keep up with the industry. Expand into series, compete with other studios, receive the awards, create franchises and prevail in the movie business.

Name: Borderlands: Game of the Year Enhanced
Summary: Get ready for the mind blowing insanity! Play as one of four trigger-happy mercenaries and take out everything that stands in your way! With its addictive action, frantic first-person shooter combat, massive arsenal of weaponry, RPG elements and four-player co-op, Borderlands is a breakthrough experience that challenges all the...

Name: Worms Armageddon
Summary: Those intrepid invertebrates return with a vengeance in the much-loved Worms™ Armageddon. It’s a whole new can of worms! It’s hilarious fun that you can enjoy on your own or with all your friends.

Name: BioShock
Summary: BioShock is a shooter unlike any you've ever played, loaded with weapons and tactics never seen. You'll have a complete arsenal at your disposal from simple revolvers to grenade launchers and chemical throwers, but you'll also be forced to genetically modify your DNA to create an even more deadly weapon: you.

Name: Dream Daddy: Dadrector's Cut
Summary: Dream Daddy: A Dad Dating Simulator is a game where you play as a Dad and your goal is to meet and romance other hot Dads. Are you ready? Hi ready, I'm Dad.

Name: Last Neighbor
Summary: You play as a young thief who broke into the wrong house, he thought the place was empty because he saw the owners leaving with suitcases, but there was still somebody in the house. It could be dangerous so you have to get out fast.

Name: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind
Summary: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind® Game of the Year Edition comprende sia il contenuto del gioco originale Morrowind che il contenuto delle espansioni Bloodmoon e Tribunal . Il Mod originale Construction Set non è compreso in questo pacchetto.Morrowind è un gioco epico appartenente al genere Role Play Game.

Name: Command & Conquer 3: Tiberium Wars
Summary: The year is 2047. A massive nuclear fireball explodes high in the night sky, marking the dramatic beginning of the Third Tiberium War and the long-awaited return of the most groundbreaking Real-Time Strategy franchise of all time.

Name: The Signifier: Director's Cut
Summary: Questa avventura narrativa segue una trama mystery di morte e disperazione dalla realtà ai regni surreali dei ricordi oggettivi e delle esperienze soggettive. Esplora la mente, risolvi enigmi e svela l'oscura verità in questo thriller psicologico.

Name: Nancy Drew: Curse of Blackmoor Manor
Summary: Delve into Dark Legends Lurking in the Shadow of an Old English Mansion!

Name: Secret Files: Tunguska
Summary: Unravel one of the greatest mysteries of our time! On the 30th June 1908 an explosion with the combined energy of 2000 Hiroshima bombs rocked the region of Tunguska in Central Siberia and felled over 6,000 square km of trees. The explosion could be heard from as far as 1,000km away.

Name: Ys Origin
Summary: The perfect mix of action, exploration and story with screen-filling bosses, unique platforming elements, and innovative puzzles.

Name: HELLSEED
Summary: Be careful and don't panic, someone will try to catch you and take you to hell...

Name: Death Rally
Summary: Load your guns, start your engines...THE CLASSIC IS BACK! Brought to you from Remedy, renowned developers of Max Payne and Alan Wake, Remedy's Death Rally classic top down racer is back, stronger and more vicious than ever.

Name: Supreme Commander: Forged Alliance
Summary: For a thousand years, three opposing forces have waged war for what they believe is true. There can be no room for compromise: their way is the only way. Dubbed The Infinite War, this devastating conflict has taken its toll on a once-peaceful galaxy and has only served to deepen the hatred between the factions.

Name: Just Cause
Summary: https://store.steampowered.com/app/680420/OUTRIDERS/Your world...Your rules! In Just Cause, you are a Latin field operative and specialist in regime change backed by top secret US government agency who will overthrow the corrupt government of San Esperito.

Name: Team Fortress 2
Summary: Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities. Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats!

Name: Garbage
Summary: Experience the struggle which a homeless man goes through in a humorous manner. Primitive elements of contemporary life that we take for granted, such as staying warm, well-nourished, and hygienic, will become an issue.

Name: Killer7
Summary: Sneak into a world of underground assassins as Harman Smith, a man who manifests 7 deadly personalities, the killer7. Take control of this distinct murderers' row as they hunt down the sinister Kun Lan to thwart his plan of world dominance.

Name: Mosaics Galore
Summary: Save the magical pets from imprisonment! Travel through the most enchanting scenes of a fantasy kingdom.

Name: Dracula: Resurrection
Summary: A fright-filled Adventure that transpires in the heart of Transylvania. London 1904. Seven years after the slaying of Dracula, you play as Jonathan Harker, (the protagonist from Bram Stoker's original novel) and soon discover your wife, Mina has fled London for the Count's castle in Transylvania. Has Mina fallen prey to vampires?

Name: Artifact
Summary: Artifact ora è composto da due giochi: Artifact Classic, la versione originale del gioco di carte collezionabili di Dota 2, e Artifact Foundry, un'edizione speciale com un gameplay rinnovato, nuove carte, nuovi contenuti per giocatore singolo e un'esperienza globale nuova.

Name: Killer Instinct
Summary: Una delle saghe più celebri dei picchiaduro torna sul ring con una grafica rinnovata, un'azione di gioco incessante e uno straordinario cast di protagonisti, oltre a musiche interattive e le immancabili ANTIC-C-COMBO!

Name: Kygo 'Carry Me' VR Experience
Summary: Join superstar electronic musician Kygo in this incredible virtual reality experience inspired by the hit song “Carry Me.

Name: Fragile
Summary: Get pulled into the nightmares of reality as you play as an abducted girl from the ger district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Uncover a secret organization that deals in human trafficking and other horrendous activities. Try to escape from the scariest place on earth!

Name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
Summary: It is four thousand years before the Galactic Empire and hundreds of Jedi Knights have fallen in battle against the ruthless Sith. You are the last hope of the Jedi Order. Can you master the awesome power of the Force on your quest to save the Republic? Or will you fall to the lure of the dark side?

Name: The Witness
Summary: Ti svegli, solo, su un'isola misteriosa e costellata di enigmi impegnativi e sorprendenti.

Name: Buddy Simulator 1984
Summary: Thanks to next generation AI technology, BUDDY SIMULATOR 1984 simulates the experience of hanging out with a best buddy! Your buddy learns from you, constantly adapting to your interests and personality. But most importantly, your buddy can play games with you!

Name: Company of Heroes
Summary: Profonda esperienza di gioco sulla Seconda Guerra Mondiale, Company of Heroes rinnova gli strategici presentando il sacrificio dei soldati, ambienti distrutti dalla guerra e campi di battaglia dinamici.

Name: Sonic Adventure 2
Summary: Due avventure diverse con gli eroi classici e il ritorno dei nemici storici, nella lotta per il destino del mondo.

Name: Heroes of Might and Magic V
Summary: Assisti alla magnifica evoluzione del classico che ha cambiato completamente il genere strategico mentre diventa un fenomeno, fondendo il profondo genere fantasy con visuali e giocabilità di nuova generazione.Nel celebre universo di Might & Magic, orde di demoni spargono il caos su tutta la terra in un'assalto inarrestabile.

Name: LOST EGG
Summary: The first of low-price series of Kimidorisoft! A hard action adventure game depicting raw egg ecstasy and bravery.Aim for a frying pan that rolls past various stages with awkward music.

Name: Stronghold
Summary: Tassate, torturate o curate i vostri contadini! Riabilitare i criminali o condannarli? Decidete mentre giostrate ad un sontuoso banchetto, il tutto sotto l’assedio da parte del guerrafondaio Lord Barclay.

Name: Airplane Mode
Summary: “Airplane Mode” offre tutte le emozioni di un volo di linea di sei ore. In tempo reale. In classe economica. Per fortuna hai un posto finestrino. Allaccia la cintura.

Name: Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft
Summary: Thousands of years ago a meteor crashed into Antarctica and the shockwaves of its impact are being felt in the modern age. Lara Croft will follow clues leading to a deadly secret, boldly leaping chasms and blasting monsters that no one has leaped or blasted before. This time she faces a mystery that's from way out of this world.

Name: Insaniquarium
Summary: The craziest aquarium game ever! Tend to your fish, keep them happy and they'll reward you with coins and jewels. Buy tank upgrades or egg parts which hatch different in-tank pets. These pets can help you feed your fish, collect coins, or even protect against the aliens that will invade your tank.

Name: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark
Summary: Purifica la stanza con la salvia e metti in valigia la tua tavola ouija da viaggio: è ora di tornare a Twin Lakes, la 34ª città più infestata d’America. Segui il detective McQueen in sei casi da brivido, in cui rischierà la vita e le sue membra pixellate per risolvere i macabri misteri della città.

Name: Gothic
Summary: War has been waged across the kingdom of Myrtana. Orcish hordes invaded human territory and the king of the land needed a lot of ore to forge enough weapons, should his army stand against this threat. Whoever breaks the law in these darkest of times is sentenced to serve in the giant penal colony of Khorinis, mining the so much needed...

Name: Rome: Total War
Summary: Control and conquer the greatest empire ever known to man.

Name: Disney's Aladdin
Summary: Join Aladdin and his pet monkey, Abu, as they race through the marketplace toward their date with destiny. Now, Aladdin will have the chance to spoil Jafar’s devious plans and win the hand of the beautiful princess Jasmine.

Name: Haunted Gas Station
Summary: After a vehicle accident, a man is forced to check a nearby gas station for help, unaware of its ghastly resident.

Name: Pilot Brothers
Summary: Il caso dell'elefante rubato! Un elefante... Un esemplare raro... A strisce. ...Prigioniero da molti anni di un commerciante di animali di nome Carbofosso. E non riuscendo più a tollerare le percosse, scappò, trovò rifugio nello zoo della nostra città. Qui c'è sicuramente lo zampino di Carbofosso! Andiamo allo zoo!

Name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion
Summary: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion® Game of the Year Edition (Edizione dell'Anno) presenta il miglior gioco di ruolo di tutti i tempi. Senza precedenti. Varca le soglie di un mondo fantastico, vibrante, dipinto con opulenza di dettagli, più che in qualunque altro gioco.

Name: Zuma Deluxe
Summary: Deep in the jungle lie hidden temples bursting with traps and trickery, and it's up to you to uncover their treasures. Fire magical balls from your stone frog idol to make matches of three or more and clear the deadly chain before it reaches the golden skull.

Name: Rain on Your Parade
Summary: Travel the world as a cute cardboard cloud and ruin everybody's day! Unlock new methods of mischief in over 50 levels, each with unique setting and objectives. Make new friends and help them too - it's an adorable schadenfreude game!

Name: Midnight Club II
Summary: The world's most notorious drivers meet each night on the streets of LA, Paris, and Tokyo. Choose from a collection of performance-enhanced cars or bikes and compete head-to-head to make a name for yourself. There are no rules. Drive anywhere in the city. Find the fastest route to win.

Name: X-COM: UFO Defense
Summary: You are in control of X-COM: an organization formed by the world's governments to fight the ever-increasing alien menace.

Name: Grand Theft Auto IV
Summary: Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz e Luis Lopez hanno tutti una cosa in comune: vivono nella peggior città di tutta l'America. Liberty City è una città che venera denaro e status, un paradiso per chi li possiede entrambi, ma un incubo per chi non ha né l'uno né l'altro.

Name: MineSweeper
Summary: Diventa un esperto nello sminamento! MineSweeper è un puzzle game il cui obiettivo è localizzare mine nascoste in un campo virtuale con l'unica indicazione del numero di mine nelle aree adiacenti.

Name: Borderlands
Summary: Get ready for the mind blowing insanity! Play as one of four trigger-happy mercenaries and take out everything that stands in your way! With its addictive action, frantic first-person shooter combat, massive arsenal of weaponry, RPG elements and four-player co-op, Borderlands is a breakthrough experience that challenges all the...

Name: Empire: Total War
Summary: Domina i mari, controlla le terre, forgia una nuova nazione e conquista il globo.

Name: Fallout 3
Summary: Vault-Tec engineers have worked around the clock on an interactive reproduction of Wasteland life for you to enjoy from the comfort of your own vault. Included is an expansive world, unique combat, shockingly realistic visuals, tons of player choice, and an incredible cast of dynamic characters.

Name: Mafia II
Summary: Vito Scaletta has started to make a name for himself on the streets of Empire Bay as someone who can be trusted to get a job done. Together with his buddy Joe, he is working to prove himself to the Mafia, quickly escalating up the family ladder with crimes of larger reward, status and consequence… the life as a wise guy isn’t quite as...

Name: Resident Evil 5
Summary: Questo titolo è la trasposizione della versione Games for Windows - Live rilasciata nel 2009. Se acquisti l'Untold Stories Bundle su Steam, sarà come aggiornare la tua versione a Resident Evil 5 Gold Edition.

Name: The Sims 3
Summary: The Sims 3: Create the perfect world with full customization at your fingertips. Refine personalities and help fulfill destinies.

Name: Garry's Mod
Summary: Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

Name: de Blob
Summary: Solo de Blob, eroe birichino e improbabile, è in grado di affrontare con salti, rimbalzi e lanci la potente I.N.K.T. Corporation per innescare la rivoluzione e salvare Chroma City da un futuro senza colori.

Name: Final Fantasy XIII
Summary: Final Fantasy XIII is a fantasy RPG in which a band of brave humans struggle against fate in the utopian sky city of Cocoon and the primeval world of Pulse. Follow stylish heroine Lightning's fast paced battles and high adventure in a mysterious new world.

Name: Left 4 Dead
Summary: Ultima novità da Valve, dai creatori di Counter-Strike, Half-Life e tanti altri titoli: Left 4 Dead è il nuovo gioco per PC e Xbox 360 in cui quattro "Survivor" dovranno sopravvivere a un'epica lotta contro orde di zombi insaziabili e terrificanti "Infected speciali" mutanti.

Name: Bayonetta
Summary: L’acclamatissimo capolavoro d’azione di PlatinumGames è sbarcato finalmente su PC. Immergiti in momenti d’azione frenetici e pieni di stile a 60 fps e a risoluzioni in HD sbloccate. L’esperienza di gioco più intensa: essere cattivi non è mai stato così bello!

Name: Braid
Summary: Braid is a puzzle-platformer, drawn in a painterly style, where you can manipulate the flow of time in strange and unusual ways. From a house in the city, journey to a series of worlds and solve puzzles to rescue an abducted princess.

Name: Castle Crashers
Summary: Spacca, picchia e schiaccia fino a ottenere la vittoria in questa premiata avventura arcade 2D di The Behemoth!

Name: Dragon Age: Origins
Summary: When history tells the story of the Fifth Blight, what will be said about the hero who turned the tide against the darkspawn? Determine your legacy and fight for Thedas as a noble dwarf, an elf far from home, a mage apprentice, or a customized hero of your own design.

Name: Everhood
Summary: An UNCONVENTIONAL ADVENTURE RPG that takes place in an inexpressible world filled with amusing musical battles and strange delightful encounters. To put it simply: You are in for a ride.

Name: Call of Duty: World at War
Summary: Call of Duty is back, redefining war like you've never experienced before. Building on the Call of Duty 4®: Modern Warfare engine, Call of Duty: World at War immerses players into the most gritty and chaotic WWII combat ever experienced.

Name: Dead Space
Summary: You are Isaac Clarke, an engineer on the spacecraft USG Ishimura. You're not a warrior. You're not a soldier. You are, however, the last line of defense for the remaining living crew.

Name: BioShock 2
Summary: Ambientato approssimativamente 10 anni dopo gli eventi del primo BioShock, nei saloni di Rapture ricompaiono ancora i peccati del passato. Lungo la costa Atlantica, un mostro ha rapito delle bambine e le ha riportate nelle profondità della città di Rapture.

Name: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm
Summary: NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM consente ai giocatori di combattere all'interno di enormi ambienti 3D. I giocatori possono utilizzare potenti tecniche, si esibiscono in acrobatiche manovre evasive e possono persino correre sulle pareti. NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM è stato rimasterizzato in HD.

Name: Valkyria Chronicles
Summary: The critically acclaimed Valkyria Chronicles is now available on PC in 1080p True HD, including all previously released DLC!

Name: Alan Wake
Summary: A Dark Presence stalks the small town of Bright Falls, pushing Alan Wake to the brink of sanity in his fight to unravel the mystery and save his love.

Name: APB Reloaded
Summary: The world’s first and premier Action MMO Third Person Shooter allows you to choose between two sides of the law. Play as Enforcer or Criminal, customize your gear for the task at hand and hit the streets and play how you want in a city filled with more action this side of a Hollywood blockbuster.

Name: Darksiders
Summary: Deceived by the forces of evil into prematurely bringing about the end of the world, War – the first Horseman of the Apocalypse – stands accused of breaking the sacred law by inciting a war between Heaven and Hell. In the slaughter that ensued, the demonic forces defeated the heavenly hosts and laid claim to the Earth.

Name: DC Universe Online
Summary: DC Universe Online is a Free-to-Play, massive multiplayer online action game set in the popular DC Comics universe. Become one of a new breed of Heroes or Villains and wield incredible powers as you go to war with legendary characters such as Batman, Superman, Lex Luthor and The Joker.

Name: Flower
Summary: Prova il premiatissimo Flower, ora disponibile su PC. Flower ti consente di assumere il controllo del vento mentre esplori e ti fai strada in ambienti magnifici e rigogliosi usando i comandi di movimento.

Name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II
Summary: Con un'enfasi sulla giocabilità veloce RTS, Dawn of War II porta in vita l'universo fantascientifico di Warhammer 40.000, come mai prima d'ora. Prova sulla tua pelle la brutalità della battaglia mentre fai progressi nell'epica campagna della razza a cui hai scelto di appartenere.

Name: Mirror's Edge
Summary: In a city where information is heavily monitored, couriers called Runners transport sensitive data. In this seemingly utopian paradise, a crime has been committed, & you are being hunted. You are a Runner called Faith and this innovative first-person action-adventure is your story.

Name: Uncharted Waters Online
Summary: Discover yourself in the “Age of Discovery” where you’ll sail out into the uncharted waters! Discover real historical artifacts and mystical legends! Start a company and make enormous fortunes! Fight in fierce sea battles! Whatever your play style, you can play who you want and how you want in UWO!

Name: Tales of Symphonia
Summary: PER LA PRIMA VOLTA SU STEAM – Basato sulla versione PlayStation®3 del titolo originale per GameCube, questo classico GDR è finalmente disponibile su PC.

Name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky
Summary: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky – standalone prequel for the acclaimed S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl, which tells you story about the Clear Sky group, that want to research the Zone and understand it better.

Name: Quake Live
Summary: From the legendary series that founded the online shooter genre comes the most exciting, energetic, and fast-paced shooter on the Internet. Play against players around the world in over 100 arenas, and a dozen game modes, in one of the most competitive shooters online today. Welcome to Quake Live.

Name: From Darkness
Summary: From the darkness of the forest, bandits and looters will aim to destroy your way of life and demolish your livelihood. With the help of vagabonds and villagers, build a thriving town, raise an army and defend your home. Each night brings with it more enemies, so be sure to keep up.

Name: Majesty 2: The Fantasy Kingdom Sim
Summary: In the world of Majesty, you are the ruler of the kingdom Ardania. At your service are your loyal and somewhat obnoxious subordinates, who have their own minds about how things should be done. In fact, Majesty is the only game where your heroes decide on their own what should be done and when, leaving you to try to control them through...

Name: iRacing
Summary: We are the world’s premier motorsports racing simulation/game. An iRacing.com membership provides entry into the newest form of competitive motorsport: internet racing. Internet racing is a fun, easy, and inexpensive way for race fans, simracers and gamers alike to enjoy the thrill of the racetrack from the comfort of their home.

Name: L.A. Noire
Summary: L.A. Noire is a violent crime thriller that blends breathtaking action with true detective work to deliver an unprecedented interactive experience. Search for clues, chase down suspects and interrogate witnesses as you struggle to find the truth in a city where everyone has something to hide.

Name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
Summary: The new action-thriller from the award-winning team at Infinity Ward, the creators of the Call of Duty® series, delivers the most intense and cinematic action experience ever. Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare arms gamers with an arsenal of advanced and powerful modern day firepower and transports them to the most treacherous hotspots...

Name: Dwarf Fortress
Summary: The deepest, most intricate simulation of a world that's ever been created. The legendary Dwarf Fortress is now on Steam. Build a fortress and try to help your dwarves survive, OR adventure as a single hero against a deeply generated world.

Name: Mass Effect 2
Summary: Recruit. Explore. Control.Two years after Commander Shepard repelled invading Reapers bent on the destruction of organic life, a mysterious new enemy has emerged. On the fringes of known space, something is silently abducting entire human colonies.

Name: Portal 2
Summary: The "Perpetual Testing Initiative" has been expanded to allow you to design co-op puzzles for you and your friends!

Name: Robo Instructus
Summary: Robo Instructus is a puzzle game in which players manoeuvre a robot by issuing instructions via a simple programming language. As players progress through the game they unlock new functions to overcome new puzzles, each of which can be solved in multiple ways.

Name: Journey
Summary: Esplora il mondo antico e misterioso di Journey, scoprine i segreti planando sulle sue rovine e librandoti su distese di sabbia.

Name: Star Trek Online
Summary: In Star Trek Online, the Star Trek universe appears for the first time on a truly massive scale. Players take the captain's chair as they command their own starship and crew. Explore strange new worlds, seek out new life and new civilizations, and boldly go where no one has gone before.

Name: Wildfire
Summary: Master the elements in this stealth game where everything burns. Use your elemental powers to start fires, freeze water, and move earth as you outsmart superstitious enemies in this mischievous 2D stealth game.

Name: MapleStory
Summary: Unisciti ad altri 260 milioni di giocatori di MapleStory, la più grande avventura MMORPG 2D! Gioca gratis subito!

Name: Shadow Man Remastered
Summary: He is coming, stalking criminals in the spirit world and the real world. A possessed man is coming, a voodoo mask in his chest and lines of power in his back. Shadow Man is coming, trailing evil from Liveside to Deadside. To stop an apocalypse. To save your soul.

Name: CABAL Online
Summary: The original revolution of action has arrived on Steam. Put your skills to the test in one of the most renowned action-oriented and diverse MMORPG experiences of all time. Play now for free!

Name: BioShock Remastered
Summary: BioShock is a shooter unlike any you've ever played, loaded with weapons and tactics never seen. You'll have a complete arsenal at your disposal from simple revolvers to grenade launchers and chemical throwers, but you'll also be forced to genetically modify your DNA to create an even more deadly weapon: you.

Name: Angry Video Game Nerd I & II Deluxe
Summary: "The most rewarding game of 2013!" Influenced by retro classics Mega Man and Castlevania, Angry Video Game Nerd Adventures features the AVGN and friends as they blast their way through 10 levels of fun, fast paced 2D action based on the AVGN's adventures in his online series.

Name: BARRICADEZ
Summary: BARRICADEZ is a side-view tower defense game. Collect materials and items underground, craft or process it, and setup a base to protect a baby's cradle from enemies that appear and attack at night. Arrange a wide variety of traps and blocks to build a unique base in the world, and repel enemies.

Name: Rogue State Revolution
Summary: Greetings your Excellency. Time to rebuild, reform and prepare for new challenges in the People's Republic of Basenji. In this thrilling political strategy, you will appoint ministers and lead the country to success. Be careful — you may find yourself replaced in the next election.

Name: Florensia
Summary: Florensia è un MMORPG gratuito con una grafica 3D superba che con il suo stile anime ti mostra il suo leggendario mondo sia via terra che in mare. Isole misteriose, il grande oceano, sotterranei, pittoreschi pirati e pericolosissimi mostri non aspettano altro di essere esplorati.

Name: Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets
Summary: In Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets you are secret agent which went to unusual forest. You need to find out the reason of people disappearing. During the investigation you need to unravel the mystery of the forest, collecting notes and documents of disappeared people and try to stay alive.

Name: Nancy Drew: The Haunting of Castle Malloy
Summary: Unveil a Ghostly Legend and Find a Vanished Groom!

Name: Mafia II: Definitive Edition
Summary: Vito Scaletta has started to make a name for himself on the streets of Empire Bay as someone who can be trusted to get a job done. Together with his buddy Joe, he is working to prove himself to the Mafia, quickly escalating up the family ladder with crimes of larger reward, status and consequence… the life as a wise guy isn’t quite as...

Name: Dofus
Summary: ENTRA IN UN UNIVERSO SCONFINATO. Accedi al Mondo dei Dodici e parti per un'avventura grandiosa in DOFUS, un MMORPG in cui il divertimento va a braccetto con battaglie piene di azione e strategia.

Name: Mortal Kombat XL
Summary: "Assapora la nuova generazione della saga di combattimento numero 1. Mortal Kombat X combina animazioni cinematografiche uniche a un nuovo stile di gioco.

Name: Assassin's Creed II
Summary: An epic story of family, vengeance and conspiracy set in the pristine, yet brutal, backdrop of a Renaissance Italy. New low price!

Name: Risen
Summary: L'isola di Faranga ha bisogno di un nuovo eroe, tu!Tuffati in un atmosferico mondo fantasy duro e crudo, in cui ogni azione ha una conseguenza. Nell'epico mondo di Risen, scosso da misteriosi terremoti, terrificanti mostri e tesori inimmaginabili, forgia il tuo destino con la spada, impara l'arte del combattimento col bastone oppure...

Name: Metro: Last Light Redux
Summary: It is the year 2034. Beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the tunnels of the Metro, the remnants of mankind are besieged by deadly threats from outside – and within. Mutants stalk the catacombs beneath the desolate surface, and hunt amidst the poisoned skies above.

Name: 狼人杀单机版
Summary: This is a game of character reasoning, the stand-alone version of Werewolf

Name: Business Wars - The Card Game
Summary: Business wars is a hardcore mix of strategy battles and business theory card game. Use your unique deck facing the business world situation, discover all possible strategy, and be the TOP 1 CEO in the business world!

Name: Wurm Online
Summary: A sandbox MMORPG that has pushed the boundaries on what it means to be open world and stood the test of time. Dig, mine, shape the world around you and make your lasting mark!

Name: Batman: Arkham Asylum
Summary: Sperimenta sulla tua stessa pelle cosa significhi essere Batman, e affronta i più grandi criminali di Gotham City. Esplora ogni centimetro quadrato dell'Arkham Asylum, e muoviti liberamente per la famigerata isola.

Name: Grand Theft Auto IV: The Ballad of Gay Tony
Summary: Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz e Luis Lopez hanno tutti una cosa in comune: vivono nella peggior città di tutta l'America. Liberty City è una città che venera denaro e status, un paradiso per chi li possiede entrambi, ma un incubo per chi non ha né l'uno né l'altro.

Name: Wakfu
Summary: Accedi al Mondo dei Dodici e parti per un'avventura grandiosa in WAKFU, un MMORPG in cui il divertimento va a braccetto con battaglie piene di azione e strategia. Scala il monte Zinit alla ricerca di Ogrest, lo spaventoso orco fautore del cataclisma che ha distrutto il Mondo, o esplora liberamente l'arcipelago dove si lavora senza sosta...

Name: Inunaki Tunnel
Summary: Inunaki tunnel (or Inunaki village) is a famous Japanese horror spot where people have been killed or burnt to death.

Name: Radio Station
Summary: Radio Station is a single-player first-person game in which you have to get out of the existing situation.

Name: BioShock 2 Remastered
Summary: Ambientato approssimativamente 10 anni dopo gli eventi del primo BioShock, nei saloni di Rapture ricompaiono ancora i peccati del passato. Lungo la costa Atlantica, un mostro ha rapito delle bambine e le ha riportate nelle profondità della città di Rapture.

Name: Machinarium
Summary: Machinarium è un pluripremiato gioco indipendente di avventura sviluppato dai realizzatori di Samorost e Botanicula. Aiuta il robot Josef a salvare la sua fidanzata Berta rapita dalla banda delle Capinere!

Name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine
Summary: In Warhammer® 40,000® Space Marine ® interpreti il capitano Tito, uno Space Marine del Capitolo degli Ultramarine e un esperto veterano temprato da innumerevoli battaglie.

Name: Call of Duty 2
Summary: Call of Duty® 2 ricrea l'intensità visiva e il caos della battaglia visti con gli occhi di tre soldati che combattono fianco a fianco sugli epici teatri di scontro della Seconda Guerra Mondiale. Call of Duty 2, sequel del gioco vincitore di oltre 80 riconoscimenti come Gioco dell'anno 2003, offre battaglie ancora più estese, intense e...

Name: Company of Heroes: Tales of Valor
Summary: Profonda esperienza di gioco sulla Seconda Guerra Mondiale, Company of Heroes rinnova gli strategici presentando il sacrificio dei soldati, ambienti distrutti dalla guerra e campi di battaglia dinamici.

Name: Max Payne
Summary: Max Payne is a man with nothing to lose in the violent, cold urban night. A fugitive undercover cop framed for murder, hunted by cops and the mob, Max is a man with his back against the wall, fighting a battle he cannot hope to win.

Name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
Summary: Il più anticipato Gioco dell'Anno, sequel del titolo d'azione in prima persona più venduto di tutti i tempi, Modern Warfare 2 porta avanti l'avvincentente azione al cardiopalma, in cui, stavolta, il giocatore è chiamato a fronteggiare una nuova minaccia che mira a portare il mondo sull'orlo del collasso.

Name: Call Of Juarez: Bound In Blood
Summary: IL VECCHIO WEST, 1864. Pur di salvare la loro famiglia, i fratelli McCall sono disposti a uccidere chiunque cerchi di ostacolarli nella ricerca del leggendario oro di Juarez.

Name: Sonic the Hedgehog
Summary: Il crudele scienziato Dr. Eggman (alias Dr. Robotnik) ha rapito i poveri animali di South Island e li ha trasformati in robot. Solamente un eroe è in grado di sconfiggere il Dr. Eggman e salvare gli animali dalle sue grinfie malefiche: stiamo parlando del porcospino super-figo dagli aculei blu, Sonic!

Name: Super Meat Boy
Summary: Il platform infame, duro come il granito, giunge su Steam col personaggio selezionabile Head Crab (esclusiva di Steam)!

Name: Dead Rising 2
Summary: The sequel to the million-plus selling Dead Rising, Dead Rising 2 takes the zombie survival horror to Fortune City, America’s latest and greatest entertainment playground.

Name: Dead Space 2
Summary: L'INCUBO RITORNA.

Name: Split/Second
Summary: Split/Second is an intense action racing game set within a reality TV show. Competitors vie to be the first to the finish line in a set rigged to blow. Players don’t just collide with other vehicles to knock them from the track, but can also trigger devastating events that alter the race dynamics.

Name: Mount & Blade: Warband
Summary: In una terra devastata dalle guerre continue, è giunta l'ora di mettere assieme la tua squadra di combattenti temprati e buttarsi nella mischia. Guida i tuoi uomini nella battaglia, espandi il tuo reame, e reclama il premio finale: il trono di Calradia!

Name: theHunter Classic
