Experience intuitive and tight 2D fighter controls, with a splash of devastating combos and unique fighting styles to keep your appetite for battle sated!

Name: Those Who Remain
Summary: Con il calare delle luci, nella sonnolenta città di Dormont le tenebre si risvegliano dal torpore. Affronta indicibili orrori, mantieni la sanità mentale e sopravvivi alla notte in questo thriller psicologico in prima persona.

Name: Scribble It!
Summary: Adrenaline fueled, fast paced drawing action. Draw fast, type faster and win it all! THOUSANDS of official words in 12 different languages. 4 multiplayer game modes with up to 16 players and a singleplayer mode. We take you back to the heated pictionary games everyone had in school!

Name: Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp
Summary: "Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp" brings you more of the world's best (and maybe only?) multiplayer dating sim; but in a way you've never expected!

Name: Frog Detective 2: The Case of the Invisible Wizard
Summary: You're a detective, and a frog, and it's time to solve a mystery. Also there's a wizard.

Name: Peekaboo
Summary: Peekaboo - nascondi e cerca sulla rete.I giocatori sono divisi in due squadre: oggetti di scena e cacciatori.I puntelli prendono la forma di oggetti e adottano le loro proprietà fisiche, e i cacciatori stanno cercando con tutte le loro forze di trovarli.

Name: DARQ
Summary: DARQ racconta la storia di Lloyd, un ragazzo che si rende conto di star sognando. Per sfortuna di Lloyd, però, il sogno rapidamente si trasforma in un incubo e tutti i tentativi di risvegliarsi finiscono col fallire.

Name: Chicory: A Colorful Tale
Summary: A top-down adventure game in a coloring book world full of vibrant characters. Use painting powers to explore, solve puzzles, make friends, and draw on anything! From creators on Wandersong + Celeste.

Name: Chicken Police
Summary: Chicken Police è un'avventura noir "animalesca" ambientata in un universo fittizio: le Lande Oscure. Una coinvolgente storia a tinte fosche, tematiche da bollino rosso e un humour assurdamente unico.

Name: Ghostrunner
Summary: Ghostrunner offre un'esperienza unica per giocatore singolo: combattimenti veloci e violenti e un'ambientazione originale che fonde la fantascienza con temi post-apocalittici. Racconta la storia di un mondo già finito e dei suoi abitanti che lottano per sopravvivere.

Name: HUMANKIND
Summary: HUMANKIND™ è il magnum opus di Amplitude Studios, un gioco storico di strategia in cui dovrai riscrivere la storia del genere umano: l'unione di cultura, storia e valori ti consentiranno di forgiare una civiltà unica. FINO A DOVE GUIDERAI IL GENERE UMANO?

Name: theFisher Online
Summary: Fisher Online - online wild fishing simulator. Forget about licenses and catch rates. Choose bait or lures and catch fish in Europe and Russia.

Name: Fault
Summary: At the intersection of colliding universes, you bring your Hero to fight for the survival of your world. Become imbued with power from your Aspects and equip yourself with your Factions' legendary gear in this next-gen, action-packed, third-person MOBA. Prepare yourself for battle at the FAULT.

Name: Everspace 2
Summary: EVERSPACE™ 2 è un frenetico sparatutto spaziale a giocatore singolo con esplorazione, tonnellate di tesori e classici elementi GdR. Vivi una storia avvincente ambientata in un mondo aperto intenso, creato a mano, pieno di segreti e pericoli che si metteranno sulla tua strada per diventare umano.

Name: ACRON: Attack of the Squirrels!
Summary: WARNING: This is a highly addictive VR game and must be played with at least one other person who joins the game on a mobile device. The mobile game for iOS and Android is free.

Name: Pirates Outlaws
Summary: Pirates Outlaws is a roguelike card game in which you navigate dangerous seas and challenge their masters. Your expedition will be full of ambushes and will not be easy. Build your deck and combos to become a reputed pirate.

Name: Blazing Sails
Summary: Combatti per la sopravvivenza in Blazing Sails, una Battle Royale piratesca! Crea il tuo pirata e la tua nave. Sali a bordo della nave e salpa con una ciurma di giocatori. Naviga in mare aperto ed esplora le isole per fare razzia di risorse, armi e potenziamenti. Affonda le navi nemiche per vincere!

Name: Ratropolis
Summary: A fusion of roguelite, tower defense, city-building, and deck-building! We created a new kind of real time strategy game filled with addictive and fast-paced gameplay. Create your deck, defend your city, and build the largest Ratropolis in history!

Name: Solasta: Crown of the Magister
Summary: Roll for initiative, take attacks of opportunity, manage player location and the verticality of the battle field in this upcoming Turn-Based Tactical RPG based on the SRD 5.1 Ruleset. In Solasta, you make the choices, dice decide your destiny.

Name: FAIRY TAIL
Summary: Magia x gilde x RPG = "FAIRY TAIL"! Basato sul fumetto di avventura fantasy avente per protagonisti Natsu, un Dragon Slayer della turbolenta guild magica Fairy Tail, e il suo gruppo di amici, impegnati a combattere contro insoliti e memorabili nemici.

Name: I Love You, Colonel Sanders! A Finger Lickin' Good Dating Simulator
Summary: Welcome to the most delicious dating simulator ever created. Do you have what it takes to be the business partner of and win the heart of the most famous chicken salesman of all time? Play to find out! Go ahead, Colonel Sanders is waiting.

Name: Xeno Crisis
Summary: Xeno Crisis è uno sparatutto in arena nel quale uno o due giocatori entrano in un avamposto di ricerca devastato con l'obiettivo di combattere una minaccia aliena e uscirne vivi! Corri e fatti strada sparando in mezzo a migliaia di avversari, mentre cerchi di individuare la causa scatenante il micidiale attacco alieno.

Name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIV
Summary: Triumph over the land, take charge of the fate of China! Conquer territories and fly your colors!

Name: Resident Evil Resistance
Summary: Lasciati terrorizzare da una nuova esperienza multiplayer online 1 vs 4 ambientata nell'universo di Resident Evil e incentrata sul confronto mortale tra quattro superstiti e un malvagio Mastermind.

Name: Remothered: Broken Porcelain
Summary: Dopo essere stata espulsa da un istituto femminile, la ribelle Jen viene assunta come cameriera all’Ashmann Inn, un hotel pieno di morbosi segreti e minacce. Qui, l’oscuro passato della ragazza riemerge per tormentarla fino a costringerla a fuggire per salvare la sua stessa vita.

Name: Devil Slayer: Raksasi
Summary: Devil Slayer - Raksasi is a top-down action game with procedurally generated dungeons, profound roguelike elements, and intuitive soul-like fighting. It's a fair and challenging game, dodging, timing, striking, you need to master them all to fight your way out of this cursed world.

Name: Later Alligator
Summary: Pat the alligator, a (mostly) harmless and (probably) innocent reptile is at the center of a conspiracy that could bring down the biggest, scariest family in Alligator New York City: his own! Explore the city, meet the Family, and try to save Pat before the clock runs out.

Name: Exit the Gungeon
Summary: Exit the Gungeon è un piccolo spin-off basato sulla risalita di un dungeon e ambientato subito dopo le avventure dei funambolici gungeonisti.

Name: ArcheAge: Unchained
Summary: ArcheAge: Unchained removes the barrier between you and the ultimate MMO experience.

Name: Sword of the Necromancer
Summary: Trasforma i nemici in alleati usando i poteri proibiti della Spada del Negromante e aiuta Tama a raggiungere le profondità del dungeon in modo da ottenere abbastanza potere da riportare in vita Koko. Accumula una piccola armata di mostri, brandisci armi e reliquie per poter affrontare i guardiani.

Name: Meteorfall: Krumit's Tale
Summary: Krumit's Tale, the second game in the Meteorfall universe, is a new take on the deckbuilding roguelike genre. Use your cards to clear dungeons, then upgrade your deck with new cards and perks to press forward. The fate of the world is in your hands.

Name: The Long Drive
Summary: Random generated open world semi-post apocalyptic survival car driving game.

Name: Rising Hell
Summary: Rising Hell is a vertical platformer rogue-lite filled with adrenaline-pumping action and tons of heavy gothic metal shreds. Climb out from the ever-changing hell while you fight hordes of blood-lusting demons.

Name: The Experiment: Escape Room
Summary: "The Experiment" è un gioco rompicapo di fuga dalla stanza per realtà virtuale o PC desktop! Si può giocare in competizione, in cooperazione o da soli.

Name: Exit From
Summary: You wake up from the noise of thunderstorms, no one there. You are trying to get out and realize that after all you are not alone here... Сan You Exit From?

Name: Teardown
Summary: Prepare the perfect heist in this simulated and fully destructible voxel world. Tear down walls with vehicles or explosives to create shortcuts. Stack objects to reach higher. Use the environment to your advantage in the most creative way you can think of.

Name: Football Manager 2020
Summary: Fai contare le tue opinioni e gestisci la squadra come vuoi. Ogni decisione conta in FM20 con nuove caratteristiche e meccaniche di gioco migliorate che aggiungono dimensioni fresche e autentiche, permettendo ai manager di controllare ancora di più il loro destino e quello della squadra.

Name: PowerBeatsVR
Summary: PowerBeatsVR is a high-intensity VR fitness game where you box, dodge, and squat to the rhythm of energetic music. Choose between official songs with leaderboards and dozens of professional workouts or play with your own music using the generator. See those calories burn and your pulse racing.

Name: Crusader Kings III
Summary: Paradox Development Studio ti porta il sequel di uno dei giochi di strategia più popolari di sempre. Crusader Kings III è l'erede di una lunga serie di esperienze nel genere della grand strategy storica e arriva con tante nuove strade con cui portare la tua casata reale al successo.

Name: Timberborn
Summary: Gli esseri umani sono ormai un ricordo del passato. I tuoi castori post-apocalittici riusciranno a fare di meglio? Un city-builder con animali ingegnosi, architetture verticali, deviazione dei fiumi e pericolose siccità. Contiene elevate quantità di legna.

Name: Super Club Soccer
Summary: Super Club Soccer is a FREE TO PLAY, turn based football multiplayer game. Create your player and begin competing in tactical online battles where every player is user controlled. Train your attributes regularly and help your team win tournaments against teams from all over the globe.

Name: Song of Horror
Summary: Song of Horror è un'avventura horror e sopravvivenza a camera fissa. Non sottovalutare «la Presenza»: non puoi batterla, puoi solo temerla, stare allerta, nasconderti, respirare piano... Esplora i luoghi infestati dagli spiriti e dalle anime perdute in questo racconto horror che farà la storia.

Name: Hydroneer
Summary: Hydroneer è un gioco sandbox di scavo e di costruzione. Scava alla ricerca di oro e altre risorse da trasformare in profitto per migliorare la tua operazione di scavo. Costruisci la tua base di operazioni, forgia armi, pesca e scava in profondità!

Name: ChilloutVR
Summary: ChilloutVR is a social sandbox game enabling players and content creators to create, share and explore content in a massive multiplayer metaverse alone, with friends or anyone around the world. Meet new people and explore virtual worlds together. Playable with and without a VR-Headset.

Name: Stigmatized Property | 事故物件
Summary: Stigmatized Property, 事故物件 (Jiko bukken) is a horror game inspired by haunted apartment rooms in Japan. These properties are known to have cheap rents and you play to find out the exact reason why.

Name: Ludo Online
Summary: Ludo Online è un gioco da tavolo di strategia per 2-6 giocatori, nel quale i giocatori fanno avanzare le loro quattro pedine in base ai lanci di un singolo dado.

Name: Dungeon Defenders: Awakened
Summary: Dungeon Defenders: Awakened is co-op Tower Defense combined with epic Action RPG combat. You’re able to join forces with up to four players to take on a never-ending army of orcs, demons, and dragons! Are your defenses strong enough to save the world of Etheria?

Name: Curse of the Dead Gods
Summary: In cerca di inimmaginabili ricchezze, vita eterna e poteri divini, giungi presso questo tempio maledetto: un infinito labirinto di trappole mortali, mostri e fosse senza fondo.

Name: Urtuk: The Desolation
Summary: Urtuk is an open world, tactical turn-based RPG in a low-fantasy setting. Guide your band of adventurers through the ruins of an ancient world. Recruit new followers, loot the corpses of your fallen foes, and do your best to survive in this harsh and unforgiving realm.

Name: Half-Life: Alyx
Summary: Half-Life: Alyx è il ritorno in VR di Valve alla serie Half-Life. La storia, ambientata tra gli eventi di Half-Life e Half-Life 2, è quella della lotta impossibile contro una feroce razza aliena nota con il nome di Combine.

Name: Tools Up!
Summary: Tools Up! è un elettrizzante gioco cooperativo che mette alla prova la tua attitudine per la ristrutturazione e il lavoro di squadra. Dipingi le pareti, strappa la carta da parati e sposta i divani contro il tempo!

Name: King of Retail
Summary: Congratulations on owning your very own store! Design your store layout. Buy and sell goods. Hire and manage your staff, take care of your customers and plan the perfect marketing campaign. Make yours the most popular store in town - but watch out, running a store is not as easy as it sounds!

Name: BatMUD
Summary: BatMUD is a text-based medieval fantasy massively multiplayer online game with an extremely rich set of features - constantly in development since 1990.

Name: Metal Unit
Summary: Metal Unit is a sprawling side-scrolling platformer with roguelite features. Play as Joanna, a soldier on a mission to capture her treasonous sister. Wear the M-Unit 11 suit and battle against monsters and aliens while uncovering the truth about humanity.

Name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York
Summary: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York is a narrative experience set in the rich universe of Vampire: The Masquerade 5th Edition. It presents the struggle for power between two vampiric factions - the Camarilla and the Anarchs - bathed in the night lights of the Big Apple.

Name: Not For Broadcast
Summary: Take control of the National Nightly News as a radical government comes to power. In this immersive, high-pressure, propaganda sim, you control what the people see and determine what’s Not For Broadcast.

Name: Escape the Ayuwoki
Summary: A ritual gone wrong. A string of kidnappings. An Obsession. You wake up in a very strange room, all you know right now is to leave that place as soon as you possibly can. Just be quiet and everything will be alright.

Name: Skul: The Hero Slayer
Summary: Guide 'Skul' on his quest to single-handedly take on the Imperial Army and rescue his King from captivity, in an action-packed rogue-lite 2D platformer for the ages.

Name: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT
Summary: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT is a 60-player action Battle Royale offering players insane mobility powered by parkour and grappling hook, a vast arsenal of melee and ranged weapons, and a roaster of characters with powerful abilities—transform yourself into a gigantic Vajra Warrior and crush your enemies!

Name: First Class Trouble
Summary: First Class Trouble is a party game where players must work together and against each other to survive a disaster. The goal is to shut down a deadly A.I. Some players are impostors, secretly playing as human-looking killer robots intent on betraying the other players.

Name: Golf Around!
Summary: Golf Around! È un'avventura multigiocatore di minigolf con campi da golf pazzeschi. Include anche la possibilità di creare facilmente livelli personalizzati in cui giocare!

Name: Best Friend Forever
Summary: Ever wanted to raise a pup and somehow navigate the mysteries of human dating at the same time? Meet the colourful cast of Rainbow Bay, date a few cuties, and teach a new dog new tricks - maybe even a flip. With the power of dogs and millennial woes on your side, this isn't a game to miss!

Name: Röki
Summary: Röki è un'avventura mozzafiato nella natura selvaggia e innevata. Nei panni di Tove dovrai esplorare un mondo sconosciuto, fra antiche leggende e creature misteriose. Risolvi enigmi, raccogli insoliti oggetti e rivela una storia tragica e dolorosa, fino a trovare la strada per la redenzione.

Name: Paranormal HK
Summary: Paranormal HK is a first person horror game about Urban legends of Hong Kong, China. The story is about a crew of online supernatural channel“Beyond the Invisible” went to Kowloon Walled City to film a short movie for their latest episode and encountered something out of their expectations.

Name: Spacebase Startopia
Summary: Spacebase Startopia affascina con il suo mix originale di simulazione economica e strategia di creazione di un impero accoppiata con classiche schermaglie RTS e una buona dose di umorismo.

Name: The White Door
Summary: Gioca a The White Door e scopri l'universo di Rusty Lake in un nuovo titolo dallo stile unico! Esplora i sogni di Robert Hill ed aiutalo a ritrovare i suoi ricordi perduti. Riuscirai a sopravvivere alla severa routine giornaliera, e a riportare colore nella vita di Robert?

Name: The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners
Summary: Saints & Sinners is a game unlike any other in The Walking Dead universe. Every challenge you face and decision you make is driven by YOU. Fight the undead, scavenge through the flooded ruins of New Orleans, and face gut-wrenching choices for you and the other survivors. Live The Walking Dead.

Name: some some convenience store
Summary: A game about starting a relationship while working part-time at a convenience store

Name: New Super Lucky's Tale
Summary: Un incantevole gioco a piattaforme per qualsiasi età che segue le avventure di Lucky, un eroe ottimista, pieno di energia e semplicemente adorabile. La sua missione è quella di trovare la sua forza interiore e aiutare sua sorella a salvare il Libro delle Ere da Jinx. Jinx è un nemico misterioso con un losco fine: riplasmare il mondo.

Name: Lurk in the Dark: Prologue
Summary: A town flourished with woodworking and mining, "Babel's Hill Top". A Ruggles family who contributed greatly to the development of this town several centuries ago. The tragedy that happened at the residence of them. In this residence where blood and hatred are ingrained, their nightmare begins.

Name: TASOMACHI: Behind the Twilight
Summary: Yukumo is a young girl traversing the world in her beloved airship. Upon arriving at a certain town, her airship breaks down. She decides to explore the town to search for parts for repair; however, the town has fallen silent, with no trace of its inhabitants...

Name: Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion
Summary: Gioca nei panni di un’adorabile rapa combinaguai. Evadi le tasse, risolvi “plantastici” rompicapi e sconfiggi bestie enormi per smantellare l’amministrazione di un vegetale corrotto!

Name: Secret Government
Summary: A grand strategy game about leading a secret society that has ruled humankind from the shadows for centuries. Rewrite history as you pull the strings of fate and spread your influence across the globe, shaping the world's nations and future to your will from the 17th century to the present day.

Name: Grounded
Summary: The world is a vast, beautiful and dangerous place – especially when you have been shrunk to the size of an ant. Can you thrive alongside the hordes of giant insects, fighting to survive the perils of the backyard?

Name: Monster Train
Summary: Monster Train is a strategic roguelike deck building game with a twist. Set on a train to hell, you’ll use tactical decision making to defend multiple vertical battlegrounds. With real time competitive multiplayer and endless replayability, Monster Train is always on time.

Name: Deadside
Summary: Deadside is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with survival elements. Post-Apocalypse, PvP, PvE, open world, realistic weapons, craft, base...

Name: Endzone: A World Apart
Summary: Endzone is a post-apocalyptic survival city builder, where you start a new civilization with a group of people after a global nuclear disaster. Build them a new home and ensure their survival in a shattered world, threatened by constant radiation, toxic rain, sandstorms and droughts.

Name: Ludus
Summary: Build the best ludus in the world! and survive in ancient Rome.

Name: Help Will Come Tomorrow
Summary: In a uninhabitable Siberian wilderness, in a wake of October Revolution, a group of passengers survives the mysterious catastrophe of Trans-Siberian railway train. They must endure in a harsh ice-clad climate until rescue arrives. Facing many dangers, their own weaknesses and, above all, their own prejudice.

Name: Prop and Seek
Summary: Prop and seek is a hide and seek game which up to 32 players take turns to hide or seek. You can be a prop to hide or be a hunter to find all hidden props.

Name: Wild Terra 2: New Lands
Summary: Play your role in the life-filled medieval world controlled by players. Live on an inhabited territory or conquer New Continents in new seasons! MMORPG full of logically interconnected worked out little things that create a unique immersion and the spirit of adventure!

Name: Out of the Park Baseball 21
Summary: Officially licensed by MLB, MiLB, and the MLBPA, Out of the Park Baseball 21 is a strategy & sports gaming fan’s dream come true and the only game ever to win Metacritic PC Game of the Year Award TWICE. OOTP 21 - Twenty One Years of Excellence!

Name: Kuukiyomi: Consider It!
Summary: The world, THIS IS JAPAN.

Name: Orbital Bullet
Summary: Orbital Bullet is a fast paced 360° action-platformer with rogue-lite elements, where all actions take place in a circular pattern. Fight your way through a variety of procedural planets and use body modifications, crafting and heavy weaponry. Kill. Die. Modify.

Name: When The Past Was Around
Summary: When the Past was Around è un puzzle-adventure punta&clicca sull'amore, l'accettazione, il superamento e la gioia e il dolore che si prova durante i diversi stadi di una relazione.

Name: 30XX
Summary: Salta, spara e fatti strada a suon di fendenti in 30XX, il videogioco platform d'azione roguelite che puoi giocare con un amico! Esplora mondi rigogliosi e in continua evoluzione in cui si mescolano salti precisi e combattimenti febbrili. Distruggi i loro temibili Guardiani.

Name: Element TD 2
Summary: Element TD 2 vi permetterà di combinare diversi elementi e creare torri uniche. Mostrateci le vostre difese contro mostri sempre più potenti, competete e collaborate con altri per determinare chi è il signore degli elementi!

Name: Maquette
Summary: MAQUETTE è un puzzle game ricorsivo che ti trasporterà in un mondo dove ogni edificio, pianta o oggetto è di dimensioni al contempo minuscole e gigantesche.

Name: Meegah Mem 2
Summary: Meegah Mem 2 (stylized Meegah Mem II) is a parody of Mega Man 2 that improves upon its predecessor, Meegah Mem, with a new engine, new mechanics and more!

Name: Gordian Quest
Summary: An epic RPG inspired by old-school classics like Ultima and Wizardry, using modern gaming concepts like deckbuilding and turn-based strategic combat. Lead and nurture parties of heroes. Forge bonds and discover new skills among them. Journey forth and unravel the ancient curses set upon your land.

Name: Dandy Ace
Summary: Dandy Ace is an over the top action game that follows this fabulous magician seeking to combine and use his magical cards, fighting and looting his way to defeat the Green-Eyed Illusionist and free himself from a cursed mirror.

Name: A Space for the Unbound
Summary: A slice-of-life adventure game with beautiful pixelart set in the late 90s rural Indonesia that tells a story about overcoming anxiety, depression, and the relationship between a boy and a girl with supernatural powers

Name: THE LONGING
Summary: Un insolito mix di avventura e gioco idle. Nella solitudine più totale, immersi nelle profondità della Terra, il vostro compito è aspettare il risveglio del Re... per 400 giorni.

Name: Amnesia: Rebirth
Summary: Una nuova discesa nell’oscurità dai creatori dell’iconica serie di Amnesia. Un viaggio straziante attraverso la desolazione e l'angoscia, che esplora i limiti della resilienza umana. Disponibile anche in modalità Avventura, per chi vuole godere della storia e dell’avventura senza l’horror.

Name: The Complex
Summary: Dopo un grave attacco con armi biologiche a Londra, due scienziati si ritrovano bloccati in un laboratorio, dove il tempo e l'aria si stanno esaurendo.

Name: Slapshot Rebound
Summary: Slapshot: Rebound is a physics-based multiplayer game where you play an arcade style match of hockey. No shoot button, no puck glue, no RNG. It’s up to you and your team to take control of the puck, pass, shoot, outplay your opponents. Play with your friends or team up with other Slapshot players!

Name: A Summer's End - Hong Kong 1986
Summary: A Summer's End is a visual novel set in 1980s Hong Kong. It tells of a love story between two women. Lush and vibrant visuals, the game features over 400 unique hand-drawn artwork inspired by Asian cinema and 1980s anime.

Name: Super Mega Baseball 3
Summary: Run up the score in a relaxed slugfest or push the limits of your reflexes in this refined baseball simulator. The third entry in the series features all-new Franchise and Online Leagues modes, major graphical enhancements, and on-field additions including pickoffs and situational player traits.

Name: I Am Dead
Summary: I am Dead è un'incantevole avventura a enigmi che ti porterà a esplorare l'aldilà, dai creatori di Hohokum e di Wilmot's Warehouse.

Name: Curious Expedition 2
Summary: Curious Expedition 2 is a turn-based narrative roguelike set in a reimagined version of the late 19th century that uses procedural gameplay and story elements to create completely unique and epic adventures every time you play.

Name: Heroines of Swords & Spells
Summary: An epic and funny jRPG adventure with intricately detailed world and story. Guide a party of wayward heroines through the perils of this fantasy world.

Name: Pro Cycling Manager 2020
Summary: Diventa il manager di una squadra ciclistica e portala in vetta! Dovrai gestire le finanze e il reclutamento, pianificare gli allenamenti, implementare la tua strategia e, in questa nuova edizione, dovrai anche occuparti delle richieste dei ciclisti e del loro morale!

Name: Tiny Bunny
Summary: Tiny Bunny: Prologue is a non-linear horror visual novel. Those, who have heard the voice of the forest, are beyond help.

Name: Paperball
Summary: It's time to get rolling! Navigate tricky passages, pull off crazy stunts and get ready to fall off a lot! Play carefully or risk it all for the fastest time - play any way you want in over 150 all unique stages.

Name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Link Evolution
Summary: Rivivi la gloria dei duelli del passato e del presente contro i personaggi di Yu-Gi-Oh! Competi contro altri giocatori online con il tuo deck personalizzato, poi sfidali in Battle Pack Draft e Sealed Play(Gioco Sigillato)!

Name: Rogue Legacy 2
Summary: Rogue Legacy 2 is what you'd get if you mashed Rogue Legacy and a sequel together. Every time you die, your children will succeed you, and each child is unique. Your daughter might be a Colourblind Archer, and your son could be a Pacifistic Chef. Either way, one of them is getting conscripted.

Name: Mortal Shell
Summary: Mortal Shell è un action RPG che mette alla prova la tua tenacia e sanità mentale in un mondo in frantumi. I tuoi nemici non hanno pietà: per sopravvivere sono necessari consapevolezza, precisione e istinto superiori. Possiedi guerrieri caduti, trova santuari nascosti e affronta nemici formidabili.

Name: Automobilista 2
Summary: Automobilista 2 once again puts you in the driving seat of an advanced and diverse racing simulator - now with incredible graphical quality, high-profile cars and tracks, advanced dynamic track condition system and VR support.

Name: Radio General
Summary: It's WWII. You're a general sitting in a tent. All you have is a map, and a radio. Can you win the battle? Radio General is a unique strategy game where you interact with your units over the radio using speech recognition. Test your mettle and relive famous battles as a WWII general.

Name: Cepheus Protocol
Summary: An unimaginable plague has been released in San Francisco, turning the population into mutated creatures hellbent on spreading the Pangu Virus. Inspired by classic RTS series Company of Heroes and World in Conflict, it is up to you to win back the city before the Pangu Virus spreads globally.

Name: F1 2020
Summary: Con F1® 2020 potrai finalmente creare la tua scuderia F1® e gareggiare contro scuderie e piloti ufficiali. Oppure potrai sfidare i tuoi amici nella nuova modalità a schermo condiviso per un’esperienza di guida più rilassata. Corri su 22 circuiti e scegli tra contenuti classici e contemporanei.

Name: Mortal Online 2
Summary: Mortal Online 2 is the long awaited sequel to Star Vault’s long running first person sandbox MMORPG. Explore a massive open sandbox world and choose your own path, but be aware, danger lurks around every corner in this full PvP full loot world.

Name: Poly Bridge 2
Summary: L'acclamato simulatore di costruzione di ponti è tornato ed è il migliore di sempre! Riscopri la tua creatività ingegneristica con ore e ore di rompicapi divertenti!

Name: Zompiercer
Summary: Zompiercer is a first-person shooter in the world of zombie apocalypse, filled with dangerous uniquely mutated zombies craving your flesh. Travel by train, which has become a haven for you, equip living wagons and create new equipment to survive.

Name: Beasts of Bermuda
Summary: Beasts of Bermuda is a multiplayer game hosting large servers in which the player grows up as a dinosaur or other prehistoric creature. The player becomes part of a living, player-created ecosystem. The ultimate objective is to survive on one of the islands within Bermuda.

Name: Lumberjack's Dynasty
Summary: Un originalissimo simulatore di vita in prima persona, con protagonista un boscaiolo intento ad avviare un’attività e a fondare una dinastia.

Name: Royal Crown
Summary: You are now summoned to ROYAL CROWN - a fantasy Battle Royale to see who is most fit to survive! Survive and adventure through a beautiful fairytale themed fantasy battlefield!

Name: Arboria
Summary: Inizia il tuo viaggio in questo GdR roguelite dark fantasy. Vesti i panni di un guerriero Yotun, discendi nelle mutevoli profondità di Durnan e svela i misteri della tua tribù. Affronta i nemici con una vasta gamma di Armi simbiotiche e sfrutta le mutazioni per diventare sempre più potente.

Name: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos
Summary: Step into the wacky heroic fantasy universe of the Dungeon of Naheulbeuk. Lead a team of unlikely and clumsy heroes in an epic and challenging tactical RPG. Live an adventure filled with humor, surprises and silly encounters.

Name: Library Of Ruina
Summary: "May you find your book in this place." Combat between the guests and the librarians breaks out as if it were on a stage. Defeated guests turn into books, and the Library grows onward. And eventually, get your hands on… The one singular, perfect book.

Name: Helltaker
Summary: Helltaker is a short game about sharply dressed demon girls.

Name: Labyrinthine
Summary: Uncover the dark secrets of an overgrown maze with friends online as you try to escape the horrors within. Together, you will need to solve puzzles, find items and run from the bloodthirsty denizens of the maze as you try and get out alive...

Name: Green Project
Summary: Post apocalyptic survival farming, green the world to survive !

Name: Watch Me Stream My Mental Breakdown
Summary: Story card game about playing games all day and proving your father wrong. Build your stream, keep your mental health above zero, and work your way up to a minimum wage!

Name: TOHU
Summary: Scopri un'originale avventura ambientata in un mondo popolato da strambi e affascinanti pesci pianeta. Esplora magnifici scenari, risolvi intricati enigmi e svela il mistero di una bambina e del suo alter-ego meccanico, Cubus.

Name: Soda Dungeon 2
Summary: Lo spensierato dungeon crawler preferito di tutti ritorna con Soda Dungeon 2. Include una nuova avventura, un'intera città da migliorare, creazioni, nuove classi, dimensioni alternative e tanto altro. Troverai tutto ciò che hai amato del gioco originale insieme a tutte le aggiunte che desideravi!

Name: Space Scavenger
Summary: Design, build and command unique spaceships through mysterious alien infested galaxies while scavenging for spaceship parts in a desperate attempt at finding what you once called home.

Name: Mafia: Definitive Edition
Summary: Corre l'anno 1930. Dopo uno sfortunato incontro con la mafia, Tommy Angelo, tassista, si ritrova coinvolto suo malgrado nel mondo della criminalità organizzata. Entrare in combutta con la famiglia Salieri può sembrare un rischio troppo grande, ma il crimine paga, e tanto. La sua scalata ai ranghi lo porterà a guadagni sempre maggiori...

Name: The House of Da Vinci 2
Summary: Diventa l'apprendista del famoso Leonardo Da Vinci. Risolvi puzzle meccanici 3D realizzati a mano e scopri segreti nascosti. Visita i più affascinanti luoghi del Rinascimento italiano. Viaggia nel tempo per influenzare l'ambiente circostante.

Name: Space Otter Charlie
Summary: Salta, fluttua e lanciati attraverso lo spazio più... lontrano in questo puzzle a piattaforme a gravità zero!

Name: 8Doors: Arum's Afterlife Adventure
Summary: 8Doors is a story-driven Metroidvania-style action platformer heavily influenced by Korean folktales. Play as ‘Arum’, a brave girl that has entered the realm of the afterlife in search of her father’s soul and guide her through the '8 Doors of Purgatory' to solve the mysteries that lie deep within.

Name: Fishy
Summary: Fishy is a 3D platormer. you play as a fish very far from home . traveling trough 5 worlds such as a jungle oasis to under water to the frozen tundra to inside a volcano to lastly to outer...

Name: Cartel Tycoon
Summary: Cartel Tycoon è un gioco gestionale e narrativo ispirato al narcotraffico degli anni '80. Espanditi, conquista e respingi i cartelli rivali evitando le attenzioni delle autorità. Ottieni la lealtà dei cittadini e tenta di scongiurare il fatale destino che attende tutti i grandi signori della droga.

Name: Carto
Summary: Carto is a charming adventure game wrapped around a unique, world-altering puzzle mechanic. Use this power to explore mysterious lands, help a quirky cast of characters, and guide Carto on her journey back to her family.

Name: Fights in Tight Spaces
Summary: A stylish blend of deck-building, turn-based tactics, and thrilling animated fight sequences in classic action-movie settings. Learn to balance your hand, momentum, and positioning to overcome the odds to defeat your adversaries. Build your deck, control the space and live to fight another day.

Name: The Slormancer
Summary: Combatti contro orde di nemici guidati dallo Slormante, un antico stregone malvagio, in questo action-RPG tanto assurdo quanto epico! Troverai tantissimi bottini luccicanti e oggetti collezionabili, innumerevoli ore di contenuti, dinamiche di gioco frenetiche e una pixel art a regola d'arte.

Name: Phasmophobia
Summary: Phasmophobia is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you and your team to use all the ghost hunting equipment at your disposal in order to gather as much evidence as you can.

Name: Rival Stars Horse Racing
Summary: Accudisci e allena i tuoi cavalli, alleva il campione perfetto, gestisci una casa colonica e competi per la vittoria in Rival Stars Horse Racing!

Name: Hammerting
Summary: Gestisci una colonia mineraria di Nani nelle inesplorate montagne di Mara. Mentre una guerra imperversa nel Mondo degli umani, dovrai creare, esplorare e combattere per fornire ai tuoi alleati le migliori armi ed equipaggiamenti per aiutarli nella guerra contro il male.

Name: Travellers Rest
Summary: You are an innkeeper, on a journey to transform a run-down inn into a bustling social space. Brew your own beer, run a farm, explore the world, and build relationships with your customers to create your own fantasy tavern!

Name: The Fabled Woods
Summary: Welcome to The Fabled Woods, a dark and mysterious narrative short story. Despite the picturesque beauty, ugly and terrible secrets lurk among the shifting boughs, darkness that no amount of dappled sunlight can erase. Take the first step, and experience an unforgettable journey.

Name: Eternal Hope
Summary: Eternal Hope è un platform rompicapo che segue la storia di Ti'bi, un ragazzo che deve intraprendere un viaggio pieno di amore e speranza per trovare l'anima della sua amata.

Name: Wobbly Life
Summary: Wobbly Life is a lively open world physics based sandbox. Play with your friends in Online and local co-op, discover a variety of minigames and objectives to earn cash to spend in the world!

Name: Sky Haven
Summary: Sky Haven is an airport tycoon/simulation game. Plan and construct. Manage schedule. Research. Improve logistics. Say your word in the airport development. Then watch how hundreds of passengers flow through your airport. That simple!

Name: What Happened
Summary: What Happened is a nightmarish first-person exploration of anxiety and depression from the perspective of American high school student, Stiles.

Name: SMASH LEGENDS
Summary: SMASH LEGENDS è un emozionante gioco di combattimenti 3 contro 3 in tempo reale. Combatti gratuitamente nelle arene del mondo di Library con alcune incredibili LEGGENDE, ogni volta che vuoi. Unisciti al divertimento e sfida i giocatori di più piattaforme, come Steam e dispositivi iOS e Android.

Name: There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension
Summary: Non c'è nessun gioco. Quindi non piantare tutto cliccando ovunque. Non vuoi essere cacciato via dal tuo mondo dei videogiochi, vero? Certo che no!

Name: Dungeons of Edera
Summary: Dungeons of Edera è un crawler di dungeon RPG di azione rogue-lite con livelli generati proceduralmente in cui dovrai combattere orde di mostri per riportare Edera al suo antico splendore.

Name: Pro Gymnast
Summary: THE 100% physics-based athlete simulator.

Name: BPM: BULLETS PER MINUTE
Summary: BPM è uno sparatutto in prima persona Roguelike ritmico, in cui dovrai sparare, saltare e schivare al ritmo di un'epica colonna sonora rock. Immergiti in un dungeon a generazione casuale dove una sola nota mancata ti può portare alla morte. Ottieni abilità decisive e trafuga potenti armi per...

Name: DRAG
Summary: DRAG is an offroad racing game introducing 4CPT vehicle physics (4-way contact patch traction technology). A soft-body tyre model allows for competitive time attack and multiplayer wheel to wheel racing.

Name: Medieval Dynasty
Summary: Caccia, sopravvivi, costruisci e governa nei duri tempi del Medioevo: crea la tua Dinastia medievale e assicurati che prosperi a lungo, anche a costo di morire!

Name: Unspottable
Summary: Unspottable is a competitive couch party game. Blend in the crowd of AI characters, hunt down the other players and use the many different environment specific rules to win the game. Walk like a robot and punch like a human!

Name: Total War: Rome Remastered
Summary: Control and conquer the greatest empire ever known to man.

Name: Quiet Sleep
Summary: This is a beautiful and fun network shooter. Complete missions alone or with friends. In “Quiet Sleep” you perform the role of a military man who arrived at point “M” to guard the medical center.

Name: Production Sound
Summary: A fairy tale of growing up alone

Name: Night Shift
Summary: The sun has disappeared from the sky! Darkness chokes the land, depriving it of all things good. Now it’s time for you to figure out how to bring the sun back! Get behind the wheel and find the sun in Night Shift!

Name: Super Seducer
Summary: Super Seducer è il simulatore di seduzione più realistico al mondo: un gioco di azione dal vivo che ti mette dentro le situazioni di tutti i giorni (caffetteria, ufficio, bar) e ti permette di scegli come comportarti e di vedere come le donne reagiscono alle tue scelte.

Name: Final Fantasy VI
Summary: Arriva su PC un gioco acclamato e popolare: il sesto capitolo della leggendaria serie FINAL FANTASY!

Name: DOOM II: Hell on Earth
Summary: Lasciati ossessionare. Nuovamente. Questa volta, la Terra è stata invasa dall'intera armata dell'oltretomba. Per salvarla, dovrai avventurarti nei cupi abissi dell'Inferno! Affronta demoni e mostri più forzuti, terrificanti e mortali. Impugna armi più potenti.

Name: Aron's Adventure
Summary: Aron's Adventure is an Action Adventure RPG that takes place in a fantasy world called Elor. An ancient evil re-awakens and the fate of the land is thrown into Aron's hands. Aron will have to unite the people all while learning how to use his new abilities.

Name: Dis The Game
Summary: Satyryczna gra platformowa o przygodach polskiego streamera Disa. Uratuj Kiarę z rąk tajemniczego porywacza, rozpraw się z plagą Bot Of Legends i graczami strzelającymi zza pleców z bojowym okrzykiem NO PAL SIĘ KONIU! W końcu połóż kres sekcie JD z pomocą Nervariena, Kubona, Arquela i Kiary.

Name: Caesar III
Summary: Prove your strength of mind and spirit and you just may be crowned Caesar!

Name: Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness
Summary: Una serie di misteriosi omicidi porta Lara a confrontarsi con un sinistro Alchimista che viene dal passato ed una alleanza segreta di individui potenti legati da un mistero. Al centro di tutti questi misteri vi sono i Dipinti di Obscura - 5 capolavori del 14esimo secolo che l'Alchimista sta cercando di riavere.

Name: Iron Storm
Summary: Western Germany, March 1964... The last Great War rages on. Madness at the front lines. Men butchering each other. War-torn Europe stands ripped apart by a front line that runs straight through the heart of Germany where American and Western European troops battle against enemy forces.

Name: Portal
Summary: Portal™ è un nuovo gioco per giocatore singolo di Valve. Ambientato nei misteriosi laboratori di Aperture Science, Portal è stato giudicato uno dei titoli più innovativi del momento e offre ore di giocabilità unica.

Name: Sonic 3D Blast
Summary: Il Dr. Eggman (alias Dr. Robotnik) ha scoperto un’insolita razza di uccelli, noti come Flicky, che garantiscono il passaggio verso qualsiasi dimensione utilizzando i Ring dimensionali. Dopo aver catturato i Flicky, Robotnik li ha trasformati tutti in robot, in modo che lo aiutino a trovare i Chaos Emerald.

Name: Betrayal
Summary: The West Marches is a corrupt land ruled by immoral leaders. You are one of four Knights with a lust for power, and in the pursuit of power, the end justifies the means. Betrayal. A web of intricate possibilities - but fair play isn't one of them.

Name: Sonic Adventure 2: Battle
Summary: Due avventure diverse con gli eroi classici e il ritorno dei nemici storici, nella lotta per il destino del mondo.

Name: Red Lake
Summary: Red Lake - horror shooter with elements of quest.

Name: Causality
Summary: Manipola il tempo, altera la sequenza degli eventi e il risultato di ciascun livello in questo strabiliante gioco a enigmi.

Name: Star Wars: Battlefront II
Summary: Join the rise of Darth Vader’s elite 501st Legion of Stormtroopers as you fight through an all new story-based saga where every action you take impacts the battlefront and, ultimately, the fate of the Star Wars galaxy.

Name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
Summary: Five years ago Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas... a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption. Where filmstars and millionaires do their best to avoid the dealers and gangbangers. Now, it's the early 90s. Carl's got to go home.

Name: Cars
Summary: Play as Lightning McQueen, a rookie racecar looking to win fame and fortune at the Piston Cup Championship, in the video game adaptation of Disney•Pixar's Cars.

Name: DayZ
Summary: How long can you survive a post-apocalyptic world? A land overrun with an infected "zombie" population, where you compete with other survivors for limited resources. Will you team up with strangers and stay strong together? Or play as a lone wolf to avoid betrayal? This is DayZ – this is your story.

Name: The Elder Scrolls Online
Summary: Unisciti a oltre 18 milioni di giocatori nel pluripremiato GDR multigiocatore online e vivi avventure in continua espansione nel mondo persistente di Elder Scrolls

Name: Company of Heroes 2
Summary: Prova l’ultima piattaforma RTS della 2ª guerra mondiale con COH 2 e le sue espansioni. Questo pacchetto include il gioco di base, che puoi aggiornare in seguito acquistando The Western Front Armies, Ardennes Assault e/o The British Forces. Qui sotto trovi altre informazioni.

Name: LEGO The Lord of the Rings
Summary: Based on The Lord of the Rings motion picture trilogy, LEGO® The Lord of the Rings follows the original story-lines of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, and The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King, taking players through the epic story events re-imagined with the humor and endl

Name: Gone Home
Summary: 7 giugno 1995. Ore 1:15. Torni a casa dopo aver viaggiato all'estero per un anno. Ti aspetti che la famiglia ti dia il benvenuto, ma la casa è vuota. Dove sono tutti? E cosa è successo? Svela tu il mistero di Gone Home, un gioco di esplorazione da una storia di The FullBright Company.

Name: Divinity: Original Sin
Summary: Gather your party and get ready for a new, back-to-the-roots RPG adventure! Discuss your decisions with companions; fight foes in turn-based combat; explore an open world and interact with everything and everyone you see. Join up with a friend to play online in co-op and make your own adventures with the powerful RPG toolkit.

Name: Cyberpunk 2077
Summary: Cyberpunk 2077 è un'avventura a mondo aperto ambientata a Night City, una megalopoli ossessionata dal potere, dalla moda e dalle modifiche cibernetiche. Vestirai i panni di V, un mercenario fuorilegge alla ricerca di un impianto unico in grado di conferire l'immortalità.

Name: Scribblenauts Unlimited
Summary: La saga più venduta e premiata è tornata, disponibile adesso per PC e più grande che mai!

Name: PAYDAY 2
Summary: PAYDAY 2 è uno sparatutto cooperativo d'azione che permette a 4 giocatori di indossare i panni della famigerata Banda Payday, formata da Dallas, Hoxton, Wolf e Chains, e commettere rapine per tutta Washington DC.

Name: Iconoclasts
Summary: Join renegade mechanic Robin and uncover the secrets of a dying planet. Explore a big world filled with intricate puzzles, interesting characters and menacing bosses in a beautiful platform adventure that tells a personal story about faith, purpose and the challenge of helping people.

Name: Warframe
Summary: Warframe è un gioco d'azione online cooperativo free-to-play ambientato in un mondo fantascientifico in continua evoluzione. Unisciti ai tuoi amici in battaglie PvE per tutto il sistema solare e padroneggia il potere dei Warframe. Combatti da solo o insieme ad altri giocatori contro i nemici che minacciano il tuo mondo.

Name: Hotline Miami
Summary: Hotline Miami is a high-octane action game overflowing with raw brutality, hard-boiled gunplay and skull crushing close combat.

Name: F1 Race Stars
Summary: F1 RACE STARS™ is a brand new world of FORMULA ONE™ fun as you’ve never seen it before!

Name: War Thunder
Summary: War Thunder is the most comprehensive free-to-play, cross-platform, MMO military game dedicated to aviation, armoured vehicles, and naval craft, from the early 20th century to the most advanced modern combat units. Join now and take part in major battles on land, in the air, and at sea.

Name: The Walking Dead: Season Two
Summary: The Walking Dead: Season Two continues the story of Clementine, a young girl orphaned by the undead apocalypse. Left to fend for herself, she has been forced to learn how to survive in a world gone mad.

Name: Serious Sam HD: The First Encounter
Summary: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS and Gamespot's Game of the Year 2001!

Name: DOOM
Summary: Include tutti i DLC premium (Unto the Evil, Hell Followed e Bloodfall), le mappe, le modalità e le armi, nonché tutti gli aggiornamenti pubblicati, tra cui la modalità Arcade, la Modalità foto e l'ultimo aggiornamento 6.66, che include ulteriori miglioramenti per il multigiocatore e il rinnovamento della progressione multigiocatore.

Name: Urban Rivals
Summary: Il gioco di carte cult è ora su Steam Sentiti libero di tornare in Città... o semplicemente vieni a conoscerla... Caratteristiche: • Gameplay dinamico e vivace • 7 modalità di gioco (FreeFight, EFC, Survivor, Training, Arcade, Coliseum and Eventi sempre diversi) • Centinaia di delicate missioni da svolgere • 14 carte Leader sbloccabili •...

Name: Stronghold Legends
Summary: Catapult werewolves over castle walls, incinerate troops with dragon fire and command the Knights of the Round Table! This remaster of the mythical ‘castle sim’ features Steam multiplayer, Workshop support, new maps, achievements and DLC campaigns.

Name: Freedom Planet
Summary: Combatti e fatti strada nel celestiale mondo di Avalice, dove i gatti sono verdi, le motociclette scalano pareti e le ragazze mostro sono delle vere dure! Freedom Planet è una avventura platform dallo stile cartoonesco piena di emozionanti combattimenti, che vede un'energetica dragonoide e le sue amiche affrontare una forza d'attacco...

Name: Europa Universalis IV
Summary: Four centuries of detailed history come alive in Paradox’s classic grand strategy game. Lead any nation from Renaissance to Revolution in a complex simulation of the early modern world. Master the art of war, diplomacy and trade to shape and change your nation’s history!

Name: Luftrausers
Summary: The skies will be set aflame and the seas will overflow with wreckage in Vlambeer’s stylish arcade shooter LUFTRAUSERS! Select from over 125 combinations of weapons, bodies, and propulsion systems and take to the skies to battle enemy fighter planes, battleships, submarines, and rival aces for glory, honor, and high scores.

Name: Don't Starve
Summary: Don’t Starve is an uncompromising wilderness survival game full of science and magic. Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style.

Name: The Evil Within
Summary: Concepito da Shinji Mikami, il creatore dell'influente serie di Resident Evil, e sviluppato dal talentuoso team di Tango Gameworks, The Evil Within incarna il significato del puro survival horror. I giocatori dovranno affrontare una realtà disturbata, cercando di evadere dalle contorte macchinazioni che possono esistere solo nei mondi...

Name: Black Mesa
Summary: Giudicato "Gioco dell'anno" da più di 50 pubblicazioni, il titolo di debutto Valve abbina azione e avventura a una premiata tecnologia in grado di creare un mondo dal realismo impressionante, dove pensare è la chiave per la sopravvivenza.

Name: Elsword
Summary: Elsword is a free-to-play, online action RPG that uses classic side-scrolling game mechanics in an immersive manga inspired world.

Name: Pillars of Eternity
Summary: Prepare to be enchanted by a world where the choices you make and the paths you choose shape your destiny. Obsidian Entertainment, the developer of Fallout: New Vegas™ and South Park: The Stick of Truth™, together with Paradox Interactive is proud to present Pillars of Eternity.

Name: Pinball FX3
Summary: I classici Williams™ Pinball sono disponibili insieme al tavolo GRATUITO Fish Tales™! Pinball FX3 è il flipper piú grande e incentrato sulla community mai creato. Abbinamenti multigiocatore, tornei generati dagli utenti e campionati offrono opportunità infinite. Compatibilità con le versioni precedenti GRATIS!

Name: Armello
Summary: Armello è un gioco da tavolo che prende vita, dal carattere cupo e fiabesco, ricco di rocambolesche avventure che uniscono l'estrema tattica dei giochi di carte, la profonda strategia dei giochi da tavolo ed elementi RPG.

Name: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord
Summary: Risuonano i corni, volteggiano i corvi. La guerra civile strazia l'impero. Nuovi regni sorgono oltre i suoi confini. Impugna la spada, indossa l'armatura, raduna le truppe e copriti di gloria sui campi di battaglia di Calradia. Consolida il tuo potere e crea un nuovo mondo dalle ceneri del precedente.

Name: Mail Mole
Summary: Mail Mole è un colorato piattaforme 3D. Il suo protagonista è Molty, la talpa postino più veloce del mondo, che ha una importante missione: salvare Carrotland. Esplora mondi incredibili, stringi nuove amicizie, gareggia contro MechaTopos, trova oggetti da collezionare e parti per un'avventura epica.

Name: Final DOOM
Summary: Due Nuovi Episodi di 32-Livelli per DOOM II.Evilution:Lontano dalla terra, l'UAC ha ripreso i suoi esperimenti sulla luna di Giove. Una nave spaziale, scambiata dal radar come nave di approvvigionamento, fluttua sulla base. Orrendi demoni si sono riversati all'esterno, circondando la base di morte.

Name: Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty
Summary: Selected by the fickle finger of fate, Abe™, floor-waxer first class for RuptureFarms, was catapulted into a life of adventure when he overheard plans by his boss, Molluck the Glukkon™, to turn Abe and his fellow Mudokons into Tasty Treats as part of a last-ditch effort to rescue Molluck's failing meat-packing empire.

Name: The Forest
Summary: As the lone survivor of a passenger jet crash, you find yourself in a mysterious forest battling to stay alive against a society of cannibalistic mutants. Build, explore, survive in this terrifying first person survival horror simulator.

Name: Quiplash 2 InterLASHional
Summary: Il gioco di società che ti consente di dire tutto quello che vuoi è ora internazionale! Tutto il divertentissimo contenuto di Quiplash 2, ora in francese, italiano, tedesco e spagnolo! Con 100 NUOVI suggerimenti in ciascuna lingua!

Name: League of Maidens
Summary: League of Maidens® è un gioco di ruolo d'azione online GRATUITO con bellissime donne con pistole e super poteri dello studio indipendente Maiden Gaming. Caratteristiche: missioni, battaglie, personalizzazione, posa e condivisione di personaggi, pose, scene e foto 4K.

Name: Gothic 3
Summary: n eroe senza nome diventa una leggenda! Myrtana, un mondo in subbuglio: devastata dagli orchi delle terre oscure del nord, Re Rhobar sta difendendo Vengard, l'antica roccaforte degli umani, con i pochi seguaci rimasti.

Name: ibb & obb
Summary: ibb & obb è un gioco cooperativo ambientato in un mondo di puzzles in cui la forza di gravità esiste in 2 direzioni. Puoi vincere solo giocando in stretta cooperazione. Gioca con un amico seduti sullo stesso divano per un divertimento a stretto contatto o incontra un amico online.

Name: Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book DX
Summary: Il 17° episodio della serie Atelier. L'alchimista in erba di Kirchen Bell, Sophie, incontra il misterioso libro Plachta e inizia una splendida avventura per realizzare i suoi sogni.

Name: Puzzle Pirates
Summary: Every activity in Puzzle Pirates is a uniquely fun puzzle: be it sailing, gunning, or hauling treasure, your own puzzling skill determines your success!

Name: RaceRoom Racing Experience
Summary: RaceRoom is the premier free-to-play racing simulation on PC and home to official race series like DTM, WTCR, the WTCC and ADAC GT Masters. Enter RaceRoom and enter the world of a professional race car driver.

Name: Quake
Summary: Scatena la tua furia attraverso 32 livelli giocatore singolo e 6 livelli deathmatch di puro terrore con sonoro e luci completamente coinvolgenti. Preparati ad affrontare Orchi cannibali, Divoratori demoniaci e Abomini indistruttibili sfruttando artigli letali, crudeli Sparafulmini e mostruosi Razzi e Lancia Granate.

Name: Outlast
Summary: Hell is an experiment you can't survive in Outlast, a first-person survival horror game developed by veterans of some of the biggest game franchises in history. As investigative journalist Miles Upshur, explore Mount Massive Asylum and try to survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.

Name: Tomb Raider: Anniversary
Summary: Adventurer Lara Croft has been hired to recover the pieces of an ancient artifact known as the Scion. With her fearless acrobatic style she runs, jumps, swims and climbs her way towards the truth of its origin and powers - leaving only a trail of empty tombs and gun-cartridges in her wake.

Name: Defense Zone 3 Ultra HD
Summary: Il seguito del popolare gioco di strategia, con nuove armi, paesaggi e opzioni!

Name: Euro Truck Simulator 2
Summary: Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! With dozens of cities to explore, your endurance, skill and speed will all be pushed to their limits.

Name: 60 Seconds! Reatomized
Summary: 60 secondi! Questa è l'avventura atomica di sopravvivenza con elementi di commedia nera. Fai le provviste e salva la tua famiglia prima che esplode la bomba. L'esperienza nel proprio rifugio. Intraprendere decisioni difficili, emanano alimentari e caccia mutanti scarafaggi. Sopravvivere. Oppure no.

Name: Kingdom Rush HD
Summary: Get ready for an epic journey to defend your kingdom against hordes of orcs, trolls, evil wizards and other nasty fiends using a vast arsenal of towers and spells at your command!Fight on forests, mountains and wastelands, customizing your defensive strategy with different tower upgrades and specializations!

Name: Tomb Raider: Legend
Summary: Segui Lara Croft in un'avventura che la porterà a viaggiare intorno al mondo e ad esplorare località esotiche alla ricerca di uno dei manufatti più importanti della storia, qualcosa che riporterà in vita delle figure indesiderate del misterioso passato di Lara.

Name: ETERNAL BLOOD
Summary: ETERNAL BLOOD is a high-adrenaline arcade-action FPS. Face legions of demons, harvest their souls and become a God of Destruction.

Name: Formula XD
Summary: Take on the role of racing team manager - hiring drivers, negotiating contracts with sponsors and engine suppliers, making the big decisions necessary to keep your team above water. You'll issue orders to your drivers out onto the track, and be responsible for guiding them to victory or defeat.

Name: FlatOut 2
Summary: CON UNA GUIDA COSÌ SPERICOLATA, GLI INCIDENTI NON SONO UN CASO! Ma forse farai meglio a provocarne un po'. A velocità tanto elevate, più danni fai meglio è. Le più recenti auto turbo e i piloti più pazzi stanno solo aspettando di mettere alla prova la tua forza distruttiva. Se sei un guidatore responsabile, questo gioco non fa per te.

Name: TrackMania 2: Stadium
Summary: [p]Dopo aver conquistato milioni di giocatori in TrackMania Nations Forever, il celebre scenario ”Stadium” ritorna in TrackMania² Stadium e, grazie alla piattaforma ManiaPlanet, si arricchisce di una nuova serie di servizi, una grafica migliorata e un editor di tracciati ancora più potente.

Name: Dead Rising
Summary: Sei Frank West, un intransigente fotoreporter determinato a svelare il mistero che si cela dietro al centro commerciale di Willamette. Brulica di zombi. Hai 72 ore. Salme di fine stagione!

Name: Musical Range
Summary: Musical Range is a VR rhythm game where you use firearms to play along to your favorite music! Shoot to the rhythm!

Name: The Longest Journey
Summary: The Longest Journey is an amazing graphical adventure, where the player controls the protagonist, April Ryan, on her journey between parallel universes.

Name: Elite: Dangerous
Summary: Controlla la tua navicella in una galassia spietata. Elite Dangerous è il multigiocatore massivo spaziale definitivo epico.

Name: Final Fantasy IX
Summary: FINAL FANTASY IX, il celebre RPG uscito in Giappone nel 2000 e che ha venduto fino ad oggi oltre 5 milioni di copie, è finalmente disponibile su STEAM! Rivivi tutte le avventure di Gidan e i suoi amici sul tuo PC!

Name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II - The Sith Lords
Summary: 5 years after the events of the award winning original, the Sith are on the verge of crushing the Old Republic. As a lone Jedi, will you follow the light side or succumb to the dark?

Name: Jagged Alliance 2
Summary: Il piccolo stato di Arulco è stato occupato da uno spietato dittatore: solo tu puoi aiutare i suoi abitanti a liberarsene! Jagged Alliance 2 Gold Pack ti avvolge in un complesso universo di giochi di ruolo nel quale potrai interagire con oltre 150 personaggi, assoldare il tuo gruppo di soldati e creare mercenari personalizzati per...

Name: Mad Max
Summary: Sei Mad Max un sopravvissuto, eroe suo malgrado. Max non desidera altro che lasciarsi la follia alle spalle e trovare conforto per la sua anima tormentata.

Name: World of Warships: Legends
Summary: Combatti in epiche battaglie navali gratuite al timone di una delle 350 e più navi storiche, nell'esaltante equilibrio tra strategia e combattimento in tempo reale di World of Warships. Dota la tua flotta di bandiere, mimetiche, potenziamenti, Capitani talentuosi e molto altro!

Name: Comedy Night
Summary: Hai il talento di affrontare altri comici in un contest show dal vivo? Scopri in che modo le tue risorse possono affrontare il pubblico crudele che ti può eliminare o l'implacabile conversazione di altri performer.

Name: Chrono Trigger
Summary: Questo gioco di ruolo classico torna con tantissime novità! Viaggia nel passato più remoto, nel futuro lontano, fino a raggiungere la fine dei tempi. Questa epica avventura in cui dovrai salvare un intero pianeta farà storia ancora una volta.

Name: INSIDE
Summary: Solo e spaventato, un ragazzo si ritrova suo malgrado al centro di un progetto oscuro.

Name: ZooKeeper Simulator
Summary: In ZooKeeper Simulator, there are two teams: Zookeeper vs Animals. Zookeeper must maintain the park by carrying out missions while animals must prevent them utilizing violence and pure brutality.

Name: Flight Of Nova
Summary: Flight Of Nova is a flight simulation in which you take control of spacecrafts on the full-scale planet NVA-31. You will fly on different types of machines during transport and research missions in an environment with realistic aerodynamics and orbital physics.

Name: Half-Life 2: Episode Two
Summary: 1998. HALF-LIFE sconvolge il mondo dei giochi con la sua combinazione di azione martellante e trama completa e coinvolgente. Il titolo di debutto di Valve vince più di 50 premi come miglior gioco dell'anno, viene nominato "Miglior gioco per PC di sempre" da PC Gamer e lancia una serie che conta più di otto milioni di copie vendute in...

Name: Finders Reapers
Summary: Finders Reapers is an inventive third-person shooter.Experience items raining from the sky, collect them, sell them and discover a whole new concept where cash is ammo.Take on missions, fight it out online or battle against bots in custom skirmish mode.It’s time to prove you’re the best.

Name: Lights, Camera, Reaction!
Summary: LCR is the ultimate party game to break out during family gatherings and friendly get-togethers! Play in both VR and non-VR game modes, including a single player reaction mode, a local multiplayer mode, and an online smartphone-based multiplayer mode. Enjoy countless hours of hilarious fun!

Name: No More Room in Hell
Summary: The chances of you surviving this all out war of society and the undead are slim to none. Already, there are millions of the walking dead shambling about, searching for food to eat. There's no known cure. One bite can possibly end it all for you. However, you aren't alone in this nightmare.

Name: Home Sweet Home
Summary: Home Sweet Home is a first-person horror adventure game based on Thai myths and beliefs. The core gameplay focuses on storytelling and stealth to avoid perilous spirits hunting you. Moreover, few puzzles are added into the game, making gameplay more various.

Name: Convenience Store
Summary: "Convenience Store" is a classic convenience store operating simulation game. The original version was released in 2005 and re-launched on Steam in 2019.

Name: Chicken Invaders 3
Summary: Chickens. For centuries we have oppressed them, grilling, roasting, stewing, and stuffing them in buns. The time has come for us to pay. Intergalactic chickens are invading Earth, seeking revenge for the oppression of their earthly brethren!

Name: Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair
Summary: Jabberwock Island: Tu e i tuoi compagni di classe eravate pronti a divertirvi sotto il sole quando Monokuma è ritornato per ricominciare il suo gioco mortale! Intrappolato in una situazione "uccidi-o-muori", la tua sola speranza sta nel risolvere i misteri dell'isola.

Name: Gas Station Simulator
Summary: Buy an abandoned gas station and restore it to its full glory. Renovate, upgrade and expand upon the offered services to keep up with your clients demands.

Name: The Exorcist: Legion VR (Deluxe Edition)
Summary: The Exorcist: Legion VR Deluxe Edition is a complete collection of all FIVE chapters of the acclaimed VR experience based on The Exorcist franchise. Investigate and exorcise sinister demonic entities as you make your way to a final confrontation with your darkest, most hidden fears. HTC Vive, Oculus Rift/S and Valve Index.

Name: Deus Ex: Invisible War
Summary: Approximately 20 years after the events depicted in Deus Ex, The World is only beginning to recover from a Catastrophic worldwide depression. In the Chaotic period of recovery, several religious and political factions see an opportunity to re-shape a worldwide government to their agendas, understanding that the right moves now could...

Name: The Tenants
Summary: Diventa un proprietario immobiliare e costruisci il tuo impero residenziale! Affitterete il vostro appartamento a un paio di «fuorisede» o a una nonnina con una legione di gatti? Come gestirete gli inquilini quando i vicini non possono più sopportarli e chiamano regolarmente la polizia?

Name: Distance
Summary: Distance is an atmospheric racing platformer. Fusing futuristic arcade racing with parkour, survive a deadly, mysterious, neon-drenched city by jumping, rotating, and flying.

Name: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
Summary: Portando il franchise di METAL GEAR in una nuova era, grazie all'innovativa tecnologia del Fox Engine, METAL GEAR SOLID V: The Phantom Pain offrirà una fantastica esperienza di gioco, dove sarà possibile completare le missioni con la massima libertà tattica in uno scenario liberamente esplorabile.

Name: 新仙剑奇侠传 单机版 (Sword and Fairy)
Summary: *** This game is only available in Chinese language ***

Name: Dark Souls II
Summary: Sviluppato da FROM SOFTWARE, DARK SOULS™ II è l'attesissimo seguito della rivelazione del 2011, Dark Souls™. La sua particolare esperienza di gioco azione-GDR ha catturato l'immaginazione dei giocatori di tutto il mondo grazie a sfide incredibili e intense emozioni.

Name: The Bus
Summary: The Bus è il simulatore di guida di autobus urbani di nuova generazione ambientata nella capitale della Germania, Berlino, su una scala realistica 1:1. Trasporta i passeggeri su diverse linee in tutta la città con vari autobus. Gestisci la tua flotta e collabora con altri conducenti online.

Name: Transformice
Summary: Transformice is an MMO platformer about dozens of mice running to bring back the cheese! Will the almighty Shaman help you or just ruin everything? Millions of levels, hectic physics, skill trees, and more importantly... hats!

Name: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
Summary: Now 20% More Evil with the Free Halloween update!

Name: Nothing & Nowhere
Summary: While taking a walk on a foggy beach, reclusive writer Cora encounters a young runaway. Curious, Cora offers her a place to stay... and a quiet, pensive story about overcoming the past unfolds.

Name: A Blind Legend
Summary: A Blind Legend is the first-ever action-adventure game without video – where ears replace eyes! Discover the original, innovative sensory experience of binaural 3D sound.

Name: RUNNING WITH RIFLES
Summary: RUNNING WITH RIFLES è uno sparatutto tattico con visuale dall'alto, con elementi open-world e GDR. In RWR fai parte di un esercito come un semplice soldato, proprio come le altre migliaia di uomini intorno a te.

Name: Forex Trading Master: Simulator
Summary: This is a simulation of foreign currencies trading game, the data is synchronized in real-time from Bank’s Website and API provider and The game currently supports more than 30 kinds of foreign currency exchanges.

Name: Garou: Mark of the Wolves
Summary: “GAROU: MARK OF THE WOLVES”, the latest entry in the legendary "FATAL FURY" Series which still continues to fascinate players around the world to this day, returns for a new fight on Steam!

Name: EverQuest
Summary: Welcome to EverQuest ® - the online game that started it all! No other MMO matches EverQuest's sheer content, now with 25 expansions and countless updates. EverQuest is free-to-play.

Name: Rust
Summary: The only aim in Rust is to survive - Overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals. Protect yourself from other players.

Name: Path of Exile
Summary: You are an Exile, struggling to survive on the dark continent of Wraeclast, as you fight to earn power that will allow you to exact your revenge against those who wronged you. Created by hardcore gamers, Path of Exile is an online Action RPG set in a dark fantasy world.

Name: Dota 2
Summary: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover. With regular updates that ensure a constant evolution of gameplay, features, and heroes, Dota 2 has taken on a life of its own.

Name: Rocket League
Summary: Fotball møter kjøring igjen i den etterlengtede fysikkbaserte oppfølgeren til den elskede arenaklassikeren Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars!

Name: Grand Theft Auto V
Summary: Grand Theft Auto V for PC gir spillerne muligheten til å utforske den prisbelønte verdenen Los Santos og Blaine County i oppløsninger på inntil 4k og større, i tillegg til sjansen til å oppleve spillet i 60 bilder per sekund.

Name: Serious Sam II
Summary: Serious Sam 2 is a shot of adrenaline to the hearts of first-person shooter fans across the world. This is serious!

Name: ARK: Survival Evolved
Summary: Stranded on the shores of a mysterious island, you must learn to survive. Use your cunning to kill or tame the primeval creatures roaming the land, and encounter other players to survive, dominate... and escape!

Name: Dark Souls III
Summary: Dark Souls fortsetter å sprenge grenser med sitt nyeste og mest ambisiøse kapittel i den kritikerroste og sjangerdefinerende serien. Vær beredt på å ønske mørket velkommen!

Name: The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth
Summary: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a randomly generated action RPG shooter with heavy Rogue-like elements. Following Isaac on his journey players will find bizarre treasures that change Isaac’s form giving him super human abilities and enabling him to fight off droves of mysterious creatures, discover secrets and fight his way to safety.

Name: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
Summary: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.

Name: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
Summary: Be the leader of wobblers from ancient lands, spooky places, and fantasy worlds. Watch them fight in simulations made with the wobbliest physics system ever created, make your own wobblers in the unit creator and send your army off to fight your friends in multiplayer.

Name: Hunt: Showdown
Summary: Hunt: Showdown er et halsbrekkende, førstepersons PvPvE-skytespill der du ikke kan ta noen ting for gitt. Bekjemp grusomme monstre i kampen om skatter som vil gi deg ære, utstyr og gull i dette beintøffe og uforglemmelige multiplayer onlinespillet.

Name: Disco Elysium
Summary: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is a groundbreaking role playing game. You’re a detective with a unique skill system at your disposal and a whole city to carve your path across. Interrogate unforgettable characters, crack murders or take bribes. Become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being.

Name: Marbles On Stream
Summary: Marbles on Stream is a Marble Racing game for EVERYONE! You can simulate races yourself or stream it on Twitch.tv with your viewers! Many features in game to help interact with your viewers and engage with them in unique ways. 3 ways to play! Download and stream! Download the MoS app on your mobile device! Get on Twitch.

Name: Among Us
Summary: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-10 players...in space!

Name: Apex Legends
Summary: Apex Legends er et prisbelønt, kostnadsfritt og lagbasert Battle Royale-skytespill utviklet av Respawn Entertainment. Lær deg å mestre en økende liste over legendariske karakterer med heftige egenskaper og opplev strategisk lagspill i en innovativ nestegenerasjons Battle Royale-spillopplevelse.

Name: Phasmophobia
Summary: Phasmophobia is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you and your team to use all the ghost hunting equipment at your disposal in order to gather as much evidence as you can.

Name: Euro Truck Simulator 2
Summary: Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! With dozens of cities to explore, your endurance, skill and speed will all be pushed to their limits.

Name: Rust
Summary: The only aim in Rust is to survive - Overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals. Protect yourself from other players.

Name: Path of Exile
Summary: You are an Exile, struggling to survive on the dark continent of Wraeclast, as you fight to earn power that will allow you to exact your revenge against those who wronged you. Created by hardcore gamers, Path of Exile is an online Action RPG set in a dark fantasy world.

Name: Dota 2
Summary: Każdego dnia miliony graczy z całego świata wchodzą do bitwy jako jeden z ponad setki bohaterów dostępnych w Dota. Niezależnie od tego, czy jest to ich dziesiąta, czy tysięczna godzina spędzona w grze, zawsze znajdzie się coś nowego do odkrycia.

Name: Rocket League
Summary: Piłka nożna po raz kolejny krzyżuje się z wyścigami w długo wyczekiwanej, opartej na modelu fizycznym kontynuacji popularnej gry arenowej, Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle Cars!

Name: Grand Theft Auto V
Summary: Grand Theft Auto V na PC pozwala graczom zobaczyć ogromny świat Los Santos i hrabstwa Blaine w rozdzielczości sięgającej 4K i lepszej oraz w 60 klatkach na sekundę.

Name: Serious Sam II
Summary: Serious Sam 2 to strzał adrenaliny proso w serca fanów pierwszoosobowych strzelanin z całego świata. Poważna rzecz!

Name: ARK: Survival Evolved
Summary: Jako mężczyzna lub kobieta pozostawiony nagi, wychłodzony i umierający z głodu na tajemniczej wyspie, musisz polować, zbierać plony, wykonywać przedmioty, uprawiać ziemię i budować schronienia do przetrwania. Używaj swoich umiejętności i sprytu aby zabić, oswoić, hodować i podróżować na Dinozaurach oraz pradawnych istotach żyjących w ARK.

Name: Dark Souls III
Summary: DARK SOULS™ III znów przesuwa granice gatunku - oto najnowsza i najbardziej ambitna odsłona docenionej przez krytyków serii. Przygotuj się do walki i przywitaj mrok!

Name: The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth
Summary: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a randomly generated action RPG shooter with heavy Rogue-like elements. Following Isaac on his journey players will find bizarre treasures that change Isaac’s form giving him super human abilities and enabling him to fight off droves of mysterious creatures, discover secrets and fight his way to safety.

Name: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
Summary: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.

Name: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
Summary: Be the leader of wobblers from ancient lands, spooky places, and fantasy worlds. Watch them fight in simulations made with the wobbliest physics system ever created, make your own wobblers in the unit creator and send your army off to fight your friends in multiplayer.

Name: Hunt: Showdown
Summary: Hunt: Showdown to pierwszoosobowy shooter z wysokimi nagrodami i trybem PvPvE. Staw czoła potworom rodem z koszmarów podczas pogoni za łupami, sławą, sprzętem i złotem w tej wymagającej i niezapomnianej grze online z trybem wieloosobowym.

Name: Disco Elysium
Summary: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is a groundbreaking role playing game. You’re a detective with a unique skill system at your disposal and a whole city to carve your path across. Interrogate unforgettable characters, crack murders or take bribes. Become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being.

Name: Marbles On Stream
Summary: Marbles on Stream is a Marble Racing game for EVERYONE! You can simulate races yourself or stream it on Twitch.tv with your viewers! Many features in game to help interact with your viewers and engage with them in unique ways. 3 ways to play! Download and stream! Download the MoS app on your mobile device! Get on Twitch.

Name: Among Us
Summary: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-10 players...in space!

Name: Apex Legends
Summary: Apex Legends to wielokrotnie nagradzana darmowa strzelanka drużynowa Battle Royale od Respawn Entertainment. Wybieraj spośród coraz szerszej gamy legendarnych postaci obdarzonych potężnymi zdolnościami. Doświadcz drużynowej współpracy i innowacyjnej rozgrywki w przełomowej grze Battle Royale.

Name: Phasmophobia
Summary: Phasmophobia is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you and your team to use all the ghost hunting equipment at your disposal in order to gather as much evidence as you can.

Name: Euro Truck Simulator 2
Summary: Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! With dozens of cities to explore, your endurance, skill and speed will all be pushed to their limits.

Name: Rust
Summary: The only aim in Rust is to survive - Overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals. Protect yourself from other players.

Name: Path of Exile
Summary: You are an Exile, struggling to survive on the dark continent of Wraeclast, as you fight to earn power that will allow you to exact your revenge against those who wronged you. Created by hardcore gamers, Path of Exile is an online Action RPG set in a dark fantasy world.

Name: Dota 2
Summary: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover. With regular updates that ensure a constant evolution of gameplay, features, and heroes, Dota 2 has taken on a life of its own.
